editorialDecl.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)

normalization.p: Initial vowel elision is marked by an quote (for avagraha) sign : e.g., "prathamo'dhyāyaḥ"

segmentation.p: Verses are grouped within the line-group tag, lg, and individually tagged as verse lines, l.

revisionDesc.change: File created and added to the Gaudiya Grantha Mandir online library on January 29th 2004 by Jagadananda Das. File 570
File downloaded by Somadeva Vasudeva and shared with Michael Slouber.

Following a discussion on the INDOLOGY list, I retrieved the e-text from Michael Slouber's websitesite http://garudam.info/files/Saduktikar%E1%B9%87%C4%81m%E1%B9%9Bta_all.txt and converted the file to SARIT encoding, and added a TEI header, based partly on my own copy of the printed text.

lg.l: prajñāṃ kām api sampadaṃ ca kurute yatpādasaṃvāhanaṃ
svānte naḥ sa vasatv anāratam anākhyeyasvarūpo hariḥ ||1||
śauryāṇīva tapāṃsi bibhrati bhayaṃ yasmin na yasyāvadhir
jñāne dāna iva dviṣām iva jayo yenendriyāṇāṃ kṛtaḥ |
samrājām iva yoginām api gurur yaś ca kṣamāmaṇḍale
sa śrīlalakṣmaṇasena ekanṛpatir muktaś ca jīvann abhūt ||1||
tāpaṃ santamasaṃ harann aharahaḥ kīrtiṃ dadhat kaumudīṃ
śrīmān śrīdharadāsa ity adhiguṇādhāraḥ sa tasmād abhūd
lakṣmīr vedavidāṃ gṛheṣu guṇitā goṣṭhīṣu vidyāvatāṃ
pratyekaṃ viṣayeṣu pañcakamitaiḥ ślokaiḥ kavīnām idaṃ
majjantaḥ pariśīlayantu rasikāḥ pañca pravāhān iha ||4||
nṛtyaṃ haraprasādanam atha gaurī pariṇayasthagaurī ca |
śṛṅgārī ca nṛsiṃho vāmanamūrtis trivikramo bhṛgujaḥ ||5||
praśnottaraṃ ca veṇudhvananaṃ gītaṃ bhujaś ca giridharaṇam |
utkaṇṭhā gopavadhūsandeśo harir amuṣya bhaktiś ca ||7||
śambhoḥ sākṣāt sakhaikaḥ surapatiparo dharmarājas tathānyaḥ
prāṇā viśvasya kasya prathamataramataḥ ko’nu sambhāṣaṇīyaḥ |
kāryāyātān viditvā muhur iti caturo lokapālāṃś caturbhir
vaktrair ābhāṣamāṇaḥ samam uditaravaḥ pātu padmodbhavo vaḥ ||1||
nābhīpaṅkajam astratāṃ gamayituṃ jāne prayatne śriyaḥ |
ekaṃ stauti mukhaṃ śivām itarad apy ārtaṃ varān yācate
daityau praty aparaṃ vitarjati haraty anyac chriyaḥ sambhramam ||3||
yan na kṣuṇṇaṃ kadācit tuhinakaṇacayasyandibhiś candrapādair
ādyādhītau vidhātur mukhaśaśivisṛtāḥ pāntu vo dantabhāsaḥ ||4||
sa brahmādiṣu kathyatām iti muhur bālyād guhe jalpati |
devaḥ somarasāyanaṃ vijayate viśvasya bījaṃ raviḥ ||10||
śeṣaḥ so’py agamad yadaṅgadapadaṃ tasmai namaḥ śambhave ||13||
yam īśānaṃ jyotirmayam ayam upāste munijanaḥ |
śilpaṃ trīṇi jaganti yasya kavitā yasya trivedī guror
yaś cakre tripuravyayaṃ tripathagā yanmūrdhni mālyāyate |
trīn kālān iva vīkṣituṃ vahati yo visphūrjadakṣṇāṃ trayaṃ
nityāparṇo’pi tāpatritayam apanayan sthāṇur avyād apūrvaḥ |
pāthobhir labdhasekaḥ phalati phalaśataṃ vāñchitaṃ bhaktibhājām ||17||
kāmaṃ mā kāmayadhvaṃ vṛṣam api ca bhṛśaṃ mādriyadhvaṃ na vitte
cittaṃ datta śrayadhvaṃ param amṛtaphalā yā kalā tām ihaikām |
itthaṃ devaḥ smarārir vṛṣam adharacarīkṛtya mūrtyaiva ditsan
viśvaṃ śaśvad vitanvan vitaratu bhavataḥ sampadaṃ candramauliḥ ||19||
pīyūṣeṇa viṣeṇa tulyam aśanaṃ svarge śmaśāne sthitir
aiśvaryeṇa ca bhikṣayā ca gamayan kālaṃ samaḥ sarvato
devaḥ svātmani kautukī haratu vaḥ saṃsārapāśaṃ haraḥ ||20||
vedānteṣu yam āhur ekapuruṣaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ rodasī
yasminn īśvara ity ananyaviṣayaḥ śabdo yathārthākṣaraḥ |
vātān apy upasaṃharann avatu vaḥ kalpāntaśāntau śivaḥ ||22||
kvāpy agniḥ kvacid adribhūr naraśiraḥkīrṇā kvacin nimnagā
rūkṣā kvāpi jaṭā kvacid viṣadharā raudraṃ viṣaṃ kutracit |
saṃsāraṃ pratimucya yātur apunaryogāya panthāḥ śivaḥ ||23||
nirmātā jagadartham eva vacasāṃ vācaṃ yamo yaḥ svayaṃ
yogīndro’stu sadāśivaḥ sa bhavatāṃ bhūtyai parārthavratī ||24||
evaṃ sthāpaya subhru bāhulatikām evaṃ kuru sthānakaṃ
nātyuccair nama kuñcitāgracaraṇaṃ māṃ paśya tāvat kṣaṇam |
tasyā nāma mayā kathaṃ katham api bhrāntyā samuccāritaṃ
jānāsy eva mamāśayaṃ tava kṛte gauri prasannā bhava |
kṣāntiḥ svīkriyatāṃ dayāvati mayi krodhaḥ parityajyatā
mityevaṃ bahu jalpataḥ smararipoḥ premāñjaliḥ pātu vaḥ ||27||
nidrām eti phaṇīśvaraḥ suradhunī ruddhā jaṭāvallibhiḥ |
śrutiḥ saktā mugdhe vacasi vadanendau nipatitā
bhūyas tvaṃ punar apy ahaṃ yadi tadā candraḥ kṣitiṃ yāsyati |
kasmāt pārvati niṣṭhurāsi sahaja śailīdbhavānām idaṃ
niḥsnehāsi kuto na bhasmaparuṣaḥ snehaṃ kvacin nindati |
kopas te mayi niṣphalaḥ priyatame sthāṇau phalaṃ kiṃ bhaved
itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā śambhuḥ śivāyās tu vaḥ ||31||
kiṃ gauri māṃ prati ruṣā nanu gauḥ kim asmi
jānāmi satyam aunāmanata eva sa tvam
keyaṃ mūrdhny andhakāre timiram iha kutaḥ subhru kāntenduyukte
kāntāpy atraiva kāmin nanu jalam umayā pṛṣṭam etāvad eva |
nāhaṃ dvandvaṃ karomi vyapanaya śirasas tūrṇam enām idānīm
evaṃ proktaṃ bhavān yā prativacanajaḍaḥ pātu vo manmathāriḥ ||33||
eṣā te hara kā sugātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kiṃ jaṭā
haṃsaḥ kiṃ bhajate jaṭāṃ na hi śaśī candro jalaṃ sevate |
mugdhe bhūtir iyaṃ kuto’tra salilaṃ bhūtis taraṅgāyate
itthaṃ yo vinigūhate tripathagāṃ pāyān sa vaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ ||34||
dhanyā keyaṃ sthitā te śirasi śaśikalā kiṃ nu nāmaitad asyā
nāmaivāsyās tad etat paricitam api te vismṛtaṃ kasya hetoḥ |
nārīṃ pṛcchāmi nenduṃ kathayatu vijayā na pramāṇaṃ yadīndur
devyā nihnotum icchor iti surasaritaṃ śāṭhyam avyād vibhor vaḥ ||35||
pāṇau kaṅkaṇam utphaṇaḥ phaṇipatir netraṃ jvalatpāvakaṃ
mātar brūhi kim etad añjalipuṭe tātena gopāyitaṃ
vatsa svāduphalaṃ prayacchati na me gatvā gṛhāṇa svayam |
mātraivaṃ prahite guhe vighaṭayaty ākṛṣya sandhyāñjaliṃ
bhṛṅgī kas tava carcike guha na ko’py ākāra ekas tu nau
satyaṃ bhṛṅgariṭe susatyam anṛtaṃ lokaṃ tu moṭir vadet |
nagnaṃ pṛcchatam astu vāṃ pariṇayaikātmatvam ity udbhaṭa
stāv utsṛjya saparṣadaḥ paśupater hāsyodgamaḥ pātu vaḥ ||40||
bhūteśasya prabhūtādbhutam avatu śiraḥ śreyasāṃ santatiṃ vaḥ ||43||
prāvṛṭkāla ivoditaḥ śivaśiromeghaḥ śivāyās tu vaḥ ||44||
majjati punar unmajjati candrakalā yatra śapharīva ||47||
bahvau lājanibhā dṛśor maṇinibhā bhogotkare bhoginaḥ |
smarārer yo mūrdhni jvalanakapiśe bhāti nihitaḥ |
śambhor indukalā śivaṃ viśatu vo yasyāḥ praticchāyikāṃ
cyutām indor lekhāṃ ratikalahabhagnaṃ ca valayaṃ
avocad yaṃ paśyedty avatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā
kvacid uragāḥ kvacid aindavī ca lekhā |
sāroheva jaṭāṭavī phalatu vaḥ śreyo bhavānīpateḥ |
śāntyai vo’stu kapāladāma jagatāṃ patur yadīyāṃ lipiṃ
kvāpi kvāpi gaṇāḥ paṭhanti padaśo nātiprasiddhākṣaram |
viśvaṃ srakṣyati vakṣyati kṣitim apām īśiṣyate śiṣyate
nāgān rāgiṣu raṃsyate syati jagan nirvekṣyati dyām iti ||61||
kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ stutim abhidhatas tāṇḍavāḍambareṣu ||64||
pāyād vaḥ sa śirāṃsi tāṇḍavavidhau yan mūrdhni khinnoraga
ṛksāme katicit paṭhanti katicin majjanti gaṅgājale
svātmānaṃ katicin mananti katicin netrānale juhvati ||65||
udyanti tripurāntakṛnti nayanād arcīṃṣi puṣyantu vaḥ ||66||
kalpānte juhvato yat tribhuvanasamidhaṃ vedhasaḥ puṇyavahnir
bibhrāṇaṃ babhrukāntiṃ trinayananayanajyotir astu śriye vaḥ ||67||
ānandastimitāḥ samādhiṣu mukhe gaur yā vilāsālasāḥ
sambhrāntāḥ kṣaṇam adbhutāḥ kṣaṇam atha smerā nije vaikṛte |
pakṣmālīpiṅgalimnaḥ kaṇa iva taḍitāṃ yasya kṛtsnaḥ samūho
tārtīyokaṃ purārer tad avatu madanaplīṣaṇaṃ locanaṃ vaḥ ||69||
ekaṃ yoganiyojanān mukulitaṃ cakṣur dvitīyaṃ punaḥ
śambhor bhinnarasaṃ samādhisamaye netratrayaṃ pātu vaḥ ||70||
bhūyād vaś candramauler mayanagarabhidaḥ sauṣṭhavaṃ maṅgalāya ||72||
dṛṣṭaḥ saprema devyā kim idam iti bhayāt sambhramāc cāsurībhiḥ
sānandaṃ devatābhir mayapuradahane dhūrjaṭiḥ pātu yuṣmān ||75||
gṛhṇan keśeṣv apāstaś caraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa |
kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ ||76||
vyājād avakīrya puṣpāñjalim upari padaṃ nyasyato mandirāṇām |
cāpaṃ muṣṭir bhavānyāḥ sarasijamukulaśrīḥ kathaṃ vā vidhatte
pratyālīḍhaṃ kathaṃ vā racayatu maṇiman nūpuro vāmapādaḥ |
itthaṃ yāvad vitarkaṃ vidadhati vibudhās tāvad agre ya āsīd
vāṇāgniḥ pluṣṭadaityo mayapuramathane dhūrjaṭeḥ so’vatād naḥ ||80||
vahan bibhrāṇo vā suhṛdapasuhṛd vā jalaruhām |
dadad gṛhṇāno vā havir iti muhur yasya vibudhāḥ
stuvanty aṣṭau mūrtīḥ sa jagad avatād andhakaripuḥ ||81||
dikkālātmasamaiva yasya vibhutā yas tatra vidyotate
yatrāmuṣya sudhībhavanti kiraṇā rāśeḥ sa yāsām abhūt |
yas tatpittam uṣaḥsu yo’sya vidhaye yas tasya jīvātave
voḍhā yad gaṇam eṣa manmatharipos tāḥ pāntu vo mūrtayaḥ ||82||
mauliṃ nenokti bhālaṃ tilakayati tanor aṅgarāgaṃ vidhatte
dhammillaṃ sandadhāti prathayati śirasi vyaktam uttaṃsalakṣmīm |
samprīṇīte bhujaṅgān apanayati rasaṃ vetti saṃmodamudrāṃ
yābhiḥ śṛṅgārabandhas tanubhir iva śivas tābhir astu śriye vaḥ ||83||
yām āyamya yadātmakāni nayanāny āmīlya yāṃ dhyāyati |
yāṃ ca syandanatāṃ nināya sahitas tābhiḥ svayaṃ mūrtibhir
yā sṛṣṭiḥ sraṣṭur ādyā vahati vidhihutaṃ yā havir yā ca hotrī
ye dve kālaṃ vidhattaḥ śrutiviṣyaguṇā yā sthitā vyāpya viśvam |
yām āhuḥ sarvabījaprakṛtir iti yayā prāṇinaḥ prāṇavantaḥ
pratyakṣābhiḥ prapannas tanubhir avatu vas tābhir aṣṭābhir īśaḥ ||85||
vaikuṇṭhasya karaṅkam aṅkanihitaṃ sraṣṭuḥ kapālaṃ kare
pratyaṅgaṃ ca vibhūṣaṇaṃ viracitaṃ nākaukasāṃ kīkasaiḥ |
bhasma sthāvarajaṅgamasya jagataḥ śubhraṃ tanau bibhrataḥ
ekāmbhodhīkṛtāyāṃ bhuvi jagad akhilaṃ nirjanīkṛtya khelan
sadyo daṃṣṭrāṃśubhinne tamasi nijavapurbimbam ālokya kas tvaṃ
kas tvaṃ brūhīti kopād abhidadhad abhayaṃ bhairavaś ceṣṭatāṃ vaḥ ||89||
karṣan dhīvaratāṃ gato’sya tu mahāmohaṃ mahābhairavaḥ ||90||
ārdrāṃ kaṇṭhe mukhābjasrajam avanamayaty ambikā jānulambāṃ
kālaḥ kṛttiṃ nibadhnāty upanayati kare kālarātriḥ kapālaṃ
śambhor nṛtyāvatāre pariṣad iti pṛthag vyāpṛtā vaḥ punātu ||91||
bho bho dikpatayaḥ prayāta parataḥ khaṃ muñcatāmbhomucaḥ
pātālaṃ vraja medini praviśata kṣoṇītalaṃ kṣmābhṛtaḥ |
brahmann unnaya dūram ātmasadanaṃ devasya no nṛtyataḥ
śambhoḥ saṃkaṭam etad ity avatu vaḥ protsāraṇā nandinaḥ ||93||
asthīny asthīny ajinam ajinaṃ bhasma bhasmendur indur
gaṅgā gaṅgoraga uraga ity ākulāḥ sambhrameṇa |
kṣoṇi kṣobhaṃ kṣamasva tvam api kuru mahākūrma karma svakīyaṃ
brahmann udgaccha dūraṃ kuruta jaladhayaḥ sthairyam ity aṣṭamūrter
bhartur nṛtyāvatāre sarabhasagaditāḥ pāntu vo nandivācaḥ ||95||
trailokyaiśvaryakāri dyatu tava duritaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ candramauleḥ ||97||
uttānāḥ kati vellitāḥ kati rayād ābhugnamadhyāḥ kati
bhrāntau kevalam agnihāsagaralair lekhātrayaṃ pātu vaḥ ||98||
yeṣām ucchalatāṃ javena jhagiti vyūheṣu bhūmībhṛtām
uḍḍīneṣu viḍaujasā punar asau dambholir ālokitaḥ ||100||
krīḍākārmaṇam adrijācaraṇayos te reṇavaḥ pāntu vaḥ ||106||
devyāḥ sthāṇau caraṇapatite te nakhāḥ pāntu viśvam ||107||
kāṃ tapasvī gato’vasthām iti smerāv iva stanau |
kaṇṭhasthāya viṣāya vīryamahataḥ pāṇau maṇīn bibhratī |
rakṣatv adrisutā vivāhasamaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ ||111||
vṛddhastrīvacanāt priye vinihitaḥ puṣpāñjaliḥ pātu vaḥ ||112||
brahmāyaṃ viṣṇur eṣa tridaśapatir asau lokapālās tathaite
jāmātā ko’tra yo’sau bhujagaparivṛto bhasmarūkṣaḥ kapālī |
devībhiḥ śocyamānāpy upacitapulakā śreyase vo’stu gaurī ||113||
paśyantī varam utsukā natamukhī bhūyo hriyā brahmaṇaḥ |
sparśād utpulakā karagrahavidhau gaurī śivāyāstu vaḥ ||114||
viśliṣyan kusumāñjalir girijayā kṣipto’ntare pātu vaḥ ||115||
svedas te katham īdṛśaḥ priyatame tvannetravahner vibho
kasmāt kampitam etad induvadane bhogīndrabhīter bhava |
romāñcaḥ katham eṣa devi bhagavan gaṅgāmbhasāṃ śīkara
itthaṃ bhartari bhāvagopanaparā gaurī ciraṃ pātu vaḥ ||116||
śambho satyam idaṃ payodhimathane lakṣmyā vṛte keśave
vailakṣyāt kila kākakūṭam aśitaṃ pītaṃ viṣaṃ yat tvayā |
satyaṃ pārvati nāsti naḥ subhagatā sākṣī tathā ca smaro
deveneti kṛtasmṛtiḥ smitamukhī gaurī ciraṃ pātu vaḥ ||117||
śirasi kuṭilā sindhur doṣākaras tava bhūṣaṇaṃ
harasi na hara prāṇān eva na veda kathaṃ nv iti
dhatte carma hareṇa muktam api na dvaipaṃ bhayād ity asau
ḍamarur api bibharti devi tat tad
vidrāṇe rudravṛnde savitari tarale vajriṇi dhvastavajre
jātāśaṅke śaśāṅke viramati maruti tyaktavaire kubere |
vaikuṇṭhe kuṇṭhitās te mahiṣam atiruṣaṃ pauruṣopaghnivighnaṃ
nirvighnaṃ nighnatī vaḥ śamayatu duritaṃ bhūribhāvā bhavānī ||125||
yadvaktrākāśaśeṣo nabhasi na sulabho yadbhujānāṃ sahasraiḥ
preṅkhadbhiḥ kīryamāṇāsvanur api vidito nāvakāśo diśāsu |
pañca grāsā na yasyās tribhuvanam abhavat pūraṇārthaṃa samastaṃ
jayati tava kūṇitekṣaṇam aśnatyā daśanapeṣam asurāsthi |
dūre tāvad idaṃ mitho na sulabhaṃ jātaṃ mukhālokanam |
dhammillaṃ ca jaṭāṃ ca mauktikasaraṃ cāhiṃ ca ratnāni ca
brahmāsthīni ca kuṅkumaṃ ca nṛśiraś cūrṇottaraṃ bhasma ca |
kṣaumaṃ ca dvipacarma caikavapuṣā bibhraddiśann ekatāṃ
bhāvānām iva yogināṃ diśatu vaḥ śreyo’rdhanārīśvaraḥ ||135||
ardhaṃ dantacchadasya sphurati japavaśād ardham apy utprakopād
ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptum anyas tam eva |
ekaṃ dhyānān nimīlaty aparam avikasad vīkṣate netram itthaṃ
tulyān icchāvidhitsā tanur avatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvidhāne ||136||
devaḥ pātu jaganti kelikalahe tasyāḥ prasādāya yaḥ |
vyāhartuṃ praṇayocitaṃ namayituṃ mūrdhānam apy akṣamo
dhatte kevalam eva vāmacaraṇāmbhoje karaṃ dakṣiṇam ||138||
miśrībhūtāṃ tava tanulatāṃ bibhrato gauri kāmaṃ
nāhaṃ soḍhuṃ samarthā śirasi suranadīṃ nāpi saṃdhyāṃ praṇantum |
ity uktvā kopabiddhāṃ vighaṭayitum umām ātmadehaṃ pravṛttāṃ
rundhānaḥ pātu śambhoḥ kucakalasahaṭhasparśakṛṣṭo bhujo vaḥ ||140||
svecchāramyaṃ luṭhitvā pitur urasi ciraṃ bhasmadhūlīcitāṅgo
kampī pāyād apāyāj jvalitaśikhiśikhe cakṣuṣi nyastahastaḥ ||146||
vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśavakalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam ||147||
suptaṃ pakṣapuṭe nilīnaśirasaṃ sṛṣṭvā mayūraṃ puraḥ
kṛttaṃ kena śiro’sya tāta katham ity ākrandataḥ śaiśavāt |
pāyād vaḥ pitur aṅkabhāk śiśujanakrīḍonmukhaḥ ṣaṇmukhaḥ ||149||
kṛtvā saṃbhugnakoṭidvayam atha visinīkandam indoḥ pradeśe |
mātuś citrāṃśukena tvacam ucitapade pauṇḍarīkīṃ vidhāya
krīḍārudrāyamāṇo jagad avatu guho vīkṣyamāṇaḥ pitṛbhyām ||150||
digvāsā yadi tat kim asya dhanuṣā sāstrasya kiṃ bhasmanā
bhasmāthāsya kim aṅganā yadi ca sā kāmaṃ paridveṣṭi kim |
kasmāt tvaṃ tāta gehād aparam abhinavā brūhi kā tatra vārtā
ity evaṃ barhināthe kathayati sahasā bhartṛbhikṣā vibhūṣā
vaiguṇyodvegajanmā jagad avatu ciraṃ hāravo bhṛṅgirīṭeḥ ||152||
carceyaṃ kṣudhitā sadaiva gṛhiṇī putro’py ayaṃ ṣaṇmukho
ity evaṃ svakuṭumbam ekavṛṣabho devaḥ kathaṃ pokṣatīty
ālokyeva viśuṣkapañjaratanur bhṛṅgī ciraṃ pātu vaḥ ||153||
bhikṣābhojini kṛttivāsasi vasuprāptiḥ kutaḥ syād iti
prāg ardhaṃ vapuṣaḥ svayaṃ vyasanino yasyāharat pārvatī |
tasyārdhaṃ kupitā haṭhād yadi haren mūrdhni sthitā jāhnavī
hā nātha kva tadeti duḥsthahṛdayo bhṛṅgī bhṛśaṃ śuṣyati ||154||
sevāṃ no kurute karoti na kṛṣiṃ vāṇijyam asyāsti no
paitryaṃ nāsti dhanaṃ na bāndhavabalaṃ naivāsti kaścid gaṇaḥ |
dyūtastrīvyasanaṃ na muñcati tathāpīśas tad asmāt phalaṃ
kiṃ me syād iti cintayann iva kṛśo bhṅgī ciraṃ pātu vaḥ ||155||
sthūlo dūramayaṃ na yāsyati kṛśo naiṣa prayāṇakṣamas
tenaikasya mamaiva tatra kaśipuprāptiḥ paraṃ dṛśyate |
carcāyāḥ katham eva rakṣati sadā sadyo nṛmuṇḍasrajaṃ
caṇḍīkeśariṇo vṛṣaṃ ca bhujagān sūnor mayūrād api |
ity antaḥparibhāvayan bhagavato dīrghaṃ dhiyaḥ kauśalaṃ
devī sūnum asūta nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatety udbhuje
śṛṅgaṃ bhṛṅgin vimuñca tyaja gajavadana tvaṃ ca lāṅgūlamūlaṃ
mandānando’si nandinn alam abala mahākāla kaṇṭhagraheṇa |
ity uktvā nīyamānaḥ sukhayatu vṛṣabhaḥ pārvatīpādamūle
paśyann akṣair vilakṣaṃ valitagalacalatkambalaṃ tryambakaṃ vaḥ ||159||
smartṬṇāṃ śivakṛt tathāpi jagati jyeṣṭho’smadīyaḥ prabhur
dhatte dhāma ca dāma ca smitalasatkundendranīlaśriyoḥ |
yo gaṅgāṃ ca dadhe’ndhakakṣayakaro yo barhipatrapriyaḥ |
yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
syād eva truṭitaṃ parasparaguṇasyūtaṃ na ced antarā ||166||
tad avatu vapur ekaṃ kāmakaṃsadviṣor vaḥ |
na viramati bhavānyāḥ sārdham abdher duhitrā
dehārdhena samasyamānam asamaṃ śvaḥśreyasāyās tu vaḥ |
sānandaṃ munibhiḥ sanirvṛti surair ekatra sevāsukhāt |
pāyād vo bhagavāṃś carācaragurur dehārdhahārī haraḥ ||170||
brāhmaṃ tejo dvijānāṃ jvalayati jaḍimaprakramaṃ hanti buddher
vṛddhiṃ sekena sadyaḥ śamayati valino duṣkṛtānokahasya |
ūrdhvaṃ caivātra lokād api nayatitarāṃ janmino magnamūrtīṃs
tīrthāṭanaiḥ kim adhikaṃ kṣaṇam īkṣitā cet
pītaṃ tvadambu yadi devi mudhā sudhāpi |
snātaṃ yadi tvayi viriñcipadaṃ na dūre
muktiḥ kare yadi ca sā samupāsitāsi ||173||
taptaṃ yan na tapo hutaṃ ca na havir yaj jātavedo mukhe
dattaṃ yac ca na kiṃcid eva na kṛto yat tīrthayātrādaraḥ |
kākeneva śuneva kevalam ayaṃ yat pūritaḥ pudgalo
mātas tvāṃ parirabhya jāhnavi sa me śānto’yam antarjvaraḥ ||175||
tvannāma smaratas tadarpitadṛśaḥ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti me ||176||
śatrau me suhṛdīva kāpy upakṛtir bhūyād asūyā na tu
svācchyaṃ satsu matir janeṣu karuṇā hīnā na dīnātmasu |
devi śraddadhatāṃ gatis tvayi mudā mandā na mandākini ||177||
athotpatsye bhūyas trijagad adhirājo’pi na tadā
śvapākaḥ kāko vā bhagavati bhaveyaṃ tava taṭe ||178||
kuṭīre tīre vā savanam anu manvādikathitaiḥ |
yamād ujjhan bhītiṃ bhagavati bhaveyaṃ pramuditaḥ ||179||
nidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛter bhagavataḥ śvāsānilāḥ pāntu vaḥ |
līnānidrālur abdheḥ kṣubhitam agaṇayann adbhutaḥ kūrmarājaḥ |
pārśvāsphālātivegāj jhagiti ca virahād ucchaladbhiḥ patadbhir
bhūyo bhūyaḥ samudrair mihiramatirayād āpibadbhir vamadbhiḥ |
koṭīras toyadānāṃ kṣaṇam iva gagane darśayan vaḥ punītād
daṃṣṭrāpiṣṭeṣu sadyaḥ śikhariṣu na kṛtaḥ skandhakaṇḍūvinodaḥ
yenoddhāre dharitryāḥ sa jayati vibhutābṛṃhiteccho varāhaḥ ||191||
bhittvorvīm abhiniḥsṛtā madhuripor daṃṣṭrā ciraṃ pātu vaḥ ||193||
romāgraprotatārānikara iti surair dhīram ālokito vaḥ |
āvir naktaṃ dinaśrīḥ sa diśatu duritadhvaṃsam ādyo varāhaḥ ||194||
yaḥ śālūkam ivoddadhāra dharaṇībimbaṃ punītād asau
dhagaddhag iti medasi sphuṭataro’sthiṣu ṣṭhād iti |
cakra brūhi vibho gade jaya hare kambo samājñāpaya
bho bho nandaka jīva pannagaripo kiṃ nātha bhinno mayā |
ko daityaḥ katamo hiraṇyakaśipuḥ satyaṃ bhavadbhyaḥ śape
kenāstreṇa nakhair iti pravadataḥ śaurer giraḥ pāntu vaḥ ||199||
kiṃ kiṃ siṃhas tataḥ kiṃ narasadṛśavapur deva citraṃ gṛhīto
naivaṃ dhik ko’tra jīva drutam upanaya taṃ so’pi samprāpta eva |
cāpaṃ cāpaṃ na khaḍgaṃ jhaṭiti hahahahā karkaśatvaṃ nakhānām
ity evaṃ daityarājaṃ nijanakhakuliśair jaghnivān so’vatād vaḥ ||200||
devasya śriyam aṅkasīmni dadhato viśrāntaraudraṃ vapuḥ ||207||
idaṃ prāyo loke na paricitapūrvaṃ nayanayor
na yācñā yat puṃsaḥ suguṇaparimāṇaṃ laghayati |
trapālīnair aṅgair yad ayam abhavad vāmanatanuḥ ||211||
apasara pṛthivi samudrāḥ saṃvṛṇutāmbūni bhūbhṛto namata |
kutas tvam aṇukaḥ svataḥ svam iti kiṃ na yat kasyacit
kim icchasi padatrayaṃ nanu bhuvā kim ity alpayā |
dvijasya śamino mama tribhuvanaṃ tad ity āśayo
harer jayati nihnutaḥ prakaṭitaś ca vakroktibhiḥ ||213||
pūjyo brahmavidāṃ tvam eva vimalajñānaikapātraṃ bhavān
madbhāgyena gato’tithitvam adhunā kiṃ te tribhir bhūpadaiḥ |
trailokyaṃ bhavataṃ svam ity upagato daityeśvareṇādarāj
balir eṣa sa yenāsya bhikṣāpātrīkṛtaḥ karaḥ ||215||
kiṃ chatraṃ kiṃ nu ratnaṃ tilakam atha tathā kuṇḍalaṃ kaustubho vā
cakraṃ vā vārijaṃ vety amarayuvatibhir yad balidhvaṃsi dehe |
ūrdhvaṃ maulau lalāṭe śravasi hṛdi kare nābhideśe ca dṛṣṭaṃ
pāyāt tad vo’rkabimbaṃ sa ca danujaripur vardhamānaḥ krameṇa ||216||
śreyas trivikramas te vitaratu vibudhadveṣiṇāṃ kāladaṇḍaḥ ||217||
pātu tvāṃ caraṇo hareḥ kramavidhau yasyādhikaṃ dyotate
yat kāṇḍaṃ gaganadrumasya yad api kṣoṇītaḍāgodare
tad viṣṇoḥ padam antarālajaladher ādhārato bhūtalāt
pāraṃ dyāmupagantum udyamavatāṃ setūbhavat pātu vaḥ ||219||
siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kim aparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo
hā tāteti na jalpitaṃ na ruditaṃ na svīkṛtaṃ tad dhanaṃ
na snātaṃ na ca vīkṣitaḥ parijanaḥ pitre na dattaṃ jalam |
vryaṃ yantu girāṃ na tat pathi nanu vyaktaṃ hi tatkarmabhiḥ
satyaṃ brahmataponidher bhagavataḥ kiṃ kiṃ na lokottaram ||223||
mātrā vastuṣu teṣu teṣu viśadanyasteṣu dṛṣṭeḥ puraḥ |
yenāttaṃ dhanur īkṣitāś ca jhaṭiti kṣatrāvataṃsā diśaḥ ||224||
viśvasyāś ca bhuvaḥ kratau vitaritā śyāmakamuṣṭiṃpaco
rāmaḥ so’yam udagrageyamahimā kāsāṃ girāṃ gocaraḥ ||225||
kārāyām upavāsayan vijayate taṃ helayā haihayaḥ |
rāmaḥ kasya na vismayāya manaso niḥśaṅkalaṅkeśvara
niḥsandeham ayaṃ ca vikramanidhiḥ saumitrir asyānujaḥ |
vāraṃ vāram apāṅgabhāgacalitair yad dṛṣṭipātair iyaṃ
rāmo’sau bhuvaneṣu vikramaguṇair yātaḥ prasiddhiṃ parām
asmadbhāgyaviparyayād yadi punaḥ devo na jānāti tam |
sarasi virasaḥ prasthe duḥstho latāsu gatādaraḥ
dadad api dṛśau kubje kubje rudann upanirjharaṃ
manye manyubharair abhedi hṛdayaṃ gāḍhaṃ ghanānām api ||232||
girir aśanimayo’yaṃ yas tadā na dvidhābhūt
kṣitir api na vidīrṇā sāpi sarvaṃsahaiva ||233||
ko’haṃ vatsa sa ārya eva bhagavān āryaḥ sa ko rāghavaḥ
ke yūyaṃ bata nātha nātha kim idaṃ bhṛtyo’smi te lakṣmaṇaḥ |
kāntāre kim ihāsmahe bata vṛthā devyā gatir mṛgyate
kā devī janakādhirājatanayā hā jānaki kvāsi me ||234||
kūjan kuñje kim api karuṇaṃ kandare kāndiśīkaḥ
prasādaṃ revatyā janayitum anīśaḥ katham api |
madhūn mādāviṣṭaḥ sa kila balabhadro vijayate ||236||
pāyāsuḥ parimantharāṇi halino mattasya yātāni vaḥ ||237||
kṛkṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ hahahasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ |
madaskhalitam ālapan haladharaḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt ||238||
vahan halī madakṣīvaḥ pānagoṣṭhyāṃ punātu vaḥ ||239||
prabhavati na me gātraṃ kiñcit kriyāsu vidhūrṇate |
trijagad avatāj jalpann evaṃ halī madavihvalaḥ ||240||
kāmakrodhau dvayam api yadi pratyanīkaṃ prasiddhaṃ
hatvānaṅgaṃ kim iva hi ruṣā sādhitaṃ tryambakena |
yas tu kṣāntyā śamayati śataṃ manmathādīnarātīn
kalyāṇaṃ vo diśatu sa munigrāmaṇīr arkabandhuḥ ||241||
sa sārvaḥ sarvajñaḥ pathi nirapavāde kṛtapado
kalkaṃ sa te haratu kalkikule bhaviṣyan ||246||
śraddhā vāg viṣavarṣaṇaṃ ca śiraso doṣā ime yair janaḥ |
mūḍho laṅghitasatpatho’yam iti saṃkruddhaḥ śaṭhānāṃ haṭhād yaḥ
śīrṣāṇi kṛpāṇapāṇir alunāt tasmai namaḥ kalkine ||249||
tīrthānāṃ śatam asti kintu phalati śraddhābharādity aser
dhārātīrhtam apūrvam eva kalayan kalkī śivāyāstu vaḥ |
satyaṃ kṛṣṇa ka evam āha musalī mithyāmba paśyānanam |
vyādehīti vidārite śiśumukhe dṛṣṭvā samastaṃ jagan
mātā yasya jagāma vismayapadaṃ pāyāt sa vaḥ keśava ||251||
kasmiṃścit kṣubhitaḥ kuto’pi calitaḥ kutrāpi romāñcitaḥ
kvāpi prasphuritaḥ kuto’pi hasitaḥ prāpto hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||252||
adharamadhure kaṇṭhaṃ kaṇṭhe sacāṭu dṛśau dṛśor
śiśur iti rudan kṛṣṇo vakṣaḥsthale nihitaś cirān
gopībhiḥ purataḥ punātu jagatīm uttānasupto hariḥ ||255||
hiṃsrān vīkṣya puraḥ purāṇapuruṣaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ dhyāsyasi |
ity uktasya yaśodayā murāripor avyāj jaganti sphurad
śyāmoccandrā svapiti na śiśo naiti mām amba nidrā
nidrāhetoḥ śṛṇu kathāṃ kām apūrvāṃ kuruṣva |
vyaktaḥ stambhān naraharir abhūd dānavaṃ dārayiṣyann
mā dūraṃ vraja vatsa tiṣṭhati puras te lūnakarṇo vṛkaḥ
kālindīpuline mayā na na mayā śīlopaśalye na na
nyagrodhasya tale mayā na na mayā rādhāpituḥ prāṅgane |
dṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa itīrite saniyamaṃ gopair yaśodāpater
vismerasya puro hasan nijagṛhān niryan hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||259||
manthānam ujjha mathituṃ dadhi na kṣamas tvaṃ
śambho svāgatam āsyatām ita ito vāmena padmodbhava
krauñcāre kuśalaṃ sukhaṃ surapate vitteśa no dṛśyate |
itthaṃ svapnagatasya kaiṭabharipoḥ śrutvā jananyā giraḥ
kiṃ kiṃ bālaka jalpasīty anucitaṃ thūthūtkṛtaṃ pātu vaḥ ||261||
dhīrā dharitri bhāva bhāram avehi śāntaṃ
ete lakṣmaṇa jānakīvirahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā
marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayanty alam amī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ |
serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa vaḥ sukhayatu svapnāyamāno hariḥ ||263||
huṃ huṃ vatsa dhanur dhanur iti vyagrā giraḥ pāntu vaḥ ||264||
kenālīkam idaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe mudhā tāmyasi |
itthaṃ svapnaparamparāsu śayane śrutvā giraṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ
savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭhagrahaḥ pātu vaḥ ||265||
vatsa tvaṃ navayauvano’si capalāḥ prāyeṇa gopastriyaḥ
tat tat tāsu manogataṃ sunibhṛtaṃ saṃvyācikīrṣor hareḥ |
pratyañco valitā bhavantu bhavatāṃ kṛtyāya vāgūrmayaḥ ||269||
āhūtādya mayotsave niśi gṛhaṃ śūnyaṃ vimucyāgatā
kṣīvaḥ preṣyajanaḥ kathaṃ kulavadhūr ekākinī yāsyati |
vatsa tvaṃ tad imāṃ nayālayam iti śrutvā yaśodāgiro
iti nigadati vṛnde yoṣitāṃ pāntu yuṣmān
kṛṣṇa tvadvanamālayā saha kṛtaṃ kenāpi kuñjāntare
gopīkuntalabarhadāma tad idaṃ prāptaṃ mayā gṛhyatām |
vyālāḥ santi tamālavalliṣu vṛtaṃ vṛndāvanaṃ vānarair
rādhe tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ruṣṭāsi bhūmer yato
mātā tvaṃ jagatāṃ tvam eva jagatāṃ mātā na vijño’paraḥ |
devi tvaṃ parihāsakelikalahe’nantā tvam evety asau
smero vallavasundarīm avanamac chauriḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt ||276||
ko’yaṃ dvāri hariḥ prayāhy upavanaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇātra kiṃ
kṛṣṇo’haṃ dayite bibhemi sutarāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kathaṃ vānaraḥ |
mugdhe’haṃ madhusūdano vraja latāṃ tām eva puṣpānvitām
itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||277||
kas tvaṃ bho niśi keśavaḥ śirasijai :y kiṃ nāma garvāyase
bhadre śaurir ahaṃ guṇaiḥ pitṛgataiḥ putrasya kiṃ syād iha |
cakrī candramukhi prayacchasi na me kuṇḍīṃ ghaṭīṃ dohanīm
itthaṃ gopavadhūjitottaratayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||278||
vāsaḥ samprati keśava kva bhavato mugdhekṣaṇe nanv idaṃ
yāminyām uṣitaḥ kva dhūrta vitanur muṣṇāti kiṃ yāminī
śaurir gopavadhūṃ chalaiḥ parihasann evaṃvidhaiḥ pātu vaḥ ||279||
kuśalaṃ rādhe sukhito’si kaṃsa kaṃ sa kva nu sā rādhā |
kṛṣṇaḥ pātu sa yasya saṃsadi gavāṃ veṇupraṇādor mayo
nyastāmīlitadṛṣṭi gopavapuṣo viṣṇor mukhaṃ pātu vaḥ ||282||
saubhāgyaṃ vaḥ samantād dadhatu madhubhidaḥ keligopālamūrteḥ
sañjāte virahe kayāpi hṛdaye sandānite cintayā
kasyacit | (Dhv, Vak 2.59; etc.; padyā. 373 aparājitasya, u.nī. 14.188)
dhārāvāhikayā vahantu hṛdaye tāny eva tāny eva me ||290||
te vo maṅgalam ādiśantu satataṃ kaṃsadviṣo bāhavaḥ ||293||
ekenaiva cirāya kṛṣṇa bhavatā govardhano’yaṃ dhṛtaḥ
śrānto’si kṣaṇam āssva sāmpratam amī sarve vayaṃ dadhmahe |
nyañcacchailabharārdite viruvati smero hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||297||
dūrād astamahīdharasya tanutām āśaṅkya doṣṇo hareḥ |
rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane bandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ ||298||
dūraṃ dṛṣṭipathāt tirobhava harer govardhanaṃ vibhratas
tvayy āsaktadṛśaḥ kṛśodari karasrasto’sya mā bhūd ayam |
mugdhe nātha kim āttha tanvi śikhariprāgbhārabhugno bhujaḥ
sāhāyyaṃ priya kiṃ bhajāmi subhage dorvallim āyāsaya |
rādhāyāḥ kucayor jayanti calitāḥ kaṃsadviṣo dṛṣṭayaḥ ||300||
umāpatidharasya | (padyā. 371, u.nī. 14.184; Jīva and VCT to bha.ra.si. 2.4.178)
kāmaṃ kāmayate na kelinalinīṃ nāmodate kaumudī
nisyandair na samīhate mṛgadṛśām ālāpalīlām api |
aṅgais tāmyati cetasi vrajavadhūm ādhāya mugdho hariḥ ||303||
mā gotraskhalitād upaitu ca divā rādheti bhīror ati |
rātrāv asvapato divā ca vijane lakṣmīti cābhyasyato
rādhāṃ saṃsmarataḥ śriyaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ ||304||
te govardhanakandarāḥ sa yamunākacchaḥ sa ceṣṭāraso
bhāṇḍīraḥ sa vamaspatiḥ sahacarās te tac ca goṣṭhāṅganam |
kiṃ dvāravatībhujaṅga hṛdayaṃ nāyāti doṣair apīty
avyād vo hṛdi duḥsahaṃ vrajavadhūsandeśaśalyaṃ hareḥ ||306||
pāntha dvāravatīṃ prayāsi yadi he tad devakīnandano
upanaya masiṃ patraṃ cedaṃ likhāmi kim atra vā
tvam iti vinayabhraṃśo yūyaṃ tviti praṇayakṣatiḥ |
suhṛd iti mṛṣā nāthety ūnaṃ nṛpeti taṭasthatā
katham iti tataḥ sandeṣṭavyo mayā yadunandanaḥ ||308||
santāpaṃ na harantu nāma nitarāṃ kurvanti kasmāt punaḥ |
seyaṃ dyos tad idaṃ śaśāṅkadinakṛccihnaṃ nabhaḥ sā kṣitis
tatpātālatalaṃ ta eva girayas te’mbhodharās tā diśaḥ |
yasyāntaś ca bahiś ca dṛṣṭam akhilaṃ trailokyam avyāt sa vaḥ ||311||
lakṣmīṃ yat paricāriketi nayanaṃ yasyeti yāsāṃ patiṃ
īśaṃ yat tanubhāgabhāg iti janaḥ śuśrūṣate sādaraṃ
bhūyād viśvanamasyamānamahimā bhūtyai sa vaḥ keśavaḥ ||312||
bījaṃ brahmaiva devo madhujalanidhayaḥ karṇikā svarṇaśailaḥ
kando nāgādhirājo viyad api vipulaḥ patrakośāvakāśaḥ |
dvīpāḥ patrāṇi meghā madhupakulam abhūt tārakāgarbhadhūlir
yasyaitannābhipadmaṃ bhuvanam iti sa vaḥ śarma devo dadhātu ||314||
yaṃ lakṣmīr upajīvati sma bhajate yaṃ bhāratī sambhramā
detasmai kim u kīyatāṃ katham asāv asmādṛśaiḥ stūyatām |
sevyo vā katham eṣa yasya śirasā dhatte padārghyaṃ śiva
stasmāt kṛtyam ajānato mama manovṛtteḥ pramāṇaṃ hariḥ ||315||
nāsthā dharme na vasunicaye naiva kāmopabhoge
yad bhāvyaṃ tad bhavatu bhagavan pūrvakarmānurūpaṃ |
etat prārthyaṃ mama bahu mataṃ janmajanmāntare’pi
bhṛtyasya bhṛtya iti māṃ smara lokanātha ||318||
nāhaṃ vande tava caraṇayor dvandvam advandvahetoḥ
kumbhīpākaṃ gurum api hare nārakaṃ nāpanetuṃ |
śreyo’syāś ciram astu mandaragirer māghāni pāśrvair iya
ity ākūtajuṣaḥ śriyaṃ jalanidher ardhotthitāṃ paśyato
vācontaḥsphuritā bahir vikṛtibhir vyaktā hareḥ pātu vaḥ ||321||
grāvṇā nāsi gireḥ kṣatā na payasāpy ārtāsi na mlāpitā
niḥśvāsaiḥ phaṇino’si na tvaanugā nāyāsitā kāpi na |
svaṃ veśma pratigacchator ito muhuḥ śrīśārṅgiṇoḥ saspṛhaṃ
sā parśnottarayugmapaṃktir ubhayor atyāyatā pātu vaḥ ||324||
śūnye bāhugatāgatāni racayan nārāyaṇaḥ pātu vaḥ ||325||
sampūrṇaḥ punar abhyudeti kiraṇair indus tato dantinaḥ
kṣīrābdher mathane bhavaddiviṣadāṃ alakṣmīr asāv astu vaḥ ||326||
sākūtaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca samanohlādaṃ ca kaṃsadviṣā
kṣīrodotthitayā śriyā vinihitaṃ cakṣṇḍḥ śivāyāstu vaḥ ||331||
lagnāḥ kṛṣṇasya vaktrendau pāntu no dṛṣṭayaḥ ||332||
cid dṛkpātena virūḍhagūḍhahasitānando hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||333||
ākhyāte hasitaṃ pitāmaha iti trastaṃ kapālīti ca
vyāvṛttaṃ gurur ity asau dahana ity āviṣkṛtā bhīrutā |
paulomīpatir ity asūyitam atha vrīḍāvanamraṃ śriyā
pāyād vaḥ puruṣottamo’yam iti ca nyastaḥ sa puṣpāñjaliḥ ||334||
mugdhe muñca viṣādam atra balabhit kampo gurus tyajyatāṃ
sadbhāvaṃ bhaja puṇḍarīkanayane mānyān imān mānaya |
ity anyapratiṣedham ātmani vidhiṃ śṛṇvan hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||335||
śāntaṃ śete na śeṣaḥ sthagayati timiraṃ kaustubhīr nāpi bhāsaḥ
sāma brahmāpi gītvā mukulitanayano nidrayā dhyāyatīva |
lakṣmyā karṇe gaditvā mṛdukam iti harer vrīḍayā hāri hāsyaṃ
hasto hastena nīvīvasanavighaṭanād vārito vaḥ punātu ||336||
nābhīpadmarajo’ndha eva satataṃ vedhā mudhā lajjase
lakṣmīm ity avabodhayan nidhuvanārambhe hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||337||
ye nidrāṃ nāṭayadbhiḥ śayanaphaṇiphaṇair lakṣitā na śrutāś ca |
ye ca dhyānānubandhacchalamukuladṛśā vedhasā naiva dṛṣṭās
te lakṣmīṃ narmayanto nidhuvanavidhayaḥ pāntu vo mādhavasya ||338 ||
uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharam uragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā
dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakavarībhāram aṃśaṃ vahantyāḥ |
śayyām ālambya nītaṃ vapur alasalasadbāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu ||339 ||
vararuceḥ (sa.ka.ā. 2.33, V 165, Vs 1.3; su.ra. 125, Sv 79, śā.pa. 135)
vidvān akṣaranaṣṭdhīr iti śurcir dharmadhvajīti sthira
stabdhaḥ kruddha iti grahīti sudṛḍhaḥ kṣantā laghīyān iti |
gaṇyante guṇino’pi dūṣaṇapadaṃ tasyai namas te śriye ||342||
sauhārdaṃ vimanāḥ punātu bhavato lakṣmīḥ smarantī pituḥ |
kopas teja iti grahaḥ sthitir iti krīḍeti duśceṣṭatā
māyā ca vyavahārakauśalam iti svacchatvam ity ajñatā |
daurjanyaṃ sphuṭavāditeti dhaninām agre budhair yadvaśād
doṣo’pi vyapadiśyate guṇatayā tasyai namo’stu śriye ||346||
devi tvāmabhivādya kupyasi na cet tat kiṃcidācakṣmahe |
yat te mandiramambujanma kimidaṃ vidyāgṛhaṃ yacca te
asmān mā bhaja kālakūṭabhagini svapne’pi padmālaye
vyādhībhūya kadarthayanti bahuśo mātar vikārā ime |
yac cakṣur na nirīkṣatecchaviṣayaṃ naivaṃ śṛṇoti śrutiḥ
prāṇā eva varaṃ prayānti na punarniryānti vāco bahiḥ ||349||
ādityād api nityadīptam amṛtaprasyandi candrād api
trailokyābharaṇaṃ maṇer api tamaḥkāṣaṃ hutāśād api |
svāntānandanam astu dhāma jagatas toṣāya sārasvatam ||352||
nigūḍhaṃ kutrāpi kvacid api bahir vyaktamadhuraṃ
plavante bhūyāṃsaḥ katicid api majjanti nipuṇāḥ ||353||
kvacid iva ravir jāḍyacchedi kvacit pracurācira
dyutir iva camatkāri kvāpi kṣapākaravan mṛdu |
śikhivad anṛju kvāpi kvāpi pradīpavad ujjvalaṃ
vijayi kim api jyotiḥ sārasvataṃ tad upāsmahe ||354||
śyāmāyāḥ karajakṣataṃ ratipater jaitraṃ dhanur bandhakī
tad anu ca navasvarṇāmbhojaprabhaṃ śaśinas tata
aiśānam iva kapālaṃ sphuṭalakṣma sphurati śaśibimbam ||369||
saṃvītaṃ sukham adhyaśeta jagatī suvyaktam ālokyate ||370||
karpūraiḥ kim apūri kiṃ malayajair ālepi kiṃ pāradair
akṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kim aghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyor vapuḥ ||371||
janānandaś candro bhavatu na kathaṃ nāma sukṛtī
prayātovasthābhis tisṛbhir api yaḥ koṭim iyatīm |
bhruvor līlāṃ bālaḥ śiryam alikapaṭṭasya taruṇo
sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa jhagiti krodhād ivālohitaḥ |
vasukalpasya | (Mn 2.41, su.ra. 921, śā.pa. 3636, sā.da. under 7.4, Kp 237)
ye dhārāmbuviḍambinaḥ kṣaṇam atho ye tārahāraśriyas
kapāle mārjāraḥ paya iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ
ratānte talpasthān harati vanitāpy aṃśukam iti
prabhāmattaś candro jagad idam aho vihvalayati ||382||
pīyūṣaṃ madhu varṣatīr api tamobhṛṅgān nirākurvatīḥ |
velladbhir bhuvanaṃ vibhūṣitam idaṃ śītadyuter aṃśubhiḥ ||384||
pātavyā ca śaśinyamugdhavibhave sā vartate candrikā ||389||
tat kṣobhāj jalabudbudā iva bhavanty ālohitās tārakāḥ |
candraḥ kṣīram iva kṣaraty avirataṃ dhārāsahasrotkarair
udgrīvais tṛṣitair ivādya kumudair jyotsnāpayaḥ pīyate ||390||
aṅkaḥ śaṅkām ayam api hares tatra suptasya dhatte ||393||
yathāyaṃ bhāty aṃśūn diśi diśi kiran kundaviśadān
ya eṣa pratyūṣe raviśavaram ālokya purato
śaśinam asūta prācī nṛtyati madano hasanti kakubho’pi |
vṛddhiṃ vārdhiṣu nikṣipann udayate devas tamīkāmukaḥ ||409||
saṃraktaḥ paripaśyan vidhur ayam ayate prasādayitum ||410||
rdūrārūḍhe pramode hasitam iva parispaṣṭam āśāsakhībhiḥ ||411||
svairaṃ śītakaraḥ karaṃ kamalinīm āliṅgituṃ yojayan |
śītasparśam avāpya samprati tathā gupte mukhāmbhoruhe
prācīm añcati yāminīm anūnayaty āśāḥ samālambate
dyām āliṅgati sevate kumudinīṃ snigdho’timugdhaiḥ karaiḥ |
mindur vandyakaraḥ sa eṣa bhuvanānandaḥ parispandate ||414||
utpallava iva kiraṇaiḥ kusumita iva tārakābhir ayam induḥ |
marudbhir bhasmeva prasarati vikīrṇaṃ diśi diśi ||419||
savitur api ca prācīmūle milanti marīcayaḥ |
tamobhir dikkālair viyad iva vilaṅghya kva nu gataṃ
gatā drāṅmudrāpi kva nu kumudakoṣasya sarasaḥ |
kva dhairyaṃ tac cābdher viditam udayādreḥ parisara
sthalīmadhyāsīne śaśini jagad apy ākulam idam ||434||
majjann ambhasi puṣpadhūliṣu luṭhann ākampayan bhūruha
marun mandaṃ mandaṃ vicarati parivrājaka iva ||437||
cumbann ānanam āluṭhan stanataṭīm āndolayan kuntalaṃ
aṅgaṃ vihvalayan mano vikalayan mānaṃ samunmūlayan
nārīṇāṃ malayānilaḥ priya iva pratyaṅgam āliṅgati ||441||
cumbanto vānti mandaṃ malayaparimalā vāyavo dākṣiṇātyāḥ ||443||
ye dolākelikārāḥ kim api mṛgadṛśāṃ manyutantucchido ye
te kaṇṭhe loṭhayantaḥ parabhṛtavayasāṃ pañcamaṃ rāgarājaṃ
vaktraṃ cumbati vepathuṃ janayati prodghāṭayaty aṃśukaṃ
śītkāraṃ tanute tanīti pulakaṃ keśāntam ākarṣati ||448||
pītocchiṣṭās tad anu malaye bhogibhiś candanasthaiḥ |
yācyo na kaścana guruḥ pratimā ca kāntā
yenāsāv api bhasmanāñjitatanur devaḥ kapālī balāt
īśaḥ purām iti purāṃ tisṛṇāṃ vijetā
anena kila nirjitā vayam iti prayāyāḥ karaṃ
dhanur mālā maurvī kvaṇadalikulaṃ lakṣyam abalā
iyāṃ jetuṃ yasya tribhuvanam adehasya vibhavaḥ
sa vaḥ kāmaḥ kāmān diśatu dayitāpāṅgavasatiḥ ||470||
punaḥ prādurbhāvād anumitam idaṃ janmani purā
purāre na prāyaḥ kvacid api bhavantaṃ praṇatavān |
naman janmany asminn aham atanur agre’py anatibhāṅ
maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tad idam aparādhadvayam api ||471||
na jyotsnā na ca mālatī na dayitā no vallakīpañcama
stāmbūlaṃ na vilepanaṃ na ca rahaḥkelir na muktālatā |
no vā satkavisūktayo mama tathā hartuṃ kṣamante manaḥ
puṇyair unmilitā carācaraguror bhaktir yathā śūlinaḥ ||472||
vitrāsitasya jagato yadi devi na syāḥ |
sa ślāghyastanam upastunvanti vibudhās tenānvayaḥ pāvita
stasmai nāma namanti te’pi munayo mānyās tato bibhyati |
haste tasya jagattrayī kim aparaṃ tatrāmṛtaṃ līyate
iti śrīmahāmāṇḍalikaśrīdharadāsasaṃgṛhīte saduktikarṇāmṛte devatāpravāho nāma prathamaḥ pravāhaḥ |
mugdhā madhyā prauḍhā navapariṇītā ca saiva visrabdhā ||1||
vaidagdhyavatī kulaṭā lakṣitakulaṭā ca vāravanitā ca ||2||
citraṃ svapno yūnor abhilāṣas tānavaṃ guṇākhyānam |
śuśrūṣur antar atha bāhyam udāsta eva ||478||
valayati śanair bālā vakṣaḥsthale taralāṃ dṛśam ||479||
saṃmugdho madhubāndhavaḥ sa bhagavān adyāpi nidrālasaḥ ||480||
yat pratyaṅgaṃ sphuṭam anusaranty ūrmayo vibhramāṇāṃ
kṣobhaṃ dhatte yad api vipulaḥ snigdhalāvaṇyapaṅkaḥ |
unmagnaṃ yat sphurati ca manāk kumbhayor yugmam etat
bhruvoḥ kācil līlā pariṇatir apūrvā nayanayoḥ
vapur muñcad bālyaṃ kim api kamanīyaṃ mṛgadṛśaḥ ||483||
dhatte vakṣaḥ kucasacivatām advitīyaṃ ca vaktraṃ
kṛśaṃ madhyaṃ bhugnā balir alasitaḥ śroṇiphalakaḥ ||485||
na madhyo’yaṃ vedī na kucayugalaṃ kāñcanaghaṭau |
na kāñcī kiṃ cāyaṃ sphurati paritas toraṇaguṇaḥ
manuṣyāṇām ekaṃ tad idam asamaṃ jīvitaphalam |
prāptau tālaphaladvayaṃ tad abhavan niḥsandhi bhāvasthitam |
kāreṇa sphuṭam eva tatpariṇataṃ kvedaṃ vadāmodbhutam ||491||
dṛṣṭā kāñcanayaṣṭir adya nagaropānte bhramantī mayā
tasyām adbhutam ekapadmam aniśaṃ protphullam ālokitam |
tasyāgre paripuñjitena tamasā naktaṃ divaṃ sthīyate ||492||
ratnāny apy avalokitāni bahuśo yuktāni muktāphalaiḥ |
yat tu projjhitalāñchane himarucāv unnidram indīvaraṃ
saṃsaktaṃ ca mitho rathāṅgamithunaṃ tat kutra dṛṣṭaṃ punaḥ ||493||
kiṃ kopy eṣa manobhramaḥ kim athavā jāto dṛśāṃ mādṛśāṃ
doṣas taimirikaḥ kim eṣa sumahānutpātanāmā vidhiḥ |
vyāhārī divase ca vardhitarucir gehe śaśī pārvaṇaḥ ||495||
vāraṃ vāram anekadhā sakhi mayā cūtadrumāṇāṃ vane
tasminn adya punaḥ śrutipraṇayini pratyaṅgam utkampitaṃ
tāpaś cetasi netrayos taralatā kasmād akasmān mama ||496||
vavir eva malayamaruto jagur eva pikāḥ parāri ca paruc ca |
utkaṇṭhābharataralaṃ sakhi mānasam aiṣamaḥ kim idam ||497||
bālā kevalam eva roditi luṭhallolālakair aśrubhiḥ ||498||
dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā na viramayate pāṇim adyāpi mugdhā ||500||
dṛṣṭiḥ snihyati nirbharaṃ priyatame vaidagdhyabhājo giraḥ
vakṣaḥ saṃvriyate punaḥ punar idaṃ bhārālasaṃ gamyate
jātā subhru manoramā tava daśā kasmād akasmād iyam ||502||
yathā dṛṣṭis tiryak patati sahasā saṅkucati ca |
na madhyasthaṃ cetaḥ praguṇaramaṇīyaṃ na ca dṛḍham ||503||
na vakti premārdraṃ na khalu parirambhaṃ racayati
sthitau tasyāṃ tasyāṃ karakamalalīlāṃ na sahate |
tathāpy antaḥ prītiṃ vapuṣi pulako’syāḥ kathayati ||504||
gaṇḍe maṇḍanam ātmanaiva kurute vaidagdhyagarvād asau
tanvyāś citram akāṇḍa eva laḍahe bhāve nibaddho bharaḥ ||506||
dhatte dikṣu nirīkṣaṇaṃ smitamukhī pārāvatānāṃ rutaiḥ ||507||
prathayati mayi vyājenāṅgaṃ hriyā ca nigūhate
kṣipati viśadasnigdhaṃ cakṣuḥ kṣaṇāc ca niyacchati |
mama ca sahate dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭiṃ punaś ca samīhate
vahati hṛdaye kāmaṃ bālā na cojjhati vāmatām ||511||
amarukasya | (amaru 38, Sv 2056, śā.pa. 3673; sa.ka.ā.m 1128; Vishnudas to u.nī. 5.19)
mṛdu madakalaṃ kiñcid vākyaṃ kathañcana muñcatī
dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā
śayyāyāṃ parivṛtya tiṣṭhati balād āliṅgitā vepate |
jātā vāmatayaiva me’dya sutarāṃ prītyai navoḍhā priyā ||516||
yad api bahuśaḥ pṛṣṭā kiñcid bravīty aparisphuṭaṃ
muhuḥ svādu svairaṃ vadati nibhṛtaṃ paśyati muhuś
kaṇṭhe śliṣyati nirbharagrahavidhiṃ kartuṃ punaḥ śaṅkate |
tiṣṭhaty eva ratāntareṣv abhimukhaṃ naivābhiyuṅkte svayaṃ
mṛdāsaktā hṛdyaṃ sthagayati mukhaṃ cumbati mayi
stanau pāṇḍuśyāmau mama karatalād ākṣipati ca |
kurvīthāḥ śvaśurasya bhaktim adhikāṃ śvaśrvāś ca pādānatiṃ
snehaṃ bhṛtyajane pratīccha rabhasād dvārāgatān bāndhavān |
gehe vā vipine’pi vā sahacarīvṛttena nityaṃ bhaja ||526||
na ca guṇini samṛddhe’py ādaraṃ yāti tāte |
supte tatra śayīta tat prathamato jahyāc ca śayyām iti
nijaṃ tad iyam aṅganā vadati nūnam uccaiḥ kulam ||529||
bhartur viprakṛtāpi roṣaṇatayā mā sma pratīpaṃ gamaḥ |
bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bhava dakṣiṇā parijane bhogeṣv anutsekinī
yānty evaṃ gṛhiṇīpadaṃ yuvatayo vāmāḥ kulasyādhayaḥ ||530||
kathaya murale kenāmī te kṛtā niculadrumāḥ ||531||
patyuḥ kelibhir asthiṣu cchiduratā marmakṣatir narmaṇā
yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varas tā eva caitrakṣapās
agre pallavitair manobhir acirāc cetobhuvā nartitāḥ |
vayaṃ bālye bālāṃs taruṇimani yūnaḥ pariṇatāv
apīcchāmo vṛddhāṃs tad iha kularakṣā samucitā |
na no gotre putri kvacid api satīlāñchanam abhūt ||536||
tasmāt ko’pi tvayādya prabhṛti na sahasā saṃmukhaṃ vīkṣaṇīyaḥ |
kartavyā rūparakṣā vacasi na hṛdayaṃ deyam asmadvidhānām ||537||
ārādhyaḥ patir eva tasya ca padadvandvānuvṛttir vrataṃ
kiṃ rūpeṇa na yatra majjati mano yūnāṃ kim ācāryakair
gūḍhānaṅgarahasyayuktiṣu phalaṃ yeṣāṃ na dīrghaṃ yaśaḥ ||538||
asmākaṃ vratam etad eva yad ayaṃ kuñjodare jāgaraḥ
nistriṃśāḥ śataśaḥ patantu śirasaś chedo’thavā jāyatām
ātmīyaṃ kulavartma putri na manāg ullaṅghanīyaṃ tvayā ||539||
sakhi śraddhā te syād yadi vinayam ālambitum api |
dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini kṣaṇam ihāpy asmadgṛhe dāsyasi
prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati |
ekākiny api yāmi satvaram itaḥ srotas tamālākulaṃ
ṣaṣṭhyāṃ gantum araṇyam asmi cakitā yatrārcayantī drumān
kāsmīti svam ahaṃ na veda sakhi tad vande vrataṃ tādṛśam ||543||
anyāsāṃ na kim asti veśmani vadhūḥ kaivaṃ niśi prāvṛṣi
praiti prāntataḍāgam amba gṛhiṇi svasthāsi me’vasthayā |
bhagno’yaṃ valayo ghaṭo vighaṭitaḥ kṣaṇṇā tanuḥ kaṇṭakair
ākrāntaḥ sa tathā bhujaṅgahatakaḥ kaṣṭaṃ na yad daṣṭavān ||544||
amba śvaśru yadi tvayā hataśukaḥ saṃvardhanīyas tadā
lauhaṃ pañjaram asya durṇayavato gāḍhāntaraṃ kāraya |
daṣṭā yan na bhujaṅgamena tadatiśreyaḥ kim ebhiḥ kṣataiḥ ||545||
gehe dehavatī jareva jaratī śvaśrūr dvitīyā param |
etat pāntha vṛthā viḍambayati māṃ bālyātiriktaṃ vayaḥ
sūkṣmaṃ vīkṣitum akṣameha janatā vāsonyataś cintyatām ||546||
asmin gṛhe gṛhapatiś ca gato vidūram |
kiṃ yācase tad iha vāsam iyaṃ varākī
ambā śete’tra vṛddhā pariṇatavayasām agraṇīr atra tāto
puraḥ pallī śūnyā tad anu ca vidūre’sti nagaraṃ
paraṃ pāre gaṅgaṃ caramagirigāmī ca mihiraḥ |
ito yāntaṃ prānte mama ramaṇam ālokayasi cet
tatas te kalyāṇaṃ pathika sa hi tatra praharikaḥ ||549||
pāntha svairagatiṃ vihāya jhaṭiti prasthānam ārabhyatām
caṇḍāṃśor api raśmayaḥ pratidiśaṃ mlānās tvam eko yuvā
sthānaṃ nāsti gṛhe mamāpi bhavato bālāham ekākinī ||550||
nyastaṃ na stanamaṇḍale nakhapadaṃ kaṇṭhān na viśleṣitā
muktā hāralatā kapolaphalake luptā na patrāvalī |
mugdhe yadyapi tena te na daśanair bhinno’dya bimbādharas
tad vailakṣyavijṛmbhitair iha tathāpy unnīyate durṇayaḥ ||552||
no vidmaḥ sakhi saṃmukhaḥ sa bhagavān kasyādya puṣpāyudhaḥ ||553||
tan manye sakhi nāgarasya viṣayaṃ kasyāpi yātāsi kim ||554||
āsajya rājyabhāvaṃ svaṃ sukhaṃ svapiti manmathaḥ ||565||
pratyaṅgārpaṇasundaraṃ ca na jano jānāti rantuṃ puraḥ ||567||
pārśvād eva jarātureṇa vidhinā taṃ taṃ gṛhītvā guṇaṃ
sṛṣṭā hanta haranti kasya na manaḥ kaśmīravāmabhruvaḥ ||571||
śobhāṃ kām api bibhrati praṇihitāḥ kaśmīravicchittayaḥ |
apy āsāṃ stanamaṇḍale pariṇaman mālūragaure śriyaṃ
vāsaḥ sūkṣmaṃ vapuṣi bhujayoḥ kāñcanī cāṅgadaśrīr
veśaḥ keṣāṃ na harati mano baṅgavārāṅganānām ||575||
na tathā nāgarastrīṇāṃ vilāsā ramayanti naḥ |
pādena preṅkhayantī mukharayati muhuḥ pāmarī pheravāṇāṃ
yāsāṃ saty api sadguṇānusaraṇe doṣānubandhaḥ sadā
yāḥ prāṇān varam arpayanti na punaḥ sampūrṇadṛṣṭiṃ priye |
dṛśā dagdhaṃ manasijaṃ jīvayanti dṛśaiva yāḥ |
so’naṅgaḥ kusumāni pañca viśikhāḥ puṣpāṇi bāṇāsanaṃ
etatsādhana utsaheta sa jagaj jetuṃ kathaṃ manmathas
tasyāmogham amūr bhavanti nahi ced astraṃ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ ||583||
yannāmāpi sukhākaroti kalayaty urvīm api dyām iva
prāptir yasya yadaṅgasaṅgavidhinā kiṃ yan na nihnūyate |
antaḥ kiṃ ca sudhāsapatnam aniśaṃ jāgarti yadrāgiṇāṃ
visrambhāspadam adbhutaṃ kim api tatkānteti tattvāntaram ||584||
tava kitava kim ābhir vāgbhir abhyarṇacūta
uṣasi vighasa na tvāṃ pāṇināpi spṛśāmi ||586||
asmākam asti na hi kaścid ihāvakāśas
pādānte patitaḥ priyaḥ patatu na pravyaktabāṣpodgamaḥ
saṃjātaḥ sa na jāyatāṃ tvam adhunā tadvaktram atrāgatā |
nāsīt kāpi sakhī tadā ghanataḥ stomāvṛtāyāṃ niśi ||588||
kiṃ te bāṣpas tirayati dṛśo kiṃ sakampo’dharas te
gaṇḍābhogaḥ kathaya kim u te kopakelīkaṣāyaḥ |
aho citraṃ citraṃ sphuṭam iti lapantyāśrukaluṣaṃ
ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śirasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ ||590||
haṃho kānta rahogatena bhavatā yatpūrvam āveditaṃ
nirbhinnā tanur āvayor iti mayā tajjñātam adya sphuṭam |
so’tyarthaṃ katham anyathā tudati mām eṣa tvadoṣṭhavraṇaḥ ||591||
sakhi pratyeṣi tvaṃ prakṛtisarale paśyasi na kim |
dṛṣṭā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanam idaṃ prātaś ciraṃ preyaso
amaroḥ (amaru 53 (88); śā.pa. 3740, Sbh 2215; sū.mu. 82.17; padyā.. 222; Daśarūpaka 2.6)
vakṣo muṣṭibhir āhataṃ tava hṛdi sphūrjanti me vedanāḥ |
pratyaṅgaṃ tava jarjarā tanur ahaṃ jātā punaḥ khaṇḍitā ||595||
kucau dhattaḥ kampaṃ nipatati kapolaḥ karatale
prapañco’yaṃ kiñcit tava sakhi hṛdisthaṃ kathayati ||596||
nāsāgre nayanaṃ yad etad aparaṃ yac caikatānaṃ manaḥ |
maunaṃ cedam idaṃ ca śūnyam akhilaṃ yad viśvam ābhāti te
tad brūyāḥ sakhi yoginī kim asi bhoḥ kiṃ viyoginy api ||597||
gaṇḍaḥ pāṇiniṣevaṇāc ca yad ayaṃ saṅkrāntapañcāṅguliḥ |
gaurī krudhyatu vartate yadi na te tat ko’pi citte yuvā
dhatse bāhulatārgalāṃ kucataṭe niṣkāntibhīty eva yat |
kiṃ vā mantrayate jano’yam iti yat sarvatra śaṅkākulā
taj jāne hṛdi ko’pi tiṣṭhati yuvā prauḍhaś ca gūḍhaś ca te ||599||
yad daurbalyaṃ vapuṣi mahatī sarvataś cāspṛhā yan
nāsālakṣyaṃ yad api nayanaṃ maunam ekāntato yat |
ekādhīnaṃ kathayati manas tāvad eṣā daśā te
kosāv ekaḥ kathaya sumukhi brahma vā vallabho vā ||600||
netre bāṣpataraṅgite pariṇataḥ kaṇṭhe kalaḥ pañcamaḥ |
kasmān mlāyasi mālatīva mṛditety ālījane pṛcchati
vyaktaṃ noditam ārtayāpi virahe śālīnayā bālayā |
akṣṇor bāṣpabharaṃ nigṛhya katham apy ālokitaḥ kevalaṃ
sā candrād api manmathād api jaladroṇīsamīrād api
niḥśeṣā maṇipañjarāvalir asau dāty ūhaśūnyā kṛtā
kiṃ kurmaḥ punar atra rātrim akhilāṃ kalyakvaṇatkokilā
kelīypañcamahuṅkṛteḥ svayam iyaṃ yan mṛtyum ākāṅkṣati ||604||
jalārdrāṃ cārdrāṃ vā malayajarasair mā mama kṛthā
vṛthā sadyaḥ padmacchadanaśayanaṃ māpi ca vidhāḥ |
vṛthā gāthāślokair alam alam alīkāṃ mama rujaṃ
idaṃ pārśve tasya prahiṇu sakhi lagnāñjanalava
gacchāmi kutra vidadhāmi kim atra kasmiṃs
tiṣṭhāmi kaḥ khalu mamātra bhaved upāyaḥ |
sakhi malayajaṃ muñca kṣāraṃ kṣate kim ivārpyate
vyajanapavano mā bhūc chvāsān karoti mamādhikān
upacitabale vyādhāv asmin mudhā bhavati śramaḥ ||609||
ko’sau dhanyaḥ kathaya subhage kasya gaṅgāsarayvo
manye mugdhāṃ praharati haṭhāt patriṇā vāruṇena |
pakṣmānte skhalitāḥ kapolaphalake lolaṃ luṭhantaḥ kṣaṇaṃ
bibhrāṇā nipatanti bās bāṣpapayasāṃ prasyandino bindavaḥ ||614||
stanān nābhiṃ nābher ghanajaghanam etya pratimuhuḥ |
na jānīmaḥ kiṃ nu kva nu kṛtam anena vyavasitaṃ
vaktrendor na haranti bāṣpapayasāṃ dhārāmanojñāṃ śriyaṃ
niḥśvāsā na kadarthayanti madhurāṃ bimbādharasya dyutim |
chāyā kāpi kapolayor anudinaṃ tasyāḥ paraṃ śuṣyati ||616||
tvaddhyānaiḥ satataṃ kuraṅgakadṛśaḥ kintv etad āste navam |
śyāmībhūtakapolam indur adhunā yat tan mukhaṃ spardhate ||617||
caṇḍālas tava śokavahnir abhito dhanvī jighāṃsuḥ smaras
kaṇṭhe jīvitamānane tava guṇāḥ pāṇau kapolastanau
saṃtāpas tvayi mānasaṃ nayanayor acchinnadhāraṃ payaḥ |
sarvaṃ niṣkaruṇa tvadīyavirahe sālambanaṃ kiṃ punas
tasyāḥ saṃprati jīvite bata sakhīvargo nirālambanaḥ ||620||
diśaṃ cakraṃ candre sukṛtamaya tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
dṛśor bāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanam asavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare
hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ ||621||
candraṃ candanakardamena likhitaṃ sā mārṣṭi daṣṭādharā
vandyaṃ nindati yac ca manmatham asau bhaṅktvāgrahas tāṅgulīḥ |
kāmaḥ puṣpaśaraḥ kilet sumanovargaṃ lunīte ca yat
tat kāṃ sā subhaga tvayā varattanur bātūlatāṃ lambhitā ||623||
amaroḥ | (śā.pa. 3489 satkavicandrasya; sū.mu. 44.13; SD 10.79; padyā. 360 śambhoḥ)
glapayati na yad asyāḥ śvāsajanmā hutāśaḥ |
tasyās tāpam ahaṃ mukunda kathayāmy eṇīdṛśas te kathaṃ
padminyāḥ sarasaṃ dalaṃ vinihitaṃ yasyāḥ satāpe hṛdi |
ādau śuṣyati saṅkucaty anu tataś cūrṇatvam āpadyate
paścān murmuratāṃ dadhad dahati ca śvāsāvadhūtaḥ śikhī ||626||
kasyacit | (sū.mu. 44.25; su.ra. 553 kasyacit; utpalarāja; padyā. 356 śāntikarasya)
nīrasaṃ kāṣṭham evedaṃ satyaṃ te hṛdayaṃ yadi |
tathāpi dīyatāṃ tasyai gatā sā daśamīṃ daśām ||627||
kuśalaṃ tasyā jīvati kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭāsi jīvatīty uktam |
punar api tad eva kathayasi mṛtāṃ nu kathayāmi yā śvasiti ||628||
kva sā kāntir yātā bata na śapathais tāsv ayam api
pratīmaḥ strīhatyā tad api tava ceto naṭayati ||629||
tāḥ saṃtāparujaḥ sa cāṅgajaḍimā sāharniśaṃ jāgarā
tvayy āśleṣarasena jīvati punas tyakto’nyathā hastakaḥ ||630||
tvāṃ cintāparikalpitaṃ subhaga sā sambhāvya romāñcitā
acchinnaṃ nayanāmbu bandhuṣu kṛtaṃ tāpaḥ sakhīṣv āhito
dainyaṃ nyastam aśeṣataḥ parijane cintā gurubhyo’rpitā |
adya śvaḥ kila nirvṛtiṃ vrajati sā śvāsaiḥ paraiḥ khidyate
visrabdho bhava viprayogajanitaṃ duḥkhaṃ vibhaktaṃ tayā ||632||
iyam iva karajaḥ kṣīṇas tvam iva kaṭhorāṇi parvāṇi ||633||
santāpārtivinodanāya katham apy ālikhya sakhyā bhavān |
mūrdhnā ca praṇataḥ sakhīṣu madanavyājena cāpahnutaḥ ||634||
dūrvāśyāmaruco’pi candanarasair yat te likhaty ākṛtiṃ
soḍhuṃ tāpam anīśvarā yad api ca grīṣmāgamaṃ vāñchati |
yat puṣṇāti nirasya vibhramaśukān bālā cakorīkulaṃ
mūḍhas tatra sakhījanaḥ sphurati kiṃ susthasya me cetasi ||635||
karpūrasya rajāṃsi bālukam asāv asyās tu jīvādhvagaḥ
kvāpi kvāpy upayāti muhyati muhuḥ kvāpî kvacin mūrcchati ||636||
mṛgaśiśudṛśas tasyās tāpaṃ kathaṃ kathayāmi te
dahanapatitā dṛṣṭā mūrtir mayā na hi vaidhavī |
iti tu niyataṃ nārīrūpaḥ sa lokadṛśāṃ priya
snigdhenāpi janena dāhabhayataḥ prasthaṃ pacaḥ pāthasām |
lājasphoṭam amī sphuṭanti maṇayo viśve’pi hārasrajām ||638||
pratyekaṃ smarajātavedasi nijāny aṅgāni hutvā kṣaṇād
indor abhudayena dāsyati punaḥ sā prāṇapūrṇāhutim ||639||
tadgātrāṇāṃ kim iva hi bahu brūmahe durbalatvaṃ
yeṣām agre pratipad uditā candralekhāpy atanvī ||641||
tat saṃpraty api re prasīda kim api premāmṛtasyandinīṃ
dṛṣṭiṃ nātha vidhehi sā ratipateḥ śiñjāpi samjāyatām ||642||
kārśyaṃ vapuḥ śaṭha bibharti yathā yathaiva |
kuraṅgākṣyās tasyāḥ śṛṇu subhaga kautūhalam idam |
saughād udvijate tyajaty upavanaṃ dveṣṭi prabhām aindavīṃ
dvārāt trasyati citrakelisadaso veśaṃ viṣaṃ manyate |
sodvegā mṛgalāñchane mukham api svaṃ nekṣate darpaṇe
trastā kokilakūjitād api giraṃ nonmudrayaty ātmanaḥ |
mugdhā sā subhage tvayi pratimuhuḥ premādhikaṃ puṣyati ||647||
kṣatakṣāro hāraḥ sa khalu puṭapāko malayajaḥ |
aye kiṃcid vakre tvayi subhaga sarve katham amī
dūrād dveṣṭi gurūn nirasyati latāgāre vihāraspṛhām |
āste sundara sā sakhīpriyagirām āśvāsanaiḥ kevalaṃ
pratyāśāṃ dadhatī tayā ca hṛdayaṃ tenāpi ca tvāṃ punaḥ ||649||
hāraṃ pāśavad ācchinatti dahanaprāyāṃ na ratnāvalīṃ
sā bālā visavallarīvalayato vyālād iva trasyati ||650||
prācīnaṃ kham upeyuṣi tvayi manāg dūre gate preyasi |
kṣīrodīyati manmatho dṛgapi ca drāk candrakāntīyati ||651||
tāpo’mbhaḥ prasṛtiṃ pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālocitaḥ
kiṃ cānyat kathayāmi rātrim akhilāṃ tvadvartmavātāyane
cetaḥ kātaritaṃ taraṅgitam uraḥ śvāsormibhiḥ pīvaraiḥ |
itthaṃ tvadvirahe tadīyavipadaṃ devaī triyāmaiva vā
talpaṃ vā paritāpakhinnam athavā jānāti puṣpāyudhaḥ ||654||
niṣpatraṃ sarasīruhāṃ vanam idaṃ niścandanā medinī
talpaṃ kalpitam eva kalpayati sā bhūyas tanuṃ maṇḍitāṃ
bhūyo maṇḍayati svayaṃ ratipater aṅgīkaroty arcanām |
gacchantyāṃ niśi manyate kṣatim iva dvāraṃ ciraṃ sevate
līlāveśmani sā karoti madanaklāntā varākī na kim ||656||
evaṃ nau surataṃ bhaviṣyati cirād adyeti sānandayā
kathaya sukṛtī ko’yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate ||658||
aṅgeṣv ābharaṇaṃ karoti bahuśaḥ patre’pi saṃcāriṇi
prāptaṃ tvāṃ pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyāṃ ciraṃ dhyāyati |
vyāsaktāpi vinā tvayā varatanur naiṣā niśāṃ neṣyati ||659||
aratir iyam upaiti māṃ na nidrā
gaṇayati tasya guṇān mano na doṣān |
likhati kucayoḥ patraṃ kaṇṭhe niyojayati srajaṃ
tilakam alike kurvan gaṇḍād udasyati kuntalān |
iti caṭuśatair vāraṃ vāraṃ vapuḥ paritaḥ spṛśan
svāmin bhaṅgurayālakaṃ satilakaṃ bhālaṃ vilāsin kuru
prāṇeśa truṭitaṃ payodharataṭe hāraṃ punar yojaya |
spṛṣṭā tena tatheti jātapulakā prāptā punar mohanam ||662||
etāṃs te bhramaraughanīlakuṭilān badhnāmi kiṃ kuntalān
kiṃ cāsmin vyapanīya bandhanam idaṃ paṅkeruhāṇāṃ dalat
dṛṣṭo’yaṃ viṣavat purā parijano dṛṣṭāyatir vārayan
paurvāparyavidāṃ tvayā nahi kṛtāḥ karṇe sakhīnāṃ giraḥ |
haste candram ivāvatārya sarale dhūrtena dhigvañcitā
tat kiṃ rodiṣi kiṃ viṣadasi kim unnidrāsi kiṃ dūyase ||666||
jñātaṃ jñātijanaiḥ praghuṣṭam ayaśo dūraṃ gatā dhīratā
tyaktā hrīḥ pratipādito’py avinayaḥ sādhvīpadaṃ projjhitam |
bhūyo dūti kim anyad asti yad asāv adyāpi nāgacchati ||667||
sakhi sa vijito vīṇāvādyaiḥ kayāpy aparastriyā
paṇitam abhavat tābhyāṃ tava kṣapālalitaṃ dhruvam |
sotkaṇṭhaṃ ruditaṃ sakampam asakṛd yātaṃ sabāṣpaṃ ciraṃ
cakṣur dikṣu niveśitaṃ sakaruṇaṃ sakhyā samaṃ jalpitam |
tat tat kiṃcid anuṣṭhitaṃ mṛgadṛśā no yatra vācāṃ gatiḥ ||669||
yat saṅketagṛhaṃ priyeṇa kathitaṃ sampreṣya dūtīṃ svayaṃ
tac chūnyaṃ suciraṃ niṣevya sudṛśā paścāc ca bhagnāśayā |
bhūmāv akṣaramālikeva likhitā dīrghaṃ rudatyā śanaiḥ ||670||
karṇe yan na kṛtaṃ sakhījanavaco yan nādṛtā bandhuvāk
na ruddho nirgacchann ayam iti vilakṣaḥ priyatamaḥ |
sakhī līko’py āsīl likhita iva citreṇa kim idam ||672||
padopānte kānte luṭhati tam anādṛtya bhavanād
drutaṃ niṣkrāmantyā kim api na mayālocitam abhūt |
yatpādapraṇataḥ priyaḥ paruṣayā vācā sa nirvārito
yatsakhyā na kṛtaṃ vaco jaḍatayā yanmanyur eko dhṛtaḥ |
pāpasyāsya phalaṃ tad etad adhunā yac candanendudyuti
dahati viraheṣv aṅgān īrṣyāṃ karoti samāgame
harati hṛdayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ karoty avaśāṃ tanum |
kṣaṇam api sukhaṃ yasmin prāpte gate ca na labhyate
kim aparam ataś citraṃ yan me tathāpi sa vallabhaḥ ||675||
sakhi sa subhago mandasneho mayīti na me vyathā
vidhiviracitaṃ yasmāt sarvo janaḥ sukham aśnute |
mama tu manasaḥ santāpo’yaṃ jane vimukho’pi ya
tkatham api hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām ||676||
niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlam unmathyate
nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate |
aṅgaṃ śoṣam upaiti pādapatitaḥ preyāṃs tathopekṣitaḥ
sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇam ākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ ||677||
jyotirbhyas tad idaṃ tamaḥ samuditaṃ jāto’yam adbhyaḥ śikhī
ko nāmāsya vidhiḥ praśāntiṣu bhaved bāḍhaṃ draḍhīyān ayaṃ
granthir yat priyato’pi vipriyam idaṃ sakhyaḥ kṛtaṃ sāntvanaiḥ ||678||
tallākṣālipilāñchitād api mukhād induḥ sa kiṃ duḥsahaḥ
saṃtāpāya pikadhvaniḥ kim u mṛṣā vācāṃ prapañcād api |
kathābhir deśānāṃ katham api ca kālena bahunā
samāyāte kānte sakhi rajanir ardhaṃ gatavatī |
sapatnīva prācī dig iyam abhavat tāvad aruṇā ||680||
tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kim iti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ |
mayā prāg evoktaṃ kalahavati mā tyājaya guṇaṃ
bhayes tu preyāṃs te svakaravaśagaṃ muñcasi mudhā |
avāpto vailakṣyaṃ śara iva punar naiti tad ayaṃ
nanu vororu sa eva hi vañcitaḥ ||684||
param iha sakhīvargasyedaṃ vaco na puraskṛtam |
kim iti śithilo mānagranthiḥ karair na kariṣyate ||685||
pravṛtto vailakṣyāt kim api likhituṃ daivahatakaḥ |
sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ katham api sa tādṛk pariṇato
gatā yena vyaktaṃ punar avayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī ||686||
kṛthā maivaṃ cetaḥ katham api manāg askhalad itaḥ
pramādād vāṇīyaṃ kim iha karavāṇi praṇayini |
tatas tvatpādābjaṃ yad idam avataṃso bhavatu me ||687||
ardhokte bhayam āgato’si kim idaṃ kaṇṭhaś ca kiṃ gadgadaś
cāṭor asya na ca kṣaṇo’yam anupakṣipteyam āstāṃ kathā |
brūhi prastutam astu saṃprati mahat karṇe sakhīnāṃ mukhais
tṛptir nirbharam ebhir akṣarapadaiḥ prāg eva me saṃbhṛtā ||688||
dūrād etya dṛśā nivārya ca sakhīr utkṣiptadoḥkaṅkaṇa
jñātāsīti vipakṣanāma gadatā sambhāvitā sā tvayā
jīvaty eva yadi tvarāṃ tyaja nanu tvām eva yāciṣyate ||690||
bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
khedo’smāsu na me’parādhyati bhavān sarve’parādhā mayi |
tat kiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
nanv etan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmīty ato rudyate ||691||
amaroḥ (amaru 53; da.rū. 2.17; Sv 1614, śā.pa. 3554, sū.mu. 57.1, su.ra. 653)
ālāpo’pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayanty āntike
tasyaiva (amaru 17, su.ra. 639, Sv 1583, śā.pa. 3534, sū.mu. 55.6, da.rū. 2.19, Rask 2.67g)
cittautsukyaṃ kim api kurute kṣāmam aṅgaṃ tad asyās
na mando vaktrenduḥ śrayati na lalāṭaṃ kuṭilatāṃ
na netrābjaṃ rajyaty anuṣajati na bhrūr api bhidām |
sādhikṣepapadā manāg api giro na śrāvitā mugdhayā |
bhrūbedho na kṛtaḥ kṛtā mukhaśaśicchāyāpi nāyādṛśī
kāluṣyeṇa na lambhitāḥ kalagiraḥ kopas tvato lakṣyate |
yat prāgalbhyam apāsya samprati navībhūtaṃ punar lajjayā
yaś cāyaṃ vinayādaraḥ praṇayitāṃ muktvā mahān vartate ||698||
pakṣmotkṣepavyatikarahato yac ca bāṣpas tad ete
valatu taralā dhṛṣṭā dṛṣṭiḥ khalā sakhi mekhalā
skhalatu kucayor utkampān me vidīryantu kañcukam |
tad api na mayā sambhāvyo’sau punar dayitaḥ śaṭhaḥ
sphuṭati hṛdayaṃ maunenāntar na me yadi tatkṣaṇāt ||701||
bhrūbhaṅge racite’pi dṛṣṭir adhikaṃ sotkaṇṭham udvīkṣate
ruddhāyām api vāci sasmitam idaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate
dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmin jane ||702||
bhrūbhedo racitaḥ ciraṃ nayanayor abhyastam āmīlanaṃ
roddhuṃ śikṣitam ādareṇa hasitaṃ maune’bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
dhairyaṃ kartum api sthirīkṛtam idaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhis tu daivasthitā ||703||
tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā cānyatas
hastābhyām api vāritaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti sahasā yat kañcuke sandhayaḥ ||704||
sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punar dayitena me |
iti sarabhasaṃ mānāṭopād udīrya vacas tayā
kiṃ pādānte luṭhasi vimanāḥ svāmino hi svatantrāḥ
kañcit kālaṃ kvacid abhiratas tatra kas te’parādhaḥ |
āgaskāriṇy aham iha yayā jīvitaṃ tadviyoge
bhartṛprāṇāḥ striya iti nanu tvaṃ mamaivānuneyaḥ ||706||
tathābhūd asmākaṃ prathamam avibhinnā tanur iyaṃ
tato nu tvaṃ preyān aham api hatāśā priyatamā |
idānīṃ nāthas tvaṃ vayam api kalatraṃ kim aparaṃ
bhavatu viditaṃ chadmālāpair alaṃ priya gamyatāṃ
tanur api na te doṣo’smākaṃ vidhis tu parāṅmukhaḥ |
tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannam imāṃ daśāṃ
prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite ||708||
kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
tasya premṇas tad idam adhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ ||709||
tasyaiva (amaru 34; da.rū.. 2.19, Sv 1630, śā.pa. 3562, sū.mu. 84.7, su.ra. 648)
ściraṃ loṭhaty eṣa grahavati na mānād viramasi |
śṛṇu tvaṃ yad brūmaḥ priyasakhi na māne kuru matim ||711||
asadvṛtto nāyaṃ na ca sakhi guṇair eṣa rahitaḥ
likhann āste bhūmiṃ bahir avanataḥ prāṇadayito
tavāvasthā ceyaṃ visṛja kaṭhine mānam adhunā ||713||
yad etat te maunaṃ smitam udayate yan na vadane
yad avyaktā dṛṣṭir yad abhimukhavāmaḥ sthitirasaḥ |
hṛdā dūraṃ yāti priyasakhi navīnaḥ parijanaḥ ||714||
mugdhe cumbatu nāma cañcalatayā bhṛṅgaḥ kvacit kandalī
rambhoru kṣipa locanārdham abhito bāṇān vṛthā manmathaḥ
saṃdhattāṃ dhanur ujjhatu kṣaṇam ito bhrūvallim ullāsaya |
mugdhe vācam udīrayāstu jagato vīṇāsu bherībhramaḥ ||716||
kim iti kavarī yādṛk tādṛg dṛśau kim añjane
ayam asamayaṃ kiṃ ca klāmyaty asaṃsmaraṇena te
priye maunaṃ muñca śrutir amṛtadhārāṃ pibatu me
yadi vinihitā śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ kim u sthirakautukā
yadi viracito maune yatnaḥ kim u sphurito’dharaḥ |
yadi niyamitaṃ dhyāne cakṣuḥ kathaṃ pulakodgamaḥ
kṛtam abhinayair dṛṣṭo mānaḥ prasīda kim ucyatām ||719||
muhuḥ kaṇṭhe lagnas taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ
priyo manyur jātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam ||720||
nyagbhūtaṃ bahir āsitaṃ pulakavat sparśaṃ samātanvati |
cetasy aṅkuritaṃ visāriṇi dṛśor dvandve dvipatrāyitaṃ
prāyaṃ pallavitaṃ vacasy upacitaṃ prauḍhaṃ kapolasthale |
anyonyasya hṛdi sthite’py anunaye saṃrakṣator gauravam |
dūrād utsukam āgate vivalitaṃ sambhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ
cakṣur jātam aho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi ||724||
sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
na khalu tava kadācit kopa evaṃ vidho’bhūt |
nayanajalam analpaṃ muktam uktaṃ na kiñcit ||725||
ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
nyasyantyāḥ sahakārapallavam atha vyānamya patyuḥ puro
mugdhe preṣaya yāmi yānti pathikāḥ kālo’vadhiḥ kathyatām
udvignā kim akāṇḍa eva bhavatī tūṣṇīṃ kim evaṃ sthitā |
svalpair eva dinaiḥ samāgama iti jñātvā śucaṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
ity ākarṇya vacaḥ priyasya sahasā tanmugdhayā ceṣṭitaṃ
bhrātar bāṣpa muhur vimuñca nayanaṃ yāvat tirodhīyate
nāyaṃ niṣkaruṇaḥ purā niravadhir bhāvī tathaivodayaḥ |
kānte katy api vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau
svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ |
sandeśo vada kas tavābhilaṣitas tīrtheṣu toyāñjaliḥ ||731||
gantuṃ vāñchasi gaccha picchilam amī yāvan na kurvanti te
etasyās tava tāni ### rahasi premākṣarāṇi dhruvaṃ
dhyāyantyās tu vipad vinodanasakhī murcchaiva sampatsyate ||732||
yāsyāmīti giraḥ śrutā avadhir apy ālambitaś cetasā
gehe yatnavatī bhaviṣyasi sadety etat samākarṇitam |
mugdhe mā śuca ity udīritavataḥ patyur nirīkṣyānanaṃ
niḥśvasya stanapāyini svatanaye dṛṣṭiś ciraṃ pātitā ||733||
saṃprāpte tvayi yāni tānyapi sukhāny adyāparokṣāṇi naḥ |
kiṃ tv ajñātaviyogavedanam idaṃ sadyas tvayi prasthite
cetaḥ kiṃ nu karīṣyatīty aviditaṃ samyaṅ na niścīyate ||734||
anyās tā vinivārayanti kṛpaṇāḥ prāṇeśvaraṃ prasthitam |
puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
yat snehocitam īhitaṃ priyatama tvaṃ nirgataḥ śroṣyasi ||735||
madhye veśma samudgatā tad anu ca dvārāntarālaṃ gatā
niryātātha kathañcid aṅgaṇabhuvaṃ preyāṃs tu nālokitaḥ |
haṃho vāyasa rājahaṃsa śuka he he sārike kathyatāṃ
kā vārteti mṛgīdṛśo vijayate bāṣpāmbugarbhaṃ vacaḥ ||736||
udvīkṣya priyamārgam adhvagavadhūr astaṃ gate bhāsvati
grāmaṃ kaṃcid avṛkṣakaṃ virahiṇī tūrṇaṃ vadhūr nīyatām |
niryāya yan na padmātram api prayātam ||739||
vatse mādhavi mugdhikāsi balavad vanyaukaso devatāḥ
pāntu tvām ayam astam añcati ravir yāto’vadhis te pituḥ |
śāntaṃ pāpam amaṅgalaṃ param ataḥ śāntyā na kalyāṇi me
kalyan navyamadhuvratāya tuy madhūny uddiśya me dāsyasi ||740||
prasthānaṃ valayaiḥ kṛtaṃ priyasakhair ajasraṃ gataṃ
dhṛtyā na kṣaṇam āsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ |
gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
gantavye sati jīvitapriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ kim u tyajyate ||741||
prāṇā yāntu yiyāsavo yadi punar janmagraho’bhyarthaye |
vyādhaḥ kokilabandhane vidhuparidhvaṃse ca rāhor gaṇāḥ
kiṃ vrīḍāhatayā mayā bhujalatāpāśo na kaṇṭhe’rpitaḥ ||743||
kiṃ cūtair na vijṛmbhitaṃ stavakitaṃ kiṃ tair na kaṅkellibhiḥ
sindūrair iva mudritās tata ito jātā na kiṃ kiṃśukāḥ |
vismṛtyāpi na kokilaiḥ kim u rutaṃ kiṃ dākṣiṇātyānilair
vātaṃ tatra na nirvṛtaikahṛdayo yatrāsti me vallabhaḥ ||744||
mayā baddhā veṇī nivasitam aśuklaṃ ca vasanaṃ
nivṛttās te dṛṣṭā gatm anugatā ye’sya suhṛdas
tathāpy ete prāṇā dayitam anuyātā na kṛpaṇāḥ ||745||
avadhidivasaḥ prāptaś cāyaṃ tanor virahasya vā
ravir ayam upaity astaṃ sakhyo mamāpi ca jīvitam |
tad alam aphalair āśābandhaiḥ prasīda namo’stu te
ehy āliṅga priyasakhi punaḥ kvāvayor darśanaṃ syāt
avadhidivasaḥ so’yaṃ nātrāgataḥ kim iyat kṣaṇaṃ
vitara nayane paśyaitan me puraḥ sakhi sāhasam |
dṛṣṭaṃ ketakadhūlidhūsaram idaṃ vyoma kramād vīkṣitāḥ
sakhyaḥ saṃvṛṇutāśru muñcata bhayaṃ kasmān mudevākulā
etān apy adhunāsmi vajraghaṭitā nūnaṃ sahiṣye dhanān ||749||
prakaṭaya śaśinn āśāḥ kāmaṃ manoja samullasa |
hṛdayam adhunā kiñcit kartuṃ mamānyad ihecchati ||750||
saṃdiṣṭaṃ tava kāntayā pathika tad vaktuṃ na yat prārthaye ||751||
nāvasthā vapuṣo mameyam avadher uktasya nātikramo
praṣṭavyaḥ śivamāli kevalam asau kaccid bhavadgocare
nāyātaṃ malayānilair mukulitaṃ kaccin na cūtair iti ||752||
niśi niśi muhuḥ śūnye talpe kṛtaḥ śayanaśramaḥ |
na tava savidhaṃ prāṇāḥ prāptā na vā tvam ihāgataḥ ||753||
gantāsi cet pathika he mama yatra kāntas
tattvaṃ vaco hara śucau jagatām asahyaḥ |
vacanaviṣayaḥ saṃdeśo’nyas tayā vihito na te |
manasi kim api dhyāyantyā tu kṣaṇaṃ tava kāntayā
pathika nihitā dṛṣṭiḥ kaṣṭaṃ nave karuṇāṅkure ||756||
sedānīṃ likhiteva kām api gatāvasthāṃ sakhībhiś cirād
vāraṃ vāram upetya nirghṛṇatayā niścitya kiṃcit tataḥ |
sampraty eva nivedya kelikurarīḥ sāsraṃ sakhībhyaḥ śiśor
dhvānte svāntam ahar vyaye’pi na parāvṛttaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ |
grīvaṃ dīrgham ajīvavat priyasakhīvargeṇa nītaṃ vapuḥ ||760||
tan manye vikaṭair ivāñcasi puraḥ panthānam indīvaraiḥ ||761||
ehy antar viśa veśmanaḥ śaśimukhi dvārasthalītoraṇe
stambhālambitabāhuvalli rudatī kiṃ tvaṃ pathaḥ paśyasi ||762||
mā bhūd āgata ity amandavalitodgrīvaṃ muhur vīkṣitam ||765||
sukhaṃ bhrātaḥ supyāṚ svajanasadṛśaṃ vāyasa kṛtam |
rudatyāṃ yo yātas tvayi sa vilapaty eṣyati katham ||766||
vāraṃ vāram alīka eva hi bhavān kiṃ vyāhṛtair gamyatā
tanvaṅgyāḥ prakaṭīkarīti tanutām aṅge bhraman vāyasaḥ ||768||
yac cācchidya baliṃ vilumpasi karāt sarvaṃ sahiṣye tava |
haṃho madvacanāditas tvayi gate śākhāntaraṃ vāyasa
kṣemeṇādya samāgamiṣyati sa cet kāntaś ciraṃ proṣitaḥ ||769||
yāto’stam ravir eṣa saṃprati puraḥ svasty astu te gamyatām
ete tvām anuyāntu saṃprati mama prāṇāḥ priyānveṣiṇaḥ ||770||
yāvat kaṃcid udantam ātmakam itus tāvat sa evety atha
vrīḍāvakritakaṇṭhanālam abalā kaiḥ kair na bhinnā rasaiḥ ||772||
nidre bhadram avasthitāsi kuśalaṃ saṃvedane kiṃ tava
kṣemaṃ te sakhi nirvṛte na tu samaṃ kāntena yūyaṃ gatāḥ |
kiṃ cānyat priyasaṅgamena calito gacchan vipadvatsalo
caṇḍāli kiṃ tvam asi vāsara eva līnā ||774||
ānandāśrubhir arcito dayitayā pānthaś cirād āgataḥ ||775||
gṛhād vāraṃ vāraṃ nirasarad atha prāviśad atha ||776||
śūnyo rājapathas tamāṃsi niviḍāny ehy ehi nirgamyatām ||778||
kṛto mugdhe dugdhe kim iti vṛṣadaṃśaḥ praharikaḥ |
suvarṇaṃ svaṃ cakṣuḥ phalati na vilambasva kulaṭā
mugdhe tvaṃ prakaṭīkaroṣy avinayārambhaṃ vṛthā nihnavaḥ ||780||
rayam aparatra na vīkṣitaḥ śruto vā |
ahim api yad iyaṃ nirāsa nāṅghre
urasi nihitas tāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
kiṃ nv āvṛṇoṣi kavarīṃ sakhi kiṃ nu kāñcīṃ
jhaṅkārair vikalīkṛtāḥ pathi bata vyaktaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśaḥ ||785||
maulau srakśabale muhuḥ samuditasvede muhur vakṣasi
niryāntī ca laghuskhalatpadam idaṃ dhvāntaṃ na yan manyase
tad yūnā madirākṣi kena sucirād ārādhi puṣpāyudhaḥ ||793||
kim iti valitagrīvaṃ mugdhe mudhaiva vilokyate |
kṛtam api kṛaṃ nedaṃ dūti pratīhi na mām iyaṃ
śaśabhṛti vitatadhāmni dhavalayati dharām avibhāvyatāṃ gatāḥ
priyavasatiṃ vrajanti sukham eva mitho nirastabhiyo’bhisārikāḥ ||797||
jyotsnāyām abhisārasaṃpadam imāṃ pañceṣur apy añcati ||798||
ito’py ājñāvajñāṃ sakhi na sahate duḥsahatara
pratāpaḥ pañceṣus tad iha śaraṇaṃ sāhasarasaḥ ||800||
mudaṃ ca mlāniṃ ca prathayati pathi svairasudṛśām ||802||
dhāvati ceto na tanur dhārādhauto’dharo hṛdi na rāgaḥ |
iha ramaṇam abhisarantyāḥ skhalati gatir na tv avaṣṭambhaḥ ||803||
prāṇeśam abhisarantī mugdhā pathi paṅkile skhalantīva |
matpāṇāv apasavyam arpaya karaṃ savyaṃ ca kāñcyāṃ kuru
protkuñcāgram amū nidhehi caraṇāv utpaṅkile vartmani |
mā putri trasa paśya vartma katicid visphārya cakṣuḥ kṣaṇāny
āvalleḍhi taḍillatā tata itaḥ piṇḍāvalehyaṃ tamaḥ ||805||
saiṣā kiṃ kavikalpanā sakhi kim u svairāṅganāduṣkṛtair
preyān oṣadhimaṇḍalasya vahati kṣīṇaṃ vapur yaḥ kṣaṇāt
yac cāstraṃ haranirjitena jagatīṃ jetuṃ cirād arjitam |
yan me śrotrarasāyanaṃ katham aho prāptaṃ tad etan mayā
saṃkṣiptaṃ niviḍonnatastanam uraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva |
madhyaḥ pāṇim ito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāv udagrāṅgulī
chando nartayitur yathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ ||812||
kārpaṇyaṃ tanute na kiṃ smaradhanur dīnaṃ bhruvor agrataḥ |
ājñāṃ mūrdhabhir udvahanti kamalāny akṣṇor mṛgākṣyāḥ sphuṭaṃ
kiṃ cānyadvadanasya dhāvati puro baddhāñjaliś candramāḥ ||813||
lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ
svacchandaṃ vasato janasya hṛdaye cintājvaro nirmitaḥ |
ko’rthaś cetasi vedhasā vinihitas tanvyās tanuṃ tanvatā ||814||
bhrūvallīṃ kim udāharāmi yad avacchedo dhanur mānmathaṃ
yad iha kusumaketo bhrūlatā kāpy yūnā
indoḥ kāntiṃ jaḍatarakarān mattanāgād gatiṃ vā
trastān netre harasi hariṇāt tatra kiṃ nāma citram |
adyāpi śāmyati na te bata pārvaṇendu
akṣibhyāṃ kṛṣṇaśārābhyām asyāḥ karṇau na bādhitau |
mṛgīsambandhinī dṛṣṭir asau yadi na subhruvaḥ |
kaścit tv avaty api kim utpatito nitambāṃs
karoti kasya no mugdhe pipāsātaralaṃ manaḥ ||833||
syād eva tena tulanā taruṇi tvadīya
yad api vibudhaiḥ sindhor antaḥ kathañcid upārjitaṃ
tad api sakalaṃ cārustrīṇāṃ mukheṣu vibhāvyate |
ramṛtam adhare tiryagbhūte viṣaṃ ca vilocane ||836||
