asmin naktam ahar vivekavikale kālādhame nīradaiḥ
bhānor na prasarantu nāma kiraṇāḥ kiṃ tvasya tejasvinaḥ
aye karmālaṅghyaṃ kalaya kim apīdaṃ tanubhṛtām
sudhāṃśor jāteyaṃ katham api kalaṅkasya kaṇikā
vidhātur doṣo’yaṃ na ca guṇanidhes tasya kim api |
sa kiṃ nātreḥ putro na kim u haracūḍārcanamaṇir
na vā hanti dhvāntaṃ jagad upari kiṃ vā na vasati ||1661||
vaktraṃ mudritam ambujanma bhavatā cet kiṃ tataḥ śāśvataṃ
ajani bhagavān asmād vedhāḥ śiraḥsu sudhābhujāṃ
kṛtapadam idaṃ caitad devyāḥ śriyo dhṛtimandiram |
tad iha bhuvanābhogaślāghye saroruhi yac ciraṃ
śaśadhara tava dveṣārambhaḥ sa eṣa jaḍagrahaḥ ||1663||
cāritrāṇi raver jayanti jagatām agre tamo durgatiṃ
prītāḥ sma punar asya samprati sadācāreṇa śītadyuter
yat tad bandhuṣu paṅkajeṣu kim api prārambhi durnāṭakam ||1666||
katham apayaśas tādṛg dhātaḥ svahastitam ātmanaḥ ||1667||
tat tāvad eva śaśinaḥ sphuritaṃ mahīyo
sveṣām amburuhāṃ śriyaḥ sa bhagavān uṣṇo’pi sevyo raviḥ |
śītenāpi kim indunā yad udaye tasyaiva yad bāndhavair
udbuddhaṃ kumudair idaṃ tu śirasā kṛtsnaṃ jagad ghūrṇate ||1670||
tathāpi jānudadhno’yam iti cetasi mā kṛthāḥ ||1672||
uccair unmathitasya tena balinā daivena dhikkarmaṇā
lakṣmīm asya nirasyato jalanidher jātaṃ kim etāvatā |
gāmbhīryaṃ kim ayaṃ jahāti kim ayaṃ puṣṇāti nāmbhodharān
maryādāṃ kim ayaṃ bhinatti kim ayaṃ na trāyate patriṇaḥ ||1673||
pradīptaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ glapayati tataḥ ko’sya śaraṇam ||1674||
kiyān indus tasminn asati bhavataḥ kaiva gaṇanā
tvam etenaiveha prasabham asi ratnākara iti |
harer āstāṃ cakṣuḥ prasaratu yaśas te diśi diśi ||1675||
yal lakṣmīr anapāyinī bhagavato māhātmyam asyaiva tat |
etasmin kṣubhite tu vīcivalanair viśvaṃ nipīya sthite
sūryācandramasor apīha na kathā ke’mī taṭāntadrumāḥ ||1676||
ekenaiva payodhinā jalamucas te pūritāḥ koṭiśo
saṃbhūyāpi vidhātum asya rajasaḥ staimityam apy akṣamāḥ ||1677||
kiṃ brūmo jaladheḥ śriyaṃ sa hi khalu śrījanmabhūmiḥ svayaṃ
vācyaḥ kiṃ mahimāsya yasya hi kila dvīpaṃ mahīti śrutiḥ |
tyāgaḥ ko’pi sa tasya bibhrati jagad yasyārthino’py ambudāḥ
śakteḥ kaiva kathāpi yasya bhavati kṣobheṇa kalpāntaram ||1678||
etasmāj jaladher jalasya kaṇikāḥ kāścid gṛhītvā tataḥ
prāpyaikāṃ jalamānuṣīṃ tribhuvane śrīmān abhūd acyutaḥ ||1679||
na kṣubhyanty eva tāvan niyamitasalilāḥ sarvadaite samudrāḥ |
āho kṣobhaṃ vrajeyuḥ kvacid api samaye daivayogāt tadānīṃ
na kṣoṇī nādrivargo na ca raviśaśinau sarvam ekārṇavaṃ syāt ||1680||
vyāpyāśāḥ śayitasya vīcivalanair ullikhya khaṃ preṅkhataḥ
sindhor locanagocaraḥ sa mahimā teṣāṃ tanoty adbhutam |
yair nāyaṃ karaśuktikodaragato dṛṣṭo muner añjalau ||1681||
līnaḥ kutra mahārṇavasya sa punaḥ kallolakolāhalaḥ ||1682||
ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti
amībhirmā garvaṃ vaha niravalepā hi kṛtinaḥ |
tvāṃ saṃsevya samudra samprati punar dṛṣṭasvabhāgyakṣaya
śiro dhūtvā dhūtvā kim iti jaladher gāyasi yaśaḥ |
namas tebhyo labhyā ya iha guṇabhājo’pi maṇayaḥ ||1687||
vigarjām unmuñca tyaja taralatām arṇava manāg
dṛśaṃ merau dadyāḥ sa hi maṇimayaprasthamahito
mahāmaunaḥ sthairyād atha bhuvanam eva draḍhayati ||1688||
upetā ity evaṃ tava jalanidhe tīram adhunā
vigarjābhiḥ kiṃ naḥ śrutipuṭam aho jarjarayasi ||1689||
kim asi nitarām uktṣubhormiḥ prasīda namo’stu te
pathi pathi śivāḥ santy asmākaṃ śataṃ kamalākarāḥ ||1690||
grāvāṇo maṇayo harir jalacaro lakṣmīḥ payomānuṣī
muktaughāḥ sikatāḥ pravālalatikāḥ śaivālam ambha sudhā |
tīre kalpamahīruhaḥ kim aparaṃ sarvatra nāmāmbudher
dūrāt karṇarasāyanaṃ nikaṭatas tṛṣṇāpi no śāmyati ||1691||
upādhvaṃ tat pānthāḥ punar api saro mārgatilakaṃ
nivṛttiḥ kalyāṇī na punar avatāraḥ katham api ||1692||
yad vīcībhiḥ spṛśasi gaganaṃ yac ca pātālamūlaṃ
ratnair uddīpayasi payasā yat pidhatse dharitrīm |
dhik tat sarvaṃ tava jalanidhe yad vimucyāśrudhārās
kastvaṃ, ko’pi, kuto’si, ratnavasates tīrād ahaṃ nīradher
labdhaṃ kiṃcana, garjitair badhiratā dṛgvyāhatiḥ saikataiḥ |
kṣārodaṃ yad upāsya jīvasi sakhe ślāghyaṃ na tan manyase ||1694||
dhig udgāmbhīryaṃ dhig amṛtamayatvaṃ ca jaladher
mādyaty abhram u vallabho’pi satataṃ tat kālakūṭaṃ viṣam |
vistāro yadi nedṛśo na yadi tadgāmbhīryam ambhonidher
na syād vā yadi sarvasattvaviṣayas tādṛgdayānugrahaḥ |
antaḥ prajvalatā payāṃsi dahatā jvālāvalīṃ muñcatā
ke na syur vaḍavānalena balinā bhasmāvaśeṣīkṛtāḥ ||1697||
dhig vārirāśim api yo hi tathāvidhasya
āścaryaṃ vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhir
ekasyāśrayaghasmarasya pibatas tṛptir na jātā jalair
anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣi svalpo’pi toyavyayaḥ ||1699||
jvalati yadi na madhye vāḍavo havyavāhaḥ |
tribhuvanam api kiṃ na plāvayaty amburāśiḥ ||1700||
vīcīvyāptadigantaraḥ sa hi tathā vārāṃ patiḥ pīyate
pītaḥ so’pi na pūritaṃ ca jaṭharaṃ tasmai namo’gastaye ||1701||
kiṃ brūmo harim asya viśvam udare kiṃ vā phaṇāṃ bhoginaḥ
śete yatra hariḥ svayaṃ jalanidheḥ so’py ekadeśe sthitaḥ |
ājñām eva muner praṇamya śirasā vindhyācala sthīyatām
atyuccaiḥ padam icchatā punar iyaṃ no laṅghanīyā tvayā |
tasya tvāṃ gilataḥ kapolaphalake kleśo’pi kiṃ jāyate ||1703||
nidrālur na hariḥ smṛto na gaṇito dagdhavyaviśvaḥ śikhī
tās tā līḍhavihāyasaḥ kim aparaṃ nālocitā vīcayaḥ |
citraṃ naḥ śrutivibhramo nu muninā pītaḥ sa pāthonidhiḥ ||1704||
āstāṃ cakṣur idaṃ tiro’ñcati kiyac ceto’pi yad vaibhavair
etenaiva virantum arhasi na te gaṇḍūṣapānādhikā
kācit khyātir ataḥparaṃ param asau parjanyanīvīvyayaḥ ||1705||
gāmbhīryaṃ bhayadāyi te rasavaśān nānātvam apy adbhutaṃ
na sthairyaṃ śirasā dhṛtasya ca mukhaṃ durvāram ekāntataḥ |
śaktis te mahato’calān api bhidāṃ netuṃ payo brūhi me
sodaryās tava kiṃ khalā vimajatā labdhās tvayā yadguṇāḥ ||1706||
svātantryaṃ tava nīcasarpaṇam atho pātre sthitau neyatā
sneho hanta tavāntaraṃ na labhate pṛcchāmi tat tvām payaḥ
śiṣyaḥ kiṃ nu dūrīśvaras tava sakhe kiṃ vā tvadīyo guruḥ ||1707||
cāturvarṇyavihāriṇas tava payaḥ sparśo na garhākaraḥ
pātre satyakulīnatā na bhavati tvallāghavād gauravam |
itthaṃ lokavinindite’pi carite tvaṃ mūrtir īśasya cet
abjaṃ tv abjam athābjabhūs tata ito brahmāṇḍamaṇḍād abhūd
viśvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamātmakam idaṃ tvanmūlam itthaṃ payaḥ |
dhik tvāṃ caura iva prayāsi nibhṛtaṃ nirgatya jālāntarair
badhyante vivaśās tvadekagatayas tvām āśritā jantavaḥ ||1709||
śaityaṃ nāma guṇas tavaiva sahajaḥ svābhāvikī svacchatā
kiṃ brūmaḥ śucitāṃ bhavanti śucayaḥ sparśena yasyāpare |
kiṃ cātaḥ param asti te stutipadaṃ yaj jīvanaṃ dehināṃ
tvaṃ cen nīcapathena gacchasi payaḥ kas tvāṃ niroddhuṃ kṣamaḥ ||1710||
tad api nibhṛtam ekaṃ vācyam asty eva kambo
ekaḥ ko’pi sa pāñcajanya udabhūd āścaryabhūtaḥ satāṃ
sambhūtāś ca bhavanti ca pratipadaṃ bhūyo bhaviṣyanti ca
prāyaḥ kambunidher na kukṣikuhare saṃkhyātigāḥ kambayaḥ |
eko’py atra sa tādṛśaḥ kim abhavat kaḥ pāñcajanyād ṛte
dagdhaḥ kiṃ vā bhavati na masī veti sandehinībhiḥ
na sa virauti na cāpi palāyate
api vajreṇa saṃgharṣam api padbhyāṃ parābhavam |
sahante guṇalobhena ta eva maṇayo yadi ||1717||
samutkṣipto’smīti tvam iha paritāpaṃ tyaja maṇe |
na tyājyā janibhūmir ity alam iha bhrātar maṇīnāṃ gaṇair
yair evāyam akāri vāridhir adho gatvāpi ratnākaraḥ |
naiṣām atra guṇagraho na garimakhyātir na vāghakramo
jātās te punar anyataḥ kṣitibhṛtāṃ mūrdhānam adhyāsate ||1719||
asatkalpās tāvat tribhuvanam ahārhā api guṇāḥ |
sa kiṃ nāsīd abdhau śrutir api kim asya kvacid abhūt ||1720||
vaṇigadhipate kiṃcid brūmas trapām iha mā kṛthāḥ
katham anibhṛtaṃ keyaṃ rītiḥ pure tava samprati |
marakatamaṇiḥ kāco vāyaṃ bhaved iti saṃśaye
iha paricitā jātyandhānām iyaṃ na tavonnatir
yal labhase tad api te śreyaḥ ||1723||
jagaccūḍācumbin marakata sa kas te paribhavaḥ |
yad asmābhis tūṣṇīṃ sthitam iha tavālocanapathe
vikretuṃ vā katham upanataḥ kena deśāntare’smin |
kathaya kim idaṃ jātyā khyātaṃ kim asya varāṭakaiḥ
katibhir athavā labhyaṃ caitat prayojanam asya kim |
bata karatale ratnaṃ kṛtvā viṣīdati vāṇijaḥ ||1726||
sphaṭikaśakalaḥ kiṃ vā neyaṃ śilā kim u saindhavī
kim iti vihitastambho na syād ayaṃ karakopalaḥ |
āghrātaṃ paricumbitaṃ pratimuhur līḍhaṃ ca yac carvitaṃ
kṣiptaṃ vā yadi nīrasatvakupiteneti vyathāṃ mā kṛthāḥ |
he māṇikya tavaitad eva kuśalaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇāmunā
aye muktāratna prasara bahir uddyotaya gṛhān
api kṣoṇīndrāṇāṃ kuru phalavataḥ svān api guṇān |
mahāgambhīro’yaṃ jaladhir iha kas tvāṃ gaṇayati ||1730||
jāyantāṃ vaṇijo vayaṃ tu kanaka tvatkīrtivaitālikāḥ |
te cāmlānamukhena hanta bhavatā dāhacchidā vedanām
kiṃ kurmahe tad api hemanidhe bhavantaṃ
datte na vīkṣitum apīha sa dagdhayakṣaḥ ||1732||
adayaṃ gharṣa śilāyāṃ daha vā dāhena bhindhi lauhena |
he hemakāra kanakaṃ ma māṃ guñjāphalais tulaya ||1733||
vyāpāre’py avikāri yac ca śikhini kṣiptaṃ ca na mlāyasi |
etasyām api śuddhisampadi tulām āropya yat sādhubhir
guñjābhiḥ samakakṣām ity avadhṛtaṃ hā svarṇa kiṃ ceṣṭyatām ||1735||
kallolāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāś ca sahasā nītāḥ parām unnatim |
antaḥ prastarasaṃgraho bahir api bhraśyanti gandhadrumā
bhrātaḥ śoṇa na so’sti yo na hasati tvatsaṃpadāṃ viplave ||1737||
prāyaścittam upācaranti kṛtinaḥ spṛṣṭvaiva yāsāṃ payaḥ |
yā dṛṣṭaiva punāti viśvam akhilaṃ seyam apunar jāhnavī
vicchinnā kvacid āvilā kvacid atisvalpāmbuśocyā kvacit ||1739||
vinīto’yaṃ veśaḥ śamam iva nadīnāṃ kathayati |
tathāpy āsāṃ tais tais tarubhir abhitas tīrapatitaiḥ
sa evāgre buddhau pariṇamati ruddho’py avinayaḥ ||1740||
kiṃ tv āvilaṃ janitam ambu navodakena ||1741||
kati na kati taḍāgāḥ santi kiṃtv asya haṃsa
pravara vahati kas te mānasasya pratiṣṭhām ||1742||
kā vā tasya kathārghitasya saraso yat tīrajanmāpy asau
dūrād eva dṛśoḥ śramaṃ harati naḥ snigdhāvalokas taruḥ ||1743||
saras tīkṣṇaṃ mā bhūs tava kila nisargaḥ śiśirimā |
nirasyantaḥ pānthāṃs tvayi kim api śoṣaṃ vidadhati ||1744||
salīlaṃ haṃsānāṃ pibati nivaho yatra vimalaṃ
jalaṃ mohāt tasmin sarasi rucire cātakayuvā |
svabhāvād garvād vā na pibati payas tasya śakunaiḥ
kim etenoccais tvaṃ bhavati laghimā vāpi sarasaḥ ||1745||
pītaṃ yat prabhavoruvīcivalanair vyāptaṃ samastaṃ jagat |
unnidraiḥ kamalaiḥ payobhir amalair nītvā parāṃ nirvṛtim |
paścāt kṣīṇadhanāṃ vahan nijatanuṃ dhanyo mṛṇālīcchalād
gate śoṣaṃ daivād varasarasi tatraiva taralā
punar api seyam adhasta eva mūrdhni ||1751||
śoṣaṃ dūram upāgatena pathika kleśān muhur mūrcchatā |
majjaddanti patatpatatri sukṛtair etan mayāptaṃ saraḥ ||1752||
yat kūpeṣv api dūranihnutapayoleśeṣu nītaṃ mano
yat khāteṣv api paṅkadurgasalilastokeṣu dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā |
tvām āsādya taḍāga samprati sa me śānto nidāghajvaraḥ ||1754||
bhekaiḥ koṭaraśāyibhir mṛtam iva kṣmāntargataṃ kacchapaiḥ
tasminn eva sarasy akālajaladenāgatya tac ceṣṭitaṃ
chittapasya | (Bp 201, Sv 843, dakṣiṇātyasya; śā.pa. 777, akālajaladasya; su.ra. 1059, dvandūkasya)
pāṭhīna muñca kundadaṃ yad ihāmbu pītvā
kva śakulaśiśo gambhīrāmbhaḥ saras tava janmabhūḥ
kuveṇībaddhaḥ sann anubhava daśām utphalasi kim ||1760||
dṛṣṭvā gatau kuṭilatāṃ vadane viṣaṃ ca |
alam abhimukhair baddhair bhogair alaṃ bhramibhir
dṛśor alam aviralair garjodgārair alaṃ viṣavṛṣṭibhiḥ |
kim iha bhujagāḥ kopāvegair amībhir amudritair
kṣudrās te bhujagāḥ śirāṃsi namayaty ādāya yeṣām idaṃ
jīrṇas tv eṣa phaṇī na yasya kim api tvādṛgguṇīndravrajā
api nadatha nikāmaṃ dardurāḥ kiṃ suvarṇa
sa ciram avaṭasīmni prācya eva krayo vaḥ ||1766||
iyat pṛthvīmātraṃ tad anu ca nabhomaṇḍalam iyad
iyān pātālānto jalam api pṛthivyām iyad iti |
iti jñātvā kūpe viditaviṣayo nāyam aparaḥ
śrutvā kumbhabhuvo muner iha durācāraṃ kam apy adbhutaṃ
sindhor andhukuṭumbi dardurakulaṃ harṣād idaṃ dhyāyati |
gāmbhīryād yadi te na bibhyati na vā trasyanti bhekīśiśor
atrāgatya sukhaṃ vasantu timayo jātānukampā vayam ||1769||
yac cādhomukham akṣiṇī vidadhatā nāgena tūṣṇīṃ sthitaṃ
tan manye viṣamantriṇo bhagavataḥ kasyāpi līlāyitam ||1770||
āmūlaṃ guṇasaṃgrahāt tu nalina tvacceṣṭitaṃ kiṃ stumaḥ |
yac chuṣke sarasi prayāsi vidaśāṃ saṃvāsamaryādayā
dhik kurmo’sya madhuvratasya caritaṃ doṣātanīṃ durdaśāṃ
dṛṣṭvā yas tava padmaṣaṇḍakumudair dhatte rahas tāṇḍavam |
ślāghyas taṃ punar eka eva yad iha prātaḥ samabhyāgate
tāny evollasitāni saiva sakhitā tac caiva koṣārpaṇam ||1773||
kāntis te yadi nirmalā yadi guṇā lakṣmīr yadi sthāyinī
mā gāḥ padma madaṃ tathāpi galitā hy ete śaradvāsarāḥ |
madhye’traiva varāṭakena bhavataḥ stheyaṃ punaḥ kevalam ||1775||
punar api gato raktāśokaṃ kadambataruṃ tataḥ |
tad api suciraṃ sthitvā kunde prayāti saroruhaṃ
yenāmodini kesarasya mukule pītaṃ madhu svecchayā
nītā yena niśā śaśāṅkadhavalā padmodare śāradī |
so’yaṃ bhṛṅgayuvā karīraviṭape badhnāti dṛṣṭiṃ kutaḥ ||1779||
aśoke śokārtaḥ kim asi bakule’py ākulamanā
nirānandaḥ kunde saha ca sahakārair na ramase |
kusumbhe viśrambhaṃ yad iha bhajase kaṇṭakaśatair
te’mī vayaṃ madhuliho bhagavān sa yebhyaḥ
vegād dhāvati mañju guñjati paraṃ tat ko’yam indindaraḥ ||1783||
sakhe bata khalu śivā saṃtuṣṭasya dvirepha tava sthitiḥ ||1784||
rasāle sālambo lavam api lavaṅge na ramate |
priyaṅgau nāsaṅgaṃ racayati na cūte vicarati
prāṇās te yadi vallabhās tad api kiṃ niṣpaṅkajā medinī |
dūrīkṛtya tu paṅkajaṃ madhupa he tasyaiva yad gaṇḍayor
dānāmbhau nirato’si tad vayam aho vaktuṃ ca lajjāmahe ||1786||
prasūnair unnidraiḥ saha bahubhir eva prativanam |
udanyā na kvāpi vyaramad aravinde param amī
iha parimalo yatra vyakto na tatra madhuśriyo
madhu samadhikaṃ yasmiṃs tasmin na gandhasamṛddhayaḥ |
kamalam adhikaṃ smāraṃ smāraṃ viṣīdati ṣaṭpadaḥ ||1790||
dhanyas tvaṃ sahakāra samprati phalaiḥ kākān śukān pūrayan
pūrvaṃ tu tvayi muktamañjaribharonnidre ya indindaraḥ |
ākrīḍann aniśaṃ sa naiti phalitaṃ yat tvāṃ vikaśaikabhuk
taddharmo’sya phalāśayā paricayaḥ kalpadrume’py asti kim ||1791||
śraddhālur na kathaṃ prayātu sahasā mākandam indindaraḥ ||1792||
tādṛk parimalaṃ vetti yadi dhanyo madhuvrataḥ ||1794||
parolakṣā vṛkṣāḥ param iha rasāleṣu rasikaḥ
cumban nūtanaketakīṃ pratimuhur yat kaṇṭakaiḥ kīlitaḥ |
re re cañcalacañcarīka tad idaṃ karmānurūpaṃ phalam ||1796||
asyaiva te phalam aho anayasya bhūtaṃ
kiṃ re bhṛṅga mudhaiva dhāvasi madhupratyāśayā ketakīḥ |
ketakyāḥ kusumasya sādhu sakalaṃ doṣas tv ayaṃ kevalaṃ
biddhā na praviśanti yan madhuliho dvāri sthitaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ ||1800||
karīndraṃ paulomīpatir api ca lebhe jalanidheḥ |
tvayā kiṃ tallabdhaṃ kathaya mathito mandaragire
śaraṇyaḥ śailānāṃ yad ayam adayaṃ ratnanilayaḥ ||1802||
dṛṣṭā na dviradāvalī na camarīpucchānilaḥ sevito
nītāḥ kṣauṇibhṛto na pādapadavīṃ dhig daivam ambhonidhau
magnasyaiva girīndraputra bhavato maināka yātaṃ vayaḥ ||1803||
ekasyāyam udeti mūrdhani girer anyasya caiva kramād
astaṃ yāti kalānidhis tad anayor astaḥ praśasto’calaḥ |
ko nāmodayinaṃ karoti na śiromāṇikyam astaṃ punar
yātaṃ yaḥ kurute bhavān iva sa duṣprāpo’yam uccaiḥ śirāḥ ||1804||
sūraṃ mūrdhni dadhātu pūrvaśikharī naivātra citrodayaḥ |
prāptās taṃ divase gatāyuṣi parikṣīṇāṃśum etaṃ punaḥ
kurvan mauligataṃ karoti caramaś citraṃ dharitrīdharaḥ ||1805||
yatra sthitā hi taravas taravas ta eva |
mātaṅgāc chataśaḥ puṣāṇa śataśo vyālīsutān saṃvṛṇu
tvatkīrtis tu na candanakṣitiruhād anyaḥ samālokyate ||1808||
bhrātaś candanaśaila muñca jaḍatāṃ vistārayan saurabhaṃ
gacchann eva vilāsibhir marud ayaṃ nirvājam āliṅgyatām |
itas tāvan netre valaya malayādre nidhir apām
athātmānaṃ kiṃ na smarasi kulaśailaṃ kim ayaśaḥ
tvadvāsāya sa eva kīrtikanakajyotsno girīṇāṃ patiḥ ||1811||
smero’yaṃ śarabhaḥ parāṃ hṛdi ghṛṇām āyāti jātasmayaḥ ||1812||
īśānāṃ sarabhaḥ kathaṃ sa hi bhaved arvāg girāṃ gocaraḥ ||1814||
hate vā nīte vā bata laghutarāṃ śocyapadavīṃ
mṛgendraṃ vā mṛgāriṃ vā hariṃ vyāharatāṃ janaḥ |
kiṃ jātair bahubhiḥ karoti hariṇī putrair akāryakṣamaiḥ
putreṇāpi vanāntare vicalatā yaiḥ sārdham uttrasyati |
tattejaś ca tad ūrjitaṃ sa ca nagonmāthī ninādo mahān |
sarvaṃ viśvajayaikasādhanam idaṃ labdhaṃ na kiṃcit kṛtam ||1818||
itthaṃ na kiṃcid api cāru mṛgādhipasya
tejas tu tat kim api yena jagadvarākam ||1819||
prakṛtyā garjanti tvayi tu bhuvanaṃ nirmadamadaḥ |
prasīda prārambhād virama vinayethāḥ krudham imāṃ
hare jīmūtānāṃ dhvair iyam udīrṇo na kariṇām ||1820||
sphītaṃ na varṣma nakharair draḍhimā na labdhaḥ |
nādas tathāpi mṛdur eva sa ko’pi siṃha
cakṣuḥ kopāt kuṭilam arūṇaṃ bibhrataḥ siṃhaśāvā
haṃho siṃhakiśoraka tyajasi cet kopaṃ vadāmas tadā
hatvaivaṃ kariṇāṃ sahasram akhilaṃ kiṃ labdham āyuṣmatā |
itthaṃ kartum ahaṃ samartha iti ced dhiṅ mūrkha kiṃ sarvato
nālaṃ plāvayituṃ jagajjalanidhir yad dhairyam ālambate ||1825||
tad bhoḥ krīḍata kuñjarādhipatayaḥ svacchandam antar mṛgāḥ
kampaṃ muñcata keśarī vidhivaśāt prāpto jarādurduśām ||1826||
nabhasi caratām abhodānāṃ niśamya ravaṃ manāg
kṣitiruham aṭat kārān pārśve śṛṇoti sa keśarī ||1827||
pratyekaṃ sa hi mūrcchayā nipatito gandhadvipānāṃ gaṇaḥ |
prārambhābhyadhikakriyasya sa khalu prācyaḥ pracāro hareḥ |
aṅgair aṅgabhṛto dalanti darato gandhena gandhadvipāḥ ||1830||
tadā jānīmas te karivara madodgāram asamaṃ
tāpo nāpagatas tṛṣā na ca kṛśā dhautā na dhūlī tanor
na svacchandam akāri kandakavalaḥ kā nāma kelīkathā |
dūronmuktakareṇa hanta kariṇā spṛṣṭā na vā padminī
kolavyūhaḥ spṛśati sukhitāṃ yatra tatrāpi kuñje |
ko nāmāsmin bata hatavane pādapas tādṛg uccair
kandair yasya sadāśitaṃ bhavavidhiḥ krīḍākariṇyaḥ śatam |
talpaṃ śaivalinīdalāni milito daivān marūṇāṃ taṭe
jihmas tāmyati saṃsmarann anudinaṃ vindhyaṃ sa gandhadvipaḥ ||1834||
jighṛkṣur vā muktāṃ daśanam athavā hanti kariṇaṃ
purāṇaḥ pratyagraṃ phalam iha hi vikrīya katicit
sa nāgendro jīvan kati kati na lakṣāṇi labhate ||1835||
na dṛṣṭas tvaṃ daivād apasara sudūraṃ drutam itaḥ |
svacchandaṃ gamitaḥ sukhena katibhiḥ kālo na dantāvalaiḥ |
dhig jāto’si tadātra dagdhasamaye dantin yadā nodakaṃ
no vṛkṣā na tṛṇāni kevalam ayaṃ dāvānalaḥ krīḍati ||1838||
he nāgendra pulindapattanam itaḥ pārśve sudūre girir
valmīkasya na kasyacit tava padāropān na rūpāntaram |
gale pāśas tīvraś caraṇayugayugme ca nigaḍo
na jānīmo mūḍha dviradavara kasmāt tava madaḥ ||1841||
vimuñca svācchandyād apanayatu tāvat tṛṣam imām ||1842||
taṃ dānāvasare tu mattamadhupa vyālolagaṇḍaṃ gajaṃ
sānandaṃ sabhayaṃ ca paśyati muhur dvāre sthitas tāpasaḥ ||1843||
kṣīyante yadi koṭayo’py apacayaḥ kiṃ tena bhūmībhujām |
grāmyām agre kareṇuṃ svayam upanayatā yena baddho’si pāśair
yena kṣuṇṇaṃ śiras te sṛṇibhir amasṛṇair yena bāhyaḥ kṛto’si |
jantūn abhyeṣi hantuṃ tvam asi gajapate satyam eko madāndhaḥ ||1845||
kṣutkṣāmo vikalaḥ karī kṣitibhṛtaḥ pādāntike prasthitaḥ |
nirmagnaḥ kim ayaṃ karoti bhagavān yasya pratīpo vidhiḥ ||1846||
śītāṃśoḥ śriyam āvahanti gamanād bhraśyanti yasyācalāḥ |
jānīmaḥ kim akāṇḍacaṇḍimaguṇān daivasya yena kṣaṇān
katham api patitas tvaṃ dustare paṅkarāśau
krudhā dhāvan magno hradapayasi kaṣṭaṃ karipatiḥ ||1849||
na paśyaty evāśāḥ śrayati na viṣādaṃ na manasā
saumddhāre śaktaṃ bhuvi kam api nānyaṃ gaṇayati |
re revātaṭakelilampaṭavapḥ śokaṃ vṛthā mā kṛthāḥ
kumbhin kumbhasamāhṛtaṃ piba payo bandhyaiva vindhyasmṛtiḥ |
ghāsagrāsaṃ gṛhāṇa tyaja gajakalabha premabandhaṃ kariṇyāṃ
tyakto vindhyagiriḥ pitā bhagavatī māteva revānadī
tvallobhān nanu hastini svayam idaṃ bandhāya dattaṃ vapus
tvaṃ dūre dhriyase luṭhanti ca śiraḥpīṭhe kaṭhorāṅkuśāḥ ||1853||
cintāṃ ye janayanti cetasi paraṃ smṛtvā svayūthaṃ vane
ayi kṣudro mābhūn matimahimagarvo manasi vaḥ
karī yāto bandhaṃ yad iha vinayas tatra vijayī |
ayaṃ krodhādhmātas tyajati vinayaṃ cen madavaśāt
tataḥ skandhāvāraṃ na kim akhilam evākulayati ||1855||
śānte’pi svayam eva dāvaśikhini krūraṃ kirātādhipe
cāpaṃ saṅkalayaty api ślathayati vyādhe ca tāṃ vāgurām |
nirdagdhaṃ vapur āhatāni parito marmāṇi rugṇā gatiḥ ||1856||
nādatse haritāṅkurān kvacid api sthairyaṃ na yad gāhase
yat paryākulalocano’si karuṇaṃ kūjan diśaḥ paśyasi |
vanyaiḥ prāṇini kānaneṣu hariṇas tadgātravairī nijaḥ
krūro’raṇyapatis tad atra śaraṇaṃ śānto’sty adūre muniḥ |
ity asminn upasedivān ayam asāv asyaiva durdaivato
mā bhaiṣīr iti bhāṣaṇe’py akaruṇo jāto’tha vācaṃyamaḥ ||1858||
nāsanne’pi dadāti śaṣpavipine kṣāme dṛśau na kṣipaty
na svastho bata kautukād api suhṛdgoṣṭhīṣu tiṣṭhāsati
krūravyādhakuleṣu hanta piśitaiḥ svair iva vairī mṛgaḥ ||1860||
tyaktaṃ janmavanaṃ tṛṇāṅkaravatī māteva muktā sthalī
mṛgyantaḥ padavīṃ tathāpy akaruṇā vyādhā na muñcanti mām ||1861||
chittvā pāśam apāsya kūṭaracanāṃ bhittvā balād vāgurāṃ
kūpāntaḥpatitaḥ karotu viguṇe kiṃ vā vidhau pauruṣam ||1862||
mṛtgaḥ paścād ālokayati ca muhur yāti ca muhuḥ ||1863||
bhuvo vanyā magnāḥ śiśur ayam adṛṣṭavyatikaraḥ
muhuḥ paśyan majjaty akaruṇa tathāpi praharasi ||1864||
yady etad vipinaṃ vipannam ahaha kṣuṇṇaṃ kim etat saras
tac cet kiṃ punar agrato nanu dhanur dhvānaḥ paṭīyān ayam |
vegād dūravinirgato’pi sapadi vyāvṛtya dhāvan mṛgo
gacchantīṃ smṛtiśeṣatām upagataḥ snehasya kiṃ duṣkaram ||1866||
ito vyādho dhāvaty ayam anupadaṃ cakritadhanuḥ |
ito’py agre tiṣṭhaty ayam ajagaro vistṛtamukhaḥ
kva yāyāt kiṃ kuryān mṛgaśiśur ayaṃ daivavaśagaḥ ||1869||
vyomārdhe jvalito raviḥ kavalitaṃ dāvānalaiḥ kānanaṃ
dhūmyābhir na diśaḥ sphuranti paritaḥ panthāḥ śilādanturaḥ |
itthaṃ śoṇitasiktasṛkkaṇi yathā prāṇaṃ mṛge dhāvati
māṃ muñca vāgurika yāmi kuru prasādam |
etan na tāṇḍavaya sairibha kānanaṃ ca |
nāmībhiḥ prasavaiḥ svayaṃ nipatitair bhūmau vidhatte dhṛtiṃ
janma svodarapūraṇaṃ ca vighasair na sparśayogyaṃ vapuḥ |
tan mṛṣṭaṃ sakalaṃ tvayādya śunaka kṣoṇīpater ājñayā
ślāghyā yasya gayāśiraḥ sahacarī tulyo’śvamedhena yaḥ |
ucchrāyo janabhīti hetur adhikaṃ vaikṛtyam udgrīvatā
yasyoccaiḥ kaṭukaṇṭakapraṇayitā dhik kaṣṭam uṣṭre paśau
śākhānām upari sthitaiḥ śakunibhir dūrād gṛhītā diśaḥ
sadyomuktaphalair vivṛtya kapibhiḥ paśyadbhir eva sthitam |
chāyāpās tapariśramaiś ca pathikair ātmā paraṃ rakṣito
mūrdhāropaṇasatkṛtair diśi diśi kṣudrair vihaṅgair drutaṃ
hā kaṣṭaṃ phalalolupair apasṛtaṃ śākhāmṛgaiś cañcalair
tvām ālokya subhūruhaṃ khalu vayaṃ mārgaṃ vihāyāgatāḥ |
vyākurmahe bahu kim asya taroḥ sadaiva
nāmany anta tadātanīm api nijacchāyākṣitiṃ taiḥ punas
teṣām eva tale kṛtajñacaritaiḥ śuṣyadbhir apy āsyate ||1885||
yasmāt tvayā na vihito viduṣāṃ niḥśeṣas
tasmin kalpatarau stabdhe labdhenāpi phalena kim ||1887||
patrāṇi prathamaṃ drutāni vikulair utkhātamūlaḥ kramāt
kīṭaiḥ kalpamahīruhaḥ sa patito bhagnāḥ śataṃ vallayaḥ |
pūrvāśādhipatiḥ prasīdati sa ced devo dayāvān hariḥ ||1888||
ślāghyas tatra sa eva kalpaviṭapī yatrāsate’mī guṇāḥ |
saṃkalpāḥ phaladohadāni phalitaṃ ratnāni vṛttir jagat
saṃkalpānuvidhāyi yasya phalitaṃ kas tasya dhatte tulāṃ
dhig jātiṃ drumasaṃkathāsu yad asau kalpadrumāpi drumaḥ ||1890||
śramacchittyai chāyāṃ bhaja pathika he candanataror
iha vyālavrātaḥ punar iti bhayaṃ mā khalu kṛthāḥ |
svanair yeṣāṃ ramyair api hi phaṇinaḥ kvāpy apasṛtāḥ ||1891||
āmodais te diśi diśi gatair dūram ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ
sākṣāl lakṣmīṃ tava malayaja draṣṭum abhyāgatāḥ smaḥ |
kiṃ paśyāmaḥ subhaga bhavataḥ krīḍati kroḍa eva
vyālas tubhyaṃ bhavatu kuśalaṃ muñca naḥ sādhayāmaḥ ||1892||
kṣiptaś cen malayācalendra bhavataḥ pādopajīvī nijas
tan niryātu jahātu pannagakulaṃ tāpaṃ nihantu śriyaṃ
dhattāṃ vindatu vandyatāṃ trijagatāṃ tvatkīrtim unmudrayan ||1893||
kakubhi kakubhi bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ vilokya vilokitaṃ
adhikam adhikaṃ yat saurabhyaṃ tanoti manoharam ||1894||
kva malayataṭī janmasthānaṃ kva te ca vanecarāḥ
kva ca kharaśilāpaṭṭe ghṛṣṭiḥ kva paṅkasarūpatā
malayaja sakhe mā gāḥ khedaṃ guṇās tava vairiṇaḥ ||1895||
chāyām asya niṣevya pippalataror ākṛṣya śākhāḥ śataṃ
bhuktaṃ prāg iti lajjayā gajapate kiṃ nātra viśramyate |
daivenedṛśayoga eva ghaṭito yat tvādṛśāṃ koṭibhis
tādṛk tādṛg ayaṃ kṛtaḥ punar abhūd etādṛśaḥ pallavaiḥ ||1896||
sanmārgo’yam alaṅkṛtaḥ kim aparaṃ tvaṃ mūrtibhedo hareḥ |
aśvatthasya gataḥ sukhena jagatāṃ vandyasya janmagrahaḥ ||1898||
sākṣān naiṣa karoti kām api mudaṃ nādṛtya hanty āpado
na prīṇāti manīṣiṇāṃ śravaṇam apy āśvāsanāsūktibhiḥ |
śākhā vanyamataṅgajair na karabhair āsvādya muktā tvacaḥ |
sthāṇuḥ kevalam asti pippalataros tatrāpi śītāturair
tais tair janmaprabhṛti viditair dohadaiḥ prākprayatnāt
siktvā siktvā katham api ghaṭīyantramuktaiḥ payobhiḥ |
tatra snehaṃ tyajasi kim ivodyānapāla kṣaṇena ||1901||
ekaḥ klāntajanāśrayo vijayase cūta tvam urvīruhāṃ
dhig daivaṃ bhavato’pi kīṭapaṭalair antaḥ praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ ||1902||
he cūtadruma kiṃ mudhaiva madhupān prīṇāsi kiṃ kokilān
tān ullāsaya pallavān anudinaṃ yair āhitām unnatiṃ
snigdhaṃ pallavito ghanaṃ mukulitaḥ sphāracchadaṃ puṣpitaḥ
sotkarṣaṃ phalito bhṛśaṃ ca vinataḥ ko’py eṣa cūtadrumaḥ ||1904||
sugandhiḥ ko’pi syāt kusumasamaye ko’pi viṭapī
sthitvā phalāni sadṛśāni vidhehi mā vā
dṛṣṭvaiva te mukham aśoka vayaṃ viśokāḥ ||1906||
saṃbādhāś ca śataṃ vasantasamaye vaiśeṣikāḥ śākhinaḥ |
kaṅkelliḥ śriyam asya puṣyati tathā kaḥ prekṣaṇīyoparaḥ ||1907||
kiyantaḥ santy ete jagati taravaḥ ko’pi na punaḥ
pramodād antaś ced valati phalavāñchā tava tadā
keṣāṃcit kusumodayād anu vinā tenāpi keṣāṃcana
sphāyante dharaṇīruhām iha dinair dvitraiḥ phalaśreṇayaḥ |
śrīr ity eva phalād ṛte bata gataḥ kaṅkellijanmagrahaḥ ||1909||
kiṃ te namratayā kim unnatatayā kiṃ te ghanacchāyayā
kiṃ te pallavalīlayā kim anayā cāśoka puṣpaśriyā |
na svādūni mṛdūni khādati phalāny ākaṇṭham utkaṇṭhitaḥ ||1910||
nāmodaḥ kusume phaleṣu na rasas tat kiṃ mudhā śālmale
kāṇḍaṃ nirbharam āvṛṇoṣi viṣamair āmūlataḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ ||1911||
nirgandhaṃ kusumaṃ phalaṃ kṣudhi mudhā patrair na hṛdyaṃ kvacit |
vṛddhir gṛdhraparigrahāya tad aho vaktavyam anyat paraṃ
bhrātaḥ śālmalivṛkṣa nāsti bhavataḥ kiṃcin mahattvocitam ||1912||
kiṃ re jālma javena śālmaliphalapratyāśayā dhāvasi |
adhvāno’pi nimīlitākṣam aṭatā na prekṣaṇīyāḥ puraḥ ||1913||
prakāṇḍaśrīr vācām api na viṣayaḥ śālmalitaros
etasmin kusume svabhāvamahati prāyo mahīyaḥ phalaṃ
ramyaṃ svādu sugandhi śītalam alaṃ prāptavyam ity āśayā |
yac chāyām atanuṃ tanoṣi madhuraiḥ prīṇāsi yat tvaṃ phalair
yan namno’si yad unnato’si cature yad vartase vartmani |
yat pānthair aparair api pratipathaṃ prastūyase prāyaśas
tan nātha kṣitija tvam eva pathikair viśrāntaye cintyase ||1916||
vahati pavanaḥ pāṃśūtkarṣī kṛśaḥ saraso rasaḥ |
ahaha na jahaty ete prāṇāṃs tadaiva kim adhvagā
yadi na bhavataḥ patracchatraṃ viśanti mahīruhaḥ ||1917||
āsīd yas tava putrakas tricaturaiḥ patrāṅkurair āvṛto
so’yaṃ saṃprati vāsaraiḥ katipayair adhvany apuṇyoccayaiḥ
viśrāmadrumaṃ kathyatāṃ tava vipatkāle kva te sāmpratam |
yāsāṃ chedanam antareṇa patito nāyaṃ kuṭhāras tvayi ||1919||
kiṃ jāto’si catuṣpathe yadi ghanacchāyo’si kiṃ chāyayā
yuktaś cet phalito’si kiṃ phalabharair āḍhyo’si kasmān nataḥ |
he sad vṛkṣa sahasva samprati śikhāśākhyāśatākarṣaṇa
itīdaṃ jānīmaś ciram apathabhājas tava taro
tathāpy asyām akṣmāruhi bhuvi bhavān eva śaraṇam ||1921||
yad api kiṃ kvacid uñctam āśu tat
āśyānair galitaṃ dalair bata kathāśeṣāḥ prasūnaśriyo
nodbhedo’pi phalaṃ prati pratidiśaṃ yātā nirāśāḥ khagāḥ |
tūṣṇīm asti tathāpy akālajaladaṃ dhyāyan marukṣmāruhaḥ ||1923||
nāsāgre pavanaḥ paraṃ nayanayor āpaḥ kryā cetasi
sthairyaṃ dāhabhareṣu kiṃ nu viditā naitā marukṣoṇayaḥ |
kalyāṇaṃ naḥ kim adhikam ito jīvanārthaṃ yad asmāl
kiṃ tv etasminn aśanipiśunair ātapair ākulānām
nyagrodhe phalaśālini sphuṭarasaṃ kiṃcit phalaṃ pacyate
bījāny aṅkuragocarāṇi katicit sidhyanti tasminn api |
ekas teṣv api kaścid aṅkuravaro badhnāti tām unnatiṃ
yām adhyan yajanaḥ svamātaram iva klānticchide dhāvati ||1926||
spṛśākāśaṃ sarvāḥ sthagaya pariṇāhair api diśaḥ |
tathāpi dhvāṅkṣebhyo na punar itaraḥ ko’pi vihagaḥ
phalārthī nimba tvāṃ prakṛtivirasaṃ dhāvati mudā ||1928||
kṣudhottaptaiḥ kukṣiṃbharibhir iha sevā tava kṛtāḥ |
na dṛṣṭā te’smābhiḥ panasa pariṇāme virasatā ||1929||
yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro’py abhimataḥ |
na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ sapadi hatadaivāt samucitāṃ
kim ikṣor doṣo’yaṃ sa punar aguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ ||1930||
śamīṣaṇḍas tāvat khadiravanam asmāc ca paratas
itaḥ karkandhūnāṃ vanam anu yavāsasthalam idaṃ
kva kalyāṇaḥ panthāḥ pathika hatadeśo marur ayam ||1931||
he dhārādhara viśvam eva bhavatā sādhāraṇaṃ siñcatā
vāstavyo bhava mā punar marupathaprasthānavāñchāṃ kṛthāḥ |
labhyante puruṣaiḥ paraṃ katipayaiḥ kaupāḥ payobindavaḥ ||1933||
nanv ete marumedinīparisarā yair asti gopāyitaṃ
krūrair na svaparopakāri sakalaṃ p¸atālamūle payaḥ ||1934||
pāyaṃ pāyaṃ piba piba payaḥ siñca siñcāṅgam aṅgaṃ
bhūyo bhūyaḥ kuru kuru sakhe majjanonmajjanāni |
sindhur dūrībhavati purato māravaḥ pāntha panthāḥ ||1935||
caṇḍānilavyatikare kva bhavān kva te vā ||1936||
tyajaitāṃ sīmānaṃ vasati munir asyāṃ kalaśabhūḥ |
udañcatkope’smin sa jaladhir api sthāsyati na te
yataḥ pāyaṃ pāyaṃ salilam iha śauryaṃ prathayasi ||1937||
ākalpaṃ yadi varṣasi pratidinaṃ dhārāsahasrais tathāpy
ambhodhau kalayaty agādhajaṭhare kas tāvakīnaṃ śramam |
ambhoda kṣaṇamātram ujjhasi payaḥ pṛṣṭhe yadi kṣmābhṛtāṃ
tat kiṃ na prasaranti nirjharasaridvyājena te kīrtayaḥ ||1938||
krīḍābhir na payoda gantum ucitaṃ velābhiṣiktadrumān ||1939||
kim ebhir nirghoṣaiḥ sṛja jhaṭiti jhātkāri salilam ||1940||
guṇaṃ vā doṣaṃ vā gaṇayati na dānavyasanitā ||1943||
sa cen mūrcchanmatsyāvalir api nipītaḥ patir apāṃ
tato vāntaḥ kiṃ tadvyavasitam agastyena tapasā |
ghanaḥ ślāghyaḥ pītvā kiyad api payas tasya hi vaman
bibharty etad viśvaṃ tam api kila ratnākarayati ||1944||
dhig dhik tān udadhīs tumanstu jaladaṃ yebhyaḥ samabhyarthitaiḥ
pāthobhiḥ padavīṃ nidāghavikalāṃ yaḥ plāvayan varṣati |
yady asyāpy udare bhaved agaṇitas tāvan maṇīnāṃ gaṇas
tat kiṃ naiṣa karoti ratnakarakāsāraiḥ samṛddhaṃ jagat ||1945||
marīcir yady eṣā vahasi kim u khadyotanivahān |
kim ete kartāraḥ kumudavanam unnidram udadheḥ
kim ānandaṃ mandīkṛtatimiravṛndāḥ kim u diśaḥ ||1946||
koṭiṃ kām api sāmprataṃ malinimā nītas tvayā yan nijaḥ |
yat sambhūya bakair amībhir ahaha tvaṃ bhūṣaṇotprokṣaṇād
sarvāṃs trāsaya garjitaiḥ kalagiro haṃsān samutsāraya |
drāg āskandaya mitramaṇḍalam alaṃ sadvartma saṃdūṣaya
śrīmann abda nayaty ayaṃ na pavano yāvad daśāṃ kām api ||1948||
taḍittejaḥpuñjair janayasi dṛśoḥ kām api rujaṃ
tad asyaivāmbhodher jaladhara na dhairyaṃ kalayasi ||1949||
ambho na cej jalada muñcasi mā vimuñca
vajraṃ punaḥ kṣipasi nirdaya kasya hetoḥ ||1950||
ghanair muktā dhārāḥ sapadi payasas tān prati muhuḥ |
khagānāṃ ke meghāḥ ka iha vihagā vā jalamucām
dhvanir api madhuras te na śrutaś cātakena ||1952||
abdhir yady avadhīrito na tu tadā tasmān nipīyāmbudair
tat te nistrapanīcataiva mucitā nirvaktum etat kathaṃ
vidmaḥ kena guṇena māniṣu punaḥ sāraṅga saṃgīyate ||1954||
tṛṣṇārtaḥ kila rauti yāvad asakṛt toyāśayā cātakaḥ |
ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindum anilaś cet |
dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ ||1956||
sindhor eva kiyaj jalaṃ kalasabhūr yatpāṇipātre dadhau
tat pītaṃ kiyad ambudaiḥ kiyad ito vāntaṃ kiyad vā sthitam |
tat pātuṃ vyavasāyadīnamanaso dhāvanty amī sambhramād
āvartair marutāṃ tad apy apahṛtaṃ dhik cātakān dhig vidhim ||1958||
bījair aṅkuritaṃ latābhir uditaṃ vallībhir ujjṛmbhitaṃ
kandaiḥ kandalitaṃ janaiś ca muditaṃ dhārādhare varṣati |
bhrātaś cātaka pātakaṃ kim api te samyaṅ na jānīmahe
yenāsmin na patanti cañcupuṭake dvitrāḥ payobindavaḥ ||1959||
ayi cātaka cañcupuṭāt skhalayati jaladodabindum anilaś cet |
dvija eva bhāgyahīno jīvanadātā kṛtī jaladaḥ ||1960||
viṣvakplāvayatā jaganti jalada prītas tvayā vāribhiḥ
sānandāḥ stumahe cirāya caritaṃ tasyaiva yena tvayi
kṣīṇo’pi kvacid eva nāmbhasi manāg āro’pi cañcū puṭaḥ ||1961||
kvacid api yadi dṛṣṭaṃ vārivāhaṃ vihāya |
tvaṃ garja nāma visṛjāmbuda nāmbu nāma
etasya paśya vihagasya gatis tvam eva ||1963||
tyaktvā toyada cātakena bhavataḥ sevā samālambitā |
gāḍhaṃ garjasi vajram ujjhasi taḍillekhābhir ātarjasi ||1964||
ārūḍhaḥ padam ādareṇa jalada tvāṃ yācate cātakaḥ |
yady asmai vimukho bhavān api payodhārāḥ karītuṃ tataḥ
śayyākṣālanavāri vāri sarasaḥ klībasya nindyaṃ satām |
nadyas tāḥ śataśo’nyayoṣita iti tyaktopabhogo yuvā
eka eva khago mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ |
pipāsito vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram ||1968||
tṛṣārtāṃ śocantīṃ na gaṇayati dīnāṃ gṛhavatīṃ
na dīnaḥ pakṣābhyāṃ sthagayati śiśūn ālapati vā |
kulasya svasyāyaṃ pathi na padam alpaṃ ślathayati ||1969||
yad asmād asmābhiś ciravihitasevair api ghanād
dviṣanto veśantaṃ bhṛśam apalapantaḥ patim apām
apārthīkurvantaḥ saritam anuyāmas tad api tam ||1970||
gataṃ tad gāmbhīryaṃ taṭam upagataṃ jālikaśataiḥ
sakhe haṃsottiṣṭha tvaritam amuto gaccha sarasaḥ |
haṃsās te’pi sakhe taḍāga bhavataḥ krīḍāsahasrāviṇo
haṃsena sāśru parivṛtya gataṃ nu līnam ||1973||
kakubhi kakubhi dhvāntakṣubdhaṃ vitatya vidhāya ca
śrutipuṭabhido garjāḥ śreyaḥ kṛtaṃ param ambudaiḥ |
taṭam upagataṃ padme padme niveśitam ānanaṃ
ko’py asti nāma yadi nānyagatir bakoṭaḥ |
na sthātum arhati bhavān iha rājahaṃsa ||1976||
sānandī bhava rājahaṃsa bhavataḥ syān nāma pakṣonnatiḥ |
mañjīreṇa tathāpi ca dhvanir ayaṃ nirgīyate līlayā
dhik kubjāmbujavetravetasavanāny etāni yat te pika
vyāhāraiḥ paṇayād amīṣu madhurair ebhiḥ kim unmudritaiḥ |
yeṣām asthitbhir apy upāttamukulair āviṣkriyante mudaḥ ||1981||
bhūmau nopaviśanti ye khalu rajaḥ saṃparkatarkād iva |
teṣām apy atipūjanīyavapuṣāṃ nūnaṃ pikānām iyaṃ
dhik kaṣṭaṃ parapuṣṭateti kim api prācāṃ phalaṃ karmaṇām ||1982||
mākandān avalokya yaḥ pratidiśaṃ sānandam utkūjitaḥ |
vācālān upalabhya kokilayuvā jātaḥ sa vācaṃyamaḥ ||1983||
dāty ūhāḥ sarasaṃ rasantu subhagaṃ gāyantu kekābhṛtaḥ
kādambāḥ kalam ālapantu madhuraṃ kūjantu koyaṣṭayaḥ |
patanavidhaye pakṣau syātāṃ na yāvad imau kṣamau |
śuka śokaṃ nanu mā vṛthā kṛthāḥ |
ayi śākunika kṛto’ñjalir itare na katīha jīvanopāyāḥ |
hatvā śukān kim etad vipinam asārasvataṃ kuruṣe ||1987||
śukasya paritoṣāya na vanaṃ na ca pattanam ||1988||
bhrātaḥ kīra kim atra nīrasataruskandhe madhusyandibhir
naite dāḍimaśākhinaḥ pariṇatair yeṣāṃ phalair antaraṃ
tad viśrāmyatu naḥ phalaṃ kim api yad vandyena deyaṃ tvayā |
daivād eṣa yadi pradīptagaralas tvāṃ dandaśūko daśed
viśvālokakarī tadā śarad iyaṃ syād eva dṛgvañcitā ||1991||
ājanmaiva tamaḥ suhṛtkuṭilatā vaktre girāṃ nirgamo
dhig dhātaḥ sasṛje sa eva malinaḥ krūraḥ kathaṃ kauśikaḥ
sṛṣṭo vā kim akalpyatāsya bhavatā kalpāntam āyuḥ sthiram ||1992||
bhrāmyadbhyo’pi gṛhe gṛhe kaṭutām apy ālapadbhyo giraṃ
gṛdhnubhyo’pi balād amedhyam athavāvajñāṃ vrajadbhyo’pi ca |
śayyotthāyam upāsate vasatim ity etāvatāyaṃ nṬṇāṃ
kākebhyo balir asti kokilabaliḥ kenāpi nākarṇitaḥ ||1995||
sārāsāravicāriṇī matir iha grāme janānāṃ kutaḥ |
tad yāvad vayam asya sekasalilaṃ voḍhuṃ na mṛṣyāmahe
tāvat satvaram eva pāmarajana grāmād ito gamyatām ||1996||
dantair upatitaṃ sphuranti valayo niṣkālimānaḥ kacāḥ
śīrṇadeham apetam eva karaṇagrāmeṇa luptā matiḥ |
bhrātar vaidya vidhīyate tava kiyad yāvan mayā bheṣajam ||1997||
panthāḥ prajvalitaḥ sphuranti purataḥ krūrāḥ kṛśānutviṣaḥ
tadbrahmāṇḍam iha kvacit kvacid api kṣoṇī kvacin nīradās
te dvīpāntaraśālino jaladhayaḥ kvāpi kvacit parvatāḥ |
āścaryaṃ gaganasya ko’pi mahimā sarvair amībhiḥ sthitair
dūre pūraṇam asya śūnyam iti yannāmāpi nācchāditam ||1999||
na yātāḥ ke pāraṃ sati jaladhibandhe kapibhaṭāḥ |
manujas turaṅgagāvau paśavaḥ pārāvato balākā ca |
padmākaraḥ praśastaḥ sarasī cakraś ca cakravākī ca |
kavidānaṃ guṇigarvo vāṇī kāvyaṃ ca kāvyamātsaryam |
tat sacaṭu daridragṛhī tadgṛhiṇī tadgṛhaṃ jarāvṛddhaḥ |
tāpasabahuviṣayaśamau jñānī bhavitavyatā ca daivaṃ ca |
dhārādhvānamanoharaṃ sakhi payo gāṃ dogdhi dāmodaraḥ ||2001||
bhogaśroṇir udasyati pratimuhuḥ kūpād apaḥ pāmarī ||2004||
protthāya drāṅ nirīhaḥ kṣaṇam atha vapur āsyānupūrvaṃ dhunoti ||2008||
paścād aṅghrī prasārya trikanativitataṃ drāghayitvāṅgam uccair
mandaṃ śabdāyamāno vilikhati śayanād utthitaḥ kṣmāṃ khureṇa ||2009||
utthāpya vaktram abhihatya muhuś ca vatsāḥ |
utkarṇaḥ kurute kramaṃ karipatau krūrākṛtiḥ keśarī ||2016||
kutrāpy aklāntigāmī kvacid atipihitaḥ kvāpi tu gāgramātraś
dhanyaṃ kāntam upāntavartinam iyaṃ pārāvatī sevate ||2022||
kiṃcit kuñcitalocanāṃ sahacarīṃ saṃcumbya cañcvā ciraṃ
pakṣābhyāṃ sahitau prasārya caraṇāv ekaikaśaḥ pārśvayor
gatvā puraḥ katicid eva padāni vegād
harati purattaḥ pārśve paścād valantam anārataṃ
udgrīvastimitekṣanas tata itaḥ paśyan nilīya sthitaṃ
payasi sarasaḥ svacche matsyāñjighṛkṣur itas tato
valitanayanaṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ padaṃ nidadhad bakaḥ |
dalam api calat sapratyāśaṃ muhur muhur īkṣate ||2030||
kāmaṃ kukkuṭayor dvayaṃ drutapadaṃ krūrakramaṃ yudhyate ||2034||
nyagbhūtāṃ caṭakaḥ priyām abhisaraty udvepamānaḥ svayam ||2035||
sevyo’yaṃ malayācalaḥ kim api me cetaḥ karoty utsukam ||2036||
tvaṅnaddhāmpi latāgṛhāṇi dadhatī kāṃcin mucaṃ yacchati ||2041||
cetaḥ samprati kampayanti parito gambhīrabhīmā bhuvaḥ ||2043||
dhanyeyaṃ tamasā nadī harati me dṛṣṭāpi mārgaśramam ||2051||
saṃtrāsaṃ janayanti vindhyabhidurā vārāṃ pravāhāḥ puraḥ |
svarābhir gopībhir diśi diśi samudghūrṇam aniśam ||2055||
karau dhatte madhyaṃ kalayati samāśliṣyati kucā
kacān apy ādatte priya iva taḍāgo mṛgadṛśām ||2059||
asmāc citraśikhaṇḍibhiś ca parame parvaṇy upādīyate
yasminn acchatayā nidhāya nayane martyaiḥ sakautūhalaṃ
tīrāt tīram upaiti rauti karuṇaṃ cintāṃ samālambate
kāntāṃ dhyāyati niścalena manasā yogīva yuktekṣaṇaḥ |
svaccāyām avalokya kūjati punaḥ kānteti hṛṣṭaḥ khago
dhanyās te khalu ye vimuktaviṣayāḥ kaṣṭaṃ paraṃ saṅginām ||2066||
satrāsaṃ muhur īkṣate ca cakito haṃsaṃ himāṃśubhramān
na svāsthyaṃ bhajate divāpi virahāśaṅkī rathāṅgāhvayaḥ ||2067||
mitre kvāpi gate saroruhavane baddhānane klāmyati
krandatsu bhramareṣu vīkṣya dayitāśliṣṭān puraḥ sārasān |
vaktre kevalam argaleva nihitā jīvasya nirgacchataḥ ||2068||
ehy āliṅga tvarayati mano durbalā vāsaraśrīr
nānyāsakto na khalu kupito nānurāgacyuto vā
bhaṅktvā bhīto na bhuṅkte kuṭilavisalatākoṭim indor vitarkāt
tārākārās tṛṣārto na pibati payasāṃ vipruṣaḥ patrasaṃsthāḥ |
kāntāvicchedabhīrur dinam api rajanīṃ manyate cakravākaḥ ||2070||
pakṣāv utkṣipati kṣitau nipatati kroḍe nakhair ullikhaty
udbāṣpeṇa ca cakṣuṣā sahacaraṃ dhyātvā muhur vīkṣate |
yenālohitamaṇḍalo’pi kṛpayā yāty eṣa nāstaṃ raviḥ ||2073||
dvau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā ||2074||
sūrye cāstam upāgate kamalinīpaṇḍe ca nidrālase
pratyutkūjati mūrcchati śvasiti ca vyāghūrṇane tāmyati
bhrāmyaty udvamati kṣamām iva nijaprāṇān muhur nindati ||2075||
keṣāṃ nāma na locanaśravaṇayor digdakṣiṇā prīṇanam |
adhvanyāḥ ka ivāpare munir ato’gastyo’pi nāvartate ||2077||
asyāṃ kuḍmalayan karān pariharan nāśās tyajan padminīr
karpūrasya ca yatra ko’pi caturas tāmbūlayogakramaḥ |
deśaḥ kerala eṣa kelisadanaṃ devasya śṛṅgāriṇas
taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuru komalāṅgi saphale drāghīyasī locane ||2081||
atrāndhrās tava dakṣiṇena ta ime godāvarīsrotasāṃ
yat kṣemaṃ tridivāya vartma nigamasyāṅgaṃ ca yat saptamaṃ
svādiṣṭhaṃ ca yad aikṣavād api rasāc cakṣuś ca yad vāṅmayam |
tad yasmin madhuraṃ prasādi rasavat kāntaṃ ca kāvyāmṛtaṃ
yāte kārmukavidyayā paribhavaṃ sārdhaṃ gaṇānāṃ gaṇaiḥ
ṣaḍvaktre samayaṃ vilaṅghya jayinīm uddiśya śaktiṃ sthite |
viśve paśyata kautukaṃ bhṛgupates tasyaiva rāmo’ṅkuśaḥ ||2086||
utkṣiptacchatracihnaṃ pratiphalitam api svaṃ vapur vīkṣya kiṃcit
sāsūyaṃ yena dṛṣṭāḥ kṣititalavilasan maulayo bhūmipālāḥ ||2087||
sādhu mlecchanarendra sādhu bhavato mātaiva vīraprasūr
śastraṃ śāstram iti sphuranti rasanāpatrāntarāle giraḥ ||2088||
ā ca prācetasābdher bhavatu mama puraḥ ko’pi yady asti vīraḥ ||2089||
rāme rudraśarāsanaṃ tulayati smitvā sthitaṃ pārthivaiḥ
śiñjāsañjanatatpare ca hasitaṃ dattvā mithas tālikāḥ |
rundhann aṣṭavidheḥ śrutīr mukharayann aṣṭau krīḍayan
mūrtīr aṣṭa maheśvarasya dalayann aṣṭau kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ |
tāny akṣṇā vadhirāṇi pannagakulāny aṣṭau ca sampādayann
utkṣiptaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sākaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ
vaidehīmanasā samaṃ ca sahasā kṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava
prauḍhāhaṃkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ bhagnaṃ tadaiśaṃ dhanuḥ ||2095||
asādhyaṃ syād etad yadi ca tad amīṣām akṛpaṇāḥ
āśvāsyāśrumukhān muhuḥ priyasakhān preṣyān samādiśya ca |
tāny etāni daśānanāni daśabhir digbhir yadājñā kṛtā |
yasyādyāpi sa eva vīryamahimā tasmin naras tāpasaḥ
śocyaḥ so’pi ripuḥ sa caiva kupitas tasyāpi dūtaḥ kapiḥ ||2101||
ekā sā nikaṣā paraṃ tanayasūryasyāḥ suto rāvaṇaḥ |
kā ślāghā ghuṇajarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā ||2103||
bhagnaṃ bhagnam umāpater ajagavaṃ bālī kṣataś ca kṣatas
tālāḥ sapta hatā hatāś ca jaladhir baddhaś ca baddhaś ca saḥ |
nyakkāro hy ayam eva me yad arayas tatrāpy asau tāpasaḥ
so’py atraiva nihanti rākṣasabhaṭān jīvaty aho rāvaṇaḥ |
dhik dhik śakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā
svasattvasyodrekād api daśa śirāṃsi svayam ayaṃ
svāhākāram udāharan na sa daśagrīvo girāṃ gocaraḥ ||2108||
chindhi tvaṃ juhudhi tvam ity upadiśann ekaḥ paraṃ rāvaṇaḥ ||2109||
lūne pañca tataś catuṣṭayam iti sraksaṃniveśaiḥ śiraḥ
śambhor uddhatasāhasaikarasikaḥ kair na stuto rāvaṇaḥ ||2110||
kiṃtu svānunayāya mūrdhanidhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na yatrāriṇā |
tvatto mūrdhabahutvataḥ phalam idaṃ samyaṅ mayā labhyate
chinnaṃ chinnam avekṣya rākṣasapate svaṃ durnayaṃ jñāsyasi ||2111||
krīḍan svacchandamadbhiḥ smarasi yad akarod arjunaḥ kārtavīryaḥ |
taddoṣṇāṃ yac ca rāmo raṇabhuvi vidadhe vegavalgatkuṭhāraḥ
prāyaḥ paulastya sā te śravaṇaparigatā kiṃ na vārteti vidmaḥ ||2113||
kule paulastyānāṃ na nijam amalaṃ janma kalitaṃ
bahoḥ kālān nālocitam atulam uccaiḥ svam ayaśaḥ |
prasūnaṃ puṣpeṣoḥ śaram asahatā kiṃ ca bhavatā
sa patrī saumitrer aśanisahadharmā na gaṇitaḥ ||2114||
śirobhir mā devīḥ śiva iva na te dāsyati punar
hitaṃ tad brūmas tvāṃ mama janakadordaṇḍavijaya
dyām ālokayatāṃ kalāḥ kalayatāṃ chāyāḥ samācinvatāṃ
kleśaḥ kevalam aṅgulīr dalayatāṃ mauhūrtikānām ayam |
dhanyā sā rajanī tad eva sudinaṃ dhanyaḥ sa eva kṣaṇo
teṣāṃ tvaṃ nidhir āgasām asahanā mānonnatā sāpy ato
gantavyaṃ bhavatā na tadgṛham iti tvaṃ vāryase yāsi cet |
kṣiptaḥ pādatale tadekaśaraṇo manye ciraṃ sthāsyasi ||2117||
jāne sāsahanā tathāham asakṛn mayy aṅgaṇasthe punas
tasyāḥ saṃbhavitā sa sādhvasarasaḥ ko’pi prakopāpahaḥ |
kutrātmā kva ca mekhaleti galitaḥ prāyaḥ sa mānagrahaḥ ||2118||
anyā sādhigatā tvayā kva yuvatī yasyāḥ sa mānagraho
asmābhiḥ kalitaṃ purā na bhavatī bhuktā nṛbhiḥ kair api
prauḍhā mānavaśālinīti calitaṃ cetaḥ sakāmaṃ tvayi |
trailokyam udare viṣṇos tādṛg eva vyavasthitam |
tādṛg anyādṛg apy asti hṛdaye tu mahākaveḥ ||2121||
yan netrais tribhir īkṣate na giriśo nāṣṭābhir apy abjabhūḥ
sakndo dvādaśabhis tathā na maghavā cakṣuḥsahasreṇa yat |
saṃbhūyāpi jagattrayasya nayanair draṣṭuṃ na yat pāryate
udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhirapāṃ yojanaśataṃ
satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate ||2123||
prakṛtyā gambhīraḥ kavir iti hi śabdo vijayate ||2124||
niṣṇātaḥ kavikuñjarendracarite mārge girāṃ vā guruḥ |
bāṇaḥ prāṇiti keśaṭaḥ sphuṭam asau jāgarti yogeśvaraḥ
ākalpaṃ vasukalpa eva vacasi prāgalbhyam abhyasyati ||2128||
unnīto bhavabhūtinā pratidinaṃ bāṇe gate yaḥ purā
yaś cīrṇaḥ kamalāyudhena suciraṃ yenāgamat keśaṭaḥ |
diṣṭyā ślāghyaguṇasya kasyacid asau mārgaḥ samunmīlati ||2129||
subandhau bhaktir naḥ ka iha raghukāre na ramate
tathāpy antar modaṃ kam api bhavabhūtir vitanute ||2130||
mataṃ ced asmākaṃ kavir amarasiṃho vijayate ||2132||
pātu karṇarasāyanaṃ racayituṃ vācaḥ satāṃ saṃmatā
vyutpattiṃ paramām avāptum avadhiṃ labdhuṃ rasasrotasaḥ |
bhoktuṃ svādu phalaṃ ca jīvitataror yady asti te kautukaṃ
tad bhrātaḥ śṛṇu rājaśekharakaveḥ sūktīḥ sudhāsyandanīḥ ||2133||
dhig dhik tān samayān pariśramarujo vaktuṃ giro nīrasā
devīṃ vācam upāsate hi bahavaḥ sāraṃ tu sārasvataṃ
jānīte nitarām asau gurukulakliṣṭo murāriḥ kaviḥ |
ābdhar laṅghita eva vānarabhaṭaiḥ kiṃ tv asya gambhīrtām
māleyaṃ bhujagabhrameṇa bhavatā janmāndha kiṃ dhūyate |
etasyāḥ kṣatir astu nāma kiyatī saṃvītahāsodgamās
avadhehi kṣaṇam ehi bhrātar bhāvajña bhāvaya giraṃ naḥ |
mā budhyasva na tāvad vāg ulkābhiḥ kadarthayasi ||2138||
itthaṃ vyarthitavāñchiteṣu hi mudhaivāsmāsu kiṃ khidyase
mātaḥ kāvyasudhe kathaṃ kva bhavatīm unmudrayāmo vayam ||2139||
gambhīraṃ kavipuṅgavasya kim aho sarvasvam uddhāṭyate |
ko’yaṃ nāma sacetano’sti ya iha prastauti kastūrikām ||2140||
tāvat tāvad upoḍhasāndrapulakas tasmai sa devo dadau
ṣaṭtarkān api śabdaśāsanam api sthānaiḥ sthitaṃ pañcabhir
āsmākeṣu na jalpavahniṣu punaḥ kaiḥ kaiḥ pataṅgāyitam ||2146||
karmety anvayakalpanāṃ vidadhate ye ke’pi tebhyo namaḥ |
ullāsaiḥ kavayanti vallaṇakavis teṣv eva saṃnahyate ||2148||
maduktiś ced antar madayati sudhībhūya sudhiyaḥ
sarvasvaṃ gṛhavartikuntalapatir gṛhṇātu tan me punar
bhāṇḍāgāram akhaṇḍam eva hṛdaye jāgarti sārasvatam |
bhoḥ kṣudrās tyajata pramodam acirād eṣyanti manmandiraṃ
lasad bhūyo bhāvā mṛdur api vimardocitatanuḥ
avagāḍhā ca punīte gaṅgā baṅgālavāṇī ca ||2152||
vāṇi vraja suralokaṃ triśaraṇapālo’pi devi tatraiva |
athaitāḥ santoṣaṃ vidadhati na cec cetasi tataḥ
iyaṃ gaur uddāmā tava nibiḍabandhāpi hi kathaṃ
na vaidarbhād anyat spṛśati sulabhatve’pi hi katham |
avandhyā ca khyātā bhuvi katham agamyā kavivṛṣaiḥ
kathaṃ vā pīyūṣaṃ sravati bahu dugdhāpi bahubhiḥ ||2155||
idaṃ kāvyaṃ tattvaṃ sphurati tu yad atrānuparamaṃ
tad antarbuddhīnāṃ sphuṭam atha ca vācām aviṣayaḥ ||2156||
ya iha madhu vamantīṃ kāvyacintāṃ karoti ||2157||
te varṇāḥ sapadakramās tad abhidhāvaidagdhyam avyāhṛtaṃ
gumphaḥ ko’pi sapaktrimaḥ sahṛdayāsvādyo rasaḥ ko’py asau |
he sabhyāḥ paribhāvya mādṛśakṛtīr brūta kvacin niṣkṛtaṃ
kiṃ tatrāsty aparaṃ purātanakaver yenaiṣa kolāhalaḥ ||2159||
anudghuṣṭaḥ śabdair atha ca ghaṭanāt prasphuṭarasaḥ
vāyūdgāragatis tataḥ pariṇatiḥ sṛṣṭer aho kauśalaṃ
vāyuḥ śloka ihaiva santi sakalāḥ kāvyasya te te guṇāḥ |
kasyāyaṃ mama huṃ tathaiva śṛṇumaḥ samyak punaḥ paṭhyatāṃ
jānāmi sphuṭatātra nāsti bhaṇitaṃ cānyaiḥ purāṇaṃ paṭha ||2161||
asmai vāṇi vidhehi durjanamarusthānāya dūre namaḥ |
na prāṇanti yadarpaṇād iha guṇāḥ kāmaṃ yaśovallayaḥ
soḍhavyāḥ ke kiyantaḥ śiva śiva kavi te kucchalā matsarāṇām ||2165||
dhanyās te bhuvanaṃ punanti kavayo yeṣām ajasraṃ gavām
baddho lambitacūḍam añjalir ayaṃ vāṇi kṣamasvāmṛtaṃ
na brūmas tvayi devabhāvasulabhaṃ na dyotate tanmahaḥ |
syāc ced īṣad api prasahya rasanāṭaṅkaiḥ kathaṃ khaṇḍaśaś
chindanto bhavatīṃ kavīndraghaṭitāṃ jīvanty amī dasyavaḥ ||2167||
niḥśaṅkaṃ hara kāñcanāny anibhṛtaṃ dārān guroḥ śīlaya
svacchandaṃ piba vāruṇīṃ jahi nirātaṅkaṃ dvijānāṃ kulam |
tais taiḥ pātakibhiḥ samaṃ vasa sukhaṃ mā satkavīnāṃ kṛthāḥ
iyaṃ gaur ekā naḥ kvacid api na saṃyojanavidhā
gale baddhā dadhmo yadi na dhṛitir uddāmavidhṛtau
bhayaṃ gocorebhyas tad iha ka upāyaḥ prabhavatu ||2169||
svāny asmābhir upāhṛtāni vipaṇisthāneṣu dainyān na kim |
dhik karmāṇi tulaiva nāsti na kaṣagrāvā na mānakramo
na kretā na parīkṣakaḥ param abhūd uccair bhayaṃ durjanān ||2170||
ayaṃ nijaḥ paro veti gaṇanā laghucetasām |
sujano na yāti vairaṃ parahitabuddhir vināśakāle’pi |
asanto nābhyarthyāḥ suhṛd api na yācyas tanudhanaḥ
vipady uccaiḥ stheyaṃ padam anuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ
ye dīneṣu dayālavaḥ spṛśati yān alpo’pi na śrīmado
vyagrā ye ca paropakārakaraṇe hṛṣyanti ye yācitāḥ |
ete snehamayā iti mā mā kṣudreṣu yāta viśvāsam |
ko’rthān prāpya na garvito bhuvi naraḥ kasyāpados taṃ gatāḥ
strībhiḥ kasya na khaṇḍitaṃ bhuvi manaḥ ko nāma rājñāṃ priyaḥ |
kaḥ kālasya na gocarāntaragataḥ ko’rtho gato gauravaṃ
ko vā durjanavāgurāsu patitaḥ kṣemeṇa yātaḥ pumān ||2177||
ko nāmāyam apūrvanāṭakavidhir yaḥ śikṣito durjanaiḥ ||2178||
khalaḥ kiṃcid vākyaṃ racayati ca vistārayati ca |
muner gaṇḍūṣe’bdhiḥ sthita iti kuto’yaṃ kalakalaḥ ||2179||
nṛpāṅgaṇagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me ||2180||
prāṇair apy apakurvate vyasaninas te sādhavo dūrataḥ |
cakṣuḥ saṃhara bāṣpavegam adhunā kasyāgrato rudyate ||2183||
śiśutvavyāmohāt kalayasi na cet tattvam anayos
tadā stokaṃ brūmaḥ paricinu vacas tvaṃ sadasatoḥ |
satāṃ svāntaṃ yat tan madhumadhuram antaḥ kaṭu bahir
bahiḥ svādu svacchaṃ viṣaviṣamam antas tad asatām ||2184||
iti sukṛtam anena vyañjitaṃ naḥ phalena ||2187||
śiśutvaṃ tāruṇyaṃ tad anu ca dadhānāḥ pariṇatiṃ
pibanti svacchandaṃ stanam adharam ambhaḥ sukṛtinaḥ ||2190||
vimalamatibhiḥ kair apy etaj jagajjanitaṃ purā
vidhṛtam aparair dattaṃ cānyair vijitya tṛṇaṃ yathā |
iha hi bhuvanāny anye dhīrāś caturdaśa bhuñjate
kenenduḥ kumudeṣu kena taraṇiḥ padmeṣu kenāmbudaḥ
sāraṅgeṣv atha kena śākhiṣu madhur dākṣiṇyam adhyāpitaḥ |
na sambandhaḥ kiṃ tu prakṛtir iyam evaṃ hi mahatāṃ
dhātrīṃ dhātuṃ vahati phaṇinām agraṇīḥ kasya śikṣāṃ
ko vā brūte timirapaṭalaploṣam ahnaḥ praṇetuḥ |
karma prāyo bhavati mahatāṃ svānurūpaṃ mahimnaḥ ||2195||
mā khedaṃ bhaja he vidhuntuda mudaṃ dhehi stuhi tvaṃ hares
tac cakraṃ vinikṛtya dagdham udaraṃ yenottamāṅgīkṛtaḥ |
paśyāsmān udarambharīn iha parābhūtān nirastān hatān
yad ete sādhūnām upari mukharā eva dhanino
na sāvajñair eṣām api ca nijavittavyayabhayam |
na vā kleśo’muṣminn aparam anukampaiva bhavati
svamāṃsas trastebhyaḥ ka iha hariṇebhyaḥ paribhavaḥ ||2197||
śataṃ vā lakṣaṃ vā niyutam athavā koṭim athavā
śataṃ tal lakṣaṃ tan niyutam api tatkoṭir api tad
yad āptaṃ sammānād api tṛṇam anamraṇa śirasā ||2198||
khyātas tvaṃ vibhavair yaśāṃsi kavayo dikṣu pratanvanti naḥ |
itthaṃ mānada nātidūram ubhayor apy āvayor antaraṃ
yady asmāsu parāṅmukho’si vayam apy ekāntito niḥspṛhāḥ ||2200||
varaṃ mṛto na tu kṣudras tathāpi mahad antaram |
ekasya bandhur nādatte nāmāny asyākhilo janaḥ ||2201||
kṛpaṇasya kṛpāṇasya ca kevalam ākārato bhedaḥ ||2203||
asyedam iti sambandho hānau duḥkhena gamyate ||2204||
maunān mūrkhaḥ pravacanapaṭur vātulo jalpako vā
dhṛṣṭaḥ pārśve vasati niyataṃ dūrataś cāpragalbhaḥ |
kṣāntyā bhīrur yadi na sahate prāyaśo nābhijātaḥ
gātrair girā ca vikalaś caṭum īśvarāṇāṃ
yad vaktraṃ muhur īkṣase na dhanināṃ brūṣe na cāṭuṃ mṛṣā
naiṣāṃ garvagiraḥ śṛṇoṣi na punaḥ pratyāśayā dhāvasi |
kāle bālatṛṇāni khādasi sukhaṃ nidrāsi nidrāgame
tan me brūhi kuraṅga kutra bhavatā kiṃ nāma taptaṃ tapaḥ ||2208||
duḥkhīyati sukhahetoḥ ko mūḍhaḥ sevakād anyaḥ ||2209||
hasati hasati svāminy uccaiḥ rudaty api roditi
soḍhaṃ dvāḥsthitaduḥsthitadurvacaḥ kaṭu tato dṛṣṭo durīśaś cirād
udgīrṇāḥ svaguṇāś ca yācitam atha śrotre kṛtā neti gīḥ |
yat pāpaṃ mahad ūcire manumukhāḥ ko’nv eṣa teṣāṃ bhramaḥ ||2211||
lajje lajje nimajja kvacid api nibhṛtaṃ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha pratiṣṭhe
gaccha droṇīṃ himādreḥ punar api tapase bhārati svasti tubhyam |
kāmaṃ vaneṣu hariṇās tṛṇena jīvanty ayatnasulabhena |
vidadhati dhaniṣu na dainyaṃ te kila paśavo vayaṃ sudhiyaḥ ||2214||
kṛtakamadhuraṃ bhartur bhāvaṃ na bhāvayituṃ kṣamāḥ |
priyam api vaco mithyā vaktuṃ janair na ca śikṣitāḥ
ka iha sa guṇo yena syāma kṣitīśvaravallabhāḥ ||2215||
prāleyād api śītalo hutavahaḥ pīyūṣagarbhād api
svādīyo garalaṃ bhaved api mṛdur dambholir ambhojataḥ |
na tv etā duradhīśvarasya kuṭilakrūrāḥ kaṭākṣormayaḥ ||2216||
snātaṃ māravarocir ambhasi kṛtaḥ snehagrahaḥ saikate
bandhyāyā vihitā sutena sakhitā kūrmāṅganāyāḥ payaḥ
pītaṃ yena niṣevya mugdhadhaninaḥ sampāditāḥ sampadaḥ ||2217||
toyaṃ nirmathitaṃ ghṛtāya madhune nispīḍitaḥ prastaraḥ
dugdhā seyam acetanena jaratī dugdhāśayā śūkarī
kaṣṭaṃ yat khalu dīrghayā dhanatṛṣā nīco janaḥ sevitaḥ ||2219||
stabdhas tiṣṭhasi paśyad andhapurataḥ kiṃ darśanākāṅkṣayā
jalpan mūkamukhāditaḥ prativacaḥ kiṃ śrotum ākāṅkṣasi |
yaḥ śṛṇvad vadhiraḥ śṛṇoti sa kathaṃ vijñaptikāṃ tāvakīṃ
sukhaṃ jīvanti jātāndhāḥ parvatāḥ sarito’pi ca |
alaṅghyaṃ sarveṣām iha khalu phalaṃ karmajanitaṃ
vipat karma praiṣyā vyathayati na jātāsi hṛdayam |
vidyāvān api janmavān api tathā yukto’pi tais tair guṇair
yan nāpnoti manaḥ samīhitaphalaṃ daivasya sā vācyatā |
etāvat tu hṛdi vyathāṃ vitanute yatprāktanaiḥ karmabhir
lakṣmīṃ prāpya jaḍo’py asādhur api ca svāṃ yogyatāṃ manyate ||2225||
lagnaḥ śṛṅgayuge gṛhī satanayo vṛddhau gurū pārśvayoḥ
pucchāgre gṛhiṇī khureṣu śiśavo lagnā vadhūḥ kambale |
halam agu balasyaiko’naḍvān harasya na lāṅgalaṃ
padaparimitā bhūmir viṣṇor na gaur na ca lāṅgalam |
mārjārīva śunī śunīva gṛhiṇī vācyaḥ kim anyo janaḥ |
kiṃ ca kṣutklamaghūrṇamānanayanair unnidram urvīṃ gataiḥ
kartuṃ vāgvyayam akṣamaiḥ svajananī bālaiḥ samālokyate ||2229||
ambā tuṣyati na mayā na snuṣayā sāpi nāmbayā na mayā |
aham api na tayā na tayā vada rājan kasya doṣo’yam ||2231||
dāridryaṃ nṛpatiḥ sa no nijapatir yasya prasādād abhūd
yācñā jīvitam aṃśukaṃ daśa diśaḥ sadmāni devālayāḥ |
madvidveṣiṇi labdhasaṃnidhir iti tvayy āśraye kupyatā
madvṛttyaiva puraskṛtās tvadarayas tenādhunā kā gatiḥ ||2235||
śīlaṃ śātayati śrutaṃ śamayati prajñāṃ nihanty ādarād
dainyaṃ dīpayati kṣamāṃ kṣapayati vrīḍām api vyasyati |
ceto jarjarayaty apāsyati dhṛtiṃ visātarayaty arthitāṃ
puṃsaḥ kṣīṇadhanasya kiṃ na kurute vairī kuṭumbagrahaḥ ||2236||
uttiṣṭha kṣaṇam ekam udvaha sakhe dāridryabhāraṃ guruṃ
śrāntas tāvad ahaṃ cirān maraṇajaṃ seve tvadīyaṃ sukham |
ity ukto dhanavarjitena viduṣā gatvā śmaśānaṃ śavo
dāridryān maraṇaṃ varaṃ sukham iti jñātvā sa tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ ||2237||
kṣutkṣāmāḥ śiśavaḥ śavā iva tanur mandādaro bāndhavo
liptā jarjarakarkarījalalavair no māṃ tathā bādhate |
kupyantī prativeśinī pratimuhuḥ sūcīṃ yathā yācitā ||2238||
tasminn eva gṛhodare rasavatī tatraiva sā kaṇḍanī
tatropaskaraṇāni tatra śiśavas tatraiva vāsaḥ svayam |
sarvaṃ soḍhavato’pi duḥsthagṛhiṇaḥ kiṃ brūmahe tāṃ daśām
adya śvo vijaniṣyamāṇagṛhiṇī tatraiva yat kunthati ||2239||
āstāṃ kiṃ bahubhiḥ paropakṛtayaḥ saṃsārasāraṃ phalaṃ
siddhaṃ tat pratikūlavartini vidhau na stokam apy atra naḥ |
ete smaḥ kila mānuṣā vayam api vyarthaṃ vyapetāyuṣo
yeṣāṃ svodarapūrtir eva hi kim apy aṣṭau mahāsiddhayaḥ ||2240||
śvo vā kathaṃ nu bhaviteti vicintayantī |
saktūñ śocati saṃplutān pratikaroty ākrandato bālakān
dattvā mūrdhni viśīrṇaśūrpaśakalaṃ jīrṇe gṛhe vyākulā
kiṃ tad yan na karoti duḥsthagṛhiṇī deve bhṛśaṃ varṣati ||2245||
āścaryam eva khalu khedakaraṃ gṛhaṃ naḥ ||2249||
keśā api virajyante jarayā kim utāṅganāḥ ||2251||
keśāḥ pākam upāgatâḥ śithilatām aṅge’py anaṅgo gataḥ
sarvāṅgaṃ baliveṣṭitaṃ priyatamā sabhyaṃ janatvaṃ gatā |
ye vānye guṇaśālino’pi suhṛdas te cāpi yātā divaṃ
tan māṃ muñca ghanāgamaṃ vraja vanaṃ cetaḥ kutaḥ sthīyate ||
aṅgānām avasāditāpi ca girāṃ kampas tathāpy eṣa me
mohaḥ snehamayo na muñcati manaḥ kasmai samāvedyatām ||2253||
mātar jare satatam astu nama bhavatyai ||2254||
svasti sukhebhyaḥ saṃprati salilāñjalir eṣa manmathakathāyāḥ |
tā api mām ativayasaṃ taraladṛśaḥ saralam īkṣante ||2256||
ākrāntaṃ valibhiḥ prasahya palitair atyantam āskanditaṃ
galitaṃ yauvanam adhunā vanamadhunā sevanīyam asmākam |
bahir vrajati sātape smarati netravṛtteḥ purā
kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na saṃtoṣataḥ
dhyātaṃ vittam aharniśaṃ na ca punar viṣṇoḥ padaṃ śāśvataṃ
tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitam ||2261||
sevye svasya padasya dātari sure nārāyaṇe tiṣṭhati |
sevāyai mṛgayāmahe naram aho mūḍhā varākā vayam ||2262||
uṣasy eva bhrāntaṃ hatajaṭharahetos tata itaḥ
svayaṃ ca svaṃ bibhrad vicarati kuṭumbaṃ diśi diśi |
na cāyurdurgatyor avadhir iha labdhaḥ katham api ||2263||
kauśalyā nanu rodhanā janakabhūr dūrīkṛtā kiṃ tu na
prāptā pañcavaṭī na vānarapater āsāditaṃ sauhṛdam |
sāmarṣeṇa na vārirāśir acirād ullaṅghitaḥ kevalaṃ
mayāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na tv adhigatā ||2265||
pitror nopakṛtaṃ himāṃśudhavalaṃ nopārjitaṃ vā yaśo
mitrāṇām upakāritā na vihitā dattaṃ na ca svecchayā |
kālo’bhyeti calaṃ ca jīvitam iti kṣuṇṇaṃ manaś cintayā ||2266||
tanvaṅgyā vipule nitambaphalake na krīḍitaṃ līlayā |
na prāptā bhuvi vārivṛndadamanī vidyā vinodocitā
tāruṇyaṃ gatam eva niṣphalam aho śūnyālaye dīpavat ||2268||
janma vyarthaphalodayaṃ bata paraṃ gṛhṇadbhir asmādṛśair
vyāptaṃ vyoma kiyadbhujaṅgamapater bhāraḥ kiyān arpitaḥ ||2270||
kva viṣayāḥ kva sukhaṃ kva parigrahaḥ ||2271||
vyaktā varjitayauvanā iti tathā nandanti tandrālavaḥ ||2272||
tan mitraṃ yad ayantraṇaṃ sa vibhavo yaḥ sādhusādhāraṇas
tasyāṃ yoṣiti bhāvayed abhiratiṃ bhāvānuraktaiva yā |
tāṃ cintāṃ manasodvaheta satataṃ yasyāḥ phalaṃ bhujyate
tānīheta phalāni yāny avidhurāṇy āśā mahījanmanaḥ ||2273||
tat pāṇḍityaṃ na patati punar yena saṃsārabandhe
tat sauhārdaṃ na calati punar yat sukhe vāsukhe vā |
sambhogās te ratiṣu viduṣāṃ ye na vācyāḥ pareṣāṃ
tac caiśvaryaṃ jagati mahatāṃ yat pareṣāṃ sukhāya ||2274||
sadvidyā yadi kalpaśākhibhir alaṃ yady arthinaḥ kiṃ tṛṇaiḥ
santaś ced amṛtena kiṃ yadi khalās tatkālakūṭena kim |
kiṃ karpūraśalākayā yadi dṛśaḥ panthānam eti priyā
saṃsāre’pi satīndrajālaghaṭanaṃ yady asti tenāpi kim ||2275||
bībhatsā viṣayā jugupsitatamaḥ kāyo vayo gatvaraṃ
prāyo bandhubhir adhvanīva pathikair yogo viyogāvahaḥ |
hātavyo’yam asāra eva virasaḥ saṃsāra ity ādikaṃ
sarvasyaiva hi vāci cetasi punaḥ kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ ||2276||
bhave saukhyaṃ hitvā śamasukham upādeyam anagham |
vayaṃ vītavrīḍāḥ śuka iva paṭhāmaḥ param amī ||2277||
retaḥśoṇitayor iyaṃ pariṇatir yad varṣma tac cābhavan
mṛtyor āspadam āśrayo guruśucāṃ rogasya viśrāmabhūḥ |
jānann apy avaśo vivekavirahān majjann avidyāmbudhau
bībhatsāḥ pratibhānti kiṃ nu viṣayāḥ kiṃ nu spṛhāyuṣmatī
dehasyāpacayo matau niviśate gāḍho gṛheṣu grahaḥ |
brahmopāsyam iti sphuraty api hṛdi vyāvartikā vāsanā
kā nāmeyam atarkyahetugahanā daivī satāṃ yātanā ||2279||
gṛhāveśaḥ kleśaḥ prakṛticapalā śrīr api khalā
yamaḥ svairī vairī tad api na hitaṃ karma vihitam ||2280||
premṇā purā praṇihitaṃ mayi cakṣur īṣad
hā hā tathāpi viṣayān na jahāti cetaḥ ||2282||
madhuram aśanaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vāso vibhūṣaṇam ujjvalaṃ
tad idam akhilaṃ tyaktuṃ śakyaṃ bhavaty api dehināṃ
praṇayasarasā ye’mī dārās ta eva hi dustyajāḥ ||2283||
kaḥ kurvīta śiraḥ praṇāmamalinaṃ mānyaṃ manasvī jano
yad vitrastakuraṅgaśāvanayanā na syuḥ smarāstraṃ striyaḥ ||2284||
yady etāḥ prodyadindudyutinicayabhṛto na syur ambhojanetrāḥ
rajo vā rājyaṃ vā dvayam idam abhedaṃ sukṛtinām |
dhig asmākaṃ citte vigalitaviveke punar iha
priyā vā prāṇā vā sadṛśam athavā pūrvam adhikam ||2287||
no ced bhikṣāprasanne manasi manasijakleśanāśe vilāso
yady asty evaṃ kuru bhavarasāsvādane lampaṭatvaṃ
no cec cetaḥ praviśa sahasā nirvikalpe samādhau ||2290||
tāṃ sampado vipada eva na yāḥ samagram
tallauham eva hṛdayaṃ yad aśaktam ārte
dīnāḥ śataṃ mṛdu ca vistarayanti vācaḥ |
yatra prāṇabalena yatra piśitair yatra tvacā kevalaṃ
yātrām arthijanocitām upagataḥ ślāghyaḥ sa kālo gataḥ |
kurmaḥ kiṃ dhanam anyad asti na kim apy asmākam asmāt paraṃ
vādhiryaṃ kṛtam atra karṇakuhare dūre’stu vāgarthinaḥ ||2294||
mudā yatra prāṇās tṛṇam iva parārthavyasaninas
tyajanto lajjante kiyad iti dhiyā tad yugam agān |
tṛṇaṃ prāṇaprāyaṃ tyajati na jano yatra samaye
vayaṃ jātās tatrety ahaha kṛpaṇaṃ jīvitam idam ||2295||
kiṃ tair bhāvyaṃ mama sudivasair yatra te nirviśaṅkāḥ
satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sakṛpaṃ dṛṣṭasya tair nāgaraiḥ |
prasīdeti krośan nimiṣam iva neṣyāmi divasān ||2299||
ahau vā hāre vā balavati ripau vā suhṛdi vā
maṇau vā loṣṭe vā kusumaśayane vā dṛṣadi vā |
tṛṇe vā straiṇe vā mama samadṛśo yāntu divasāḥ
kvacit puṇye’raṇye śiva śiva śiveti pralapataḥ ||2300||
nirviṣṭā viṣayāḥ śivātmamahasi nyastaṃ manaḥ saṃprati ||2301||
kṛtaṃ dattaṃ bhuktaṃ kṛtam api kule yat samucitaṃ
kṛtārthaṃ tīrtheṣu bhramaṇam adhunā vāñchati manaḥ ||2303||
pāraṃ cādhigataṃ satāṃ pariṣadi prāptaḥ pratiṣṭhodayaḥ |
nirviṇṇasya mamādhunā nanu paraḥ panthā na dainyaṃ vinā
kīrtir labdhā sadasi viduṣāṃ śīlitāḥ kṣoṇipālā
sūktiṃ karṇasudhāṃ vyanaktu sujanas tasmai na modāmahe
brūtāṃ vācam asūyako viṣamucaṃ tasmai na khidyāmahe |
yā yasya prakṛtiḥ sa tāṃ vitanutāṃ kiṃ nas tayā cintayā
kurmas tat khalu karma janmanigaḍacchedāya yaj jāyate ||2306||
kva sā lajjārajjuḥ kva vinayakaṭhorāṅkuśam api ||2307||
sajjanmāpi hi niṣphalaṃ śrutam api vyarthaṃ guṇāḥ kiṃ kṛte
hā dhik kaṣṭam anarthakaṃ gatam idaṃ niḥśeṣam asmadvayaḥ |
mārgaḥ ko’pi niratyayaṃ na vahati vyāghātabaddhagraho
sukhaṃ śāntaḥ śete nanu ca bhavabhīto nṛpa iva ||2309||
viyoge ko bhedas tyajati na jano yat svam amūn |
svayaṃ tyaktā hy ete śamasukham anantaṃ vidadhati ||2310||
ākarṣadbhiḥ kim api hṛdayaṃ pūjitā yauvanaśrīḥ |
iyaṃ bālā māṃ praty anavaratam indīvaradala
prabhācauraṃ cakṣuḥ kṣipati kim abhipretam anayā |
jvarajvālā śāntā tad api na varākī viramati ||2312||
tadā dṛṣṭaṃ nārīmayam idam aśeṣaṃ jagad api |
samībhūtā dṛṣṭis tribhuvanam api brahma manute ||2313||
vṛthā śāntān lājjair iva hasitaleśaiḥ snapayasi |
patadbhaikṣyāhāre valati hi paraṃ lāñchini manaḥ ||2314||
gataḥ kālo yatra praṇayini mayi premakuṭilaḥ
monovṛttis tat kiṃ vyasanini mudhaiva kṣapayasi ||2315||
krīḍā mugdhamṛgair vayāṃsi suhṛdo naktaṃ pradīpaḥ śaśī
svādhīne’pi dhane tathāpi kṛpaṇā yācanta ity adbhutam ||2316||
dṛṣṭaṃ vyābhugnabhīmabhrukuṭi ca vadanaṃ sampadā garvitānāṃ
tattvaṃ tṛṣṇe kṛtārthībhava kuru viratiṃ muñca naḥ sādhu yāmaḥ ||2317||
nijaṃ karma kṣīṇaṃ sa khalu viparīto hatavidhiḥ
sukṛtye vā tattve bhṛśam upagatā yatnanicayāḥ |
vapur jātaṃ tṛṣṇe virama viramety añjaliśatam ||2318||
vayam iha parituṣṭā valkalais tvaṃ ca lakṣmyā
sa tu bhavatu daridro yasya tṛṣṇā viśālā
manasi ca parituṣṭe ko’rthavān ko daridraḥ ||2319||
mātar lakṣmi bhajasva kaṃcid aparaṃ matkāṅkṣiṇāṃ mā sma bhūr
bhogebhyaḥ spṛhayālavas tava vaśāḥ kā niḥspṛhāṇām asi |
bhikṣāsaktubhir eva samprati vayaṃ kāśyāṃ samīhāmahe ||2320||
parāvṛttaṃ mohāt sphurati ca manāg brahmaṇi manaḥ |
vikāro’py akṣāṇāṃ galita iva nirbhāti viṣayāt
ramyaṃ harmyatalaṃ vasataye śravyaṃ na gītādi kiṃ
cchāyācañcalam ākalayya sakalaṃ santo vanāntaṃ gatāḥ ||2322||
manasi na mudaṃ kasyādadhyuḥ śivā vanabhūtayaḥ ||2324||
sravanti kṣemaṃ te pulinakuśalaṃ bhadram upalāḥ |
niśāntād asvantāt katham api ca niṣkāntam adhunā
yāny utkṣipya manaḥ parāñcati paraṃ nārāyaṇārādhana
śraddhāmoditam ekadaiva dhanikadvāre ca dāreṣu ca ||2328||
śārdūlī snehagarbhaṃ mukulitanayanaṃ leḍhi śāvaṃ hariṇyā
bandhuprītyā śikhaṇḍī tirayati phaṇinām ātapaṃ kīrṇabarhaḥ |
siṃhī rakṣaty apatyaṃ svam iva kalabhakaṃ nirgatāyāṃ kariṇyāṃ
maitryā yeṣāṃ nivāse gahanagiridarīśāyinas te jayanti ||2330||
pāṇiḥ pātraṃ pavitraṃ bhramaṇaparigataṃ bhaikṣyam akṣayyam annaṃ
vastraṃ vistīrṇam āśādaśakam apamalaṃ talpam asvalpam urvī |
taṃ vidvāṃsam iha stumaḥ karapuṭībhikṣālpaśāke’pi vā
vārāṃs trīn abhiṣuṇvate vidadhate vanyaiḥ śarīrasthitīr
aiṇeyyāṃ tvaci saṃviśanti vasate cāpi tvacaṃ tāravīm |
tat paśyanti ca dhāma nābhipatato yac cārmaṇe cakṣuṣī
dhanyānāṃ virajas tamā bhagavatī caryeyam āhlādate ||2333||
yatra sthāṇur ivācalo munir asāv abhyarkabimbaṃ sthitaḥ ||2334||
prāṇānām anilena vṛttir ucitā satkalpavṛkṣe vane
yad vāñchanti taopbhir anyamunayas tasmiṃs tapasyanty amī ||2335||
naikaṃ janma tavaiva vatsa na paraṃ tulyā ca karmasthitir
bhoktavyeṣu sukheṣu hṛṣyasi mudhā duḥkheṣu kiṃ tāmyasi |
bhrātaḥ sthairyam upehi nanv iha bhavān saṃsāradīrghādhvagaḥ
succhāyās taravaḥ kvacin marubhuvaḥ kvāpi pracaṇḍātapāḥ ||2336||
nanv ātmany avadhīyatāṃ gṛharasād vairāgyam ādhīyatāṃ
cetaḥ samprati damyatāṃ surasarittīre sadā sthīyatām |
bhikṣārthaṃ vyavasīyatāṃ samucitaṃ sat karma saṃciyatāṃ
te tāvat kṛtinaḥ parārthaghaṭakāḥ svārthasya bādhena ye
sāmānyās tu parārtham udyamakṛtaḥ svārthāvirodhena ye |
te’mī mānuṣarākṣasāḥ parahitaṃ yaiḥ svārthato hanyate
ye tu ghnanti nirarthakaṃ parahitaṃ te ke na jānīmahe ||2338||
vivekaḥ kiṃ so’pi svarasavalitā yatra na kṛpā
sa kiṃ yogo yasmin bhavati na parānugraharasaḥ |
sa kiṃ dharmo yatra sphurati na paradrohaviratiḥ
śrutaṃ tat kiṃ sākṣād upaśamapadaṃ yan na nayati ||2339||
surapatim api śvā pārśvasthaṃ vilokya na śaṅkate
na hi gaṇayati kṣudro jantuḥ parigrahaphalgutām ||2340||
balī kālaś cauro niyatam asitā moharajanī |
mṛtpiṇḍena bhuvaiva kiṃ tad anu tad bhedena kiṃ meruṇā
nānāpy ekaṃ yad iha daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yad oka
stoke yasyāpy anubhavavidhau na svadante madhūni |
śaśvat tasmai praṇama hṛdaya brahmaṇe śāśvatāya ||2345||
dhātas trapā na yadi kiṃ na pariśramo’pi ||2347||
vidvattā dhanasaṅgatā cirataraṃ nākāri nākāri cej
dhik dhātāram akāri yena jagati vyaṅgaḥ sa gaṅgādharaḥ ||2350||
karotu nāma nītijño vyavasayam itas tataḥ |
phalaṃ punas tad evāsya yad vidher manasi sthitam ||2351||
kṛtvākhur vivaraṃ svayaṃ nipatito naktaṃ mukhe bhoginaḥ |
tṛptas tatpiśitena satvaram asau tenaiva yātaḥ pathā
susthās tiṣṭhata daivam eva jagataḥ kṣāntau kṣaye cākulam ||2352||
vandyo’sau vidhir eva yasya jagato nirmāṇam atyujjvalaṃ
kiṃ cātyantam ito vicitram aparaṃ śakrasya yad vajriṇas
yad bhagnaṃ dhanur īśvarasya śiśunā yaj jāmadagnyo jitas
tyaktā yac ca guror girā vasumatībaddho yad ambhonidhiḥ |
daivaṃ varṇaya so’pi yena sahasā nītaḥ kathāśeṣatām ||2355||
ghātayati mahāpuruṣān samam eva bahūn anādareṇaiva |
badhyante nipuṇair agādhasalilān mīnāḥ samudrād api |
durṇītaṃ kim ihāsti kiṃ sucaritaṃ kaḥ sthānalābhe guṇaḥ
kālo hi vyasanaprasāritakaro gṛhṇāti dūrād api ||2357||
bhīmenātra vijṛmbhitaṃ dhanur iha droṇena muktaṃ śucā
karṇasyātra hayā hatā rathapatir bhīṣmo’tra yoddhuṃ sthitaḥ |
viśvaṃ rūpam ihārjunasya hariṇā saṃdarśitaṃ kautukād
uddeśās ta ime na te sukṛtinaḥ kālo hi sarvaṃkaṣaḥ ||2358||
iha hi patato nāsty ālambo na cāpi nivartanaṃ
tad api bhavatāṃ mohaḥ ko’yaṃ yad evam anākulaḥ ||2359||
dayālur no bāle na ca sujanagoṣṭhīṣu ramate
vilāsair nārīṇāṃ na hi bhavati sambhāvitarasaḥ |
anudvignaḥ kālaḥ kavalayati kṛtsnaṃ jagad aho
ardhapluṣṭaṃ bahubhyaḥ śavapiśitam upāhṛtya hṛṣṭaś citābhyo
śirāṃ pretaḥ kaścid daśati daśanāgreṇa sarasāṃ
lilikṣur mastiṣkaṃ kalayati ca mūrdhānam itaraḥ |
kṛṣṭann asthipramodaṃ na janayati kathaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ śmaśānam ||2363||
sadyas taptaṃ śavasya jvalad iva piśitaṃ bhūri jagdhvārdhadagdhaṃ
paśyāntaḥ pluṣyamāṇaḥ praviśati salilaṃ satvaraṃ gṛdhravṛddhaḥ ||2365||
kena kṣārakhane vṛthaiva bhavato nāmānṛtaṃ nirmitaṃ
pāthodhir jaladhiḥ payodhir udadhir vārāṃ nidhir vāridhiḥ ||2366||
purā yā prāṇeśe gatavati kṛtā puṣpadhanuṣā
iha payasi nadīnāṃ gāhituṃ naiva śaktāḥ |
āpuṅkhaṃ nimamajja tat katham aho naitad vijānīmahe
kaḥ śākhī sakhi yasya puṣpam abhavat puṣpāyudhasyāyudham ||2370||
dhenuḥ kāmadughā kim icchati tadā sthātuṃ na madhyegṛhaṃ
kiṃ na prārthayati sthitiṃ karatale cintāmaṇiḥ sādaram |
utkaḥ kiṃ bhavanāṅgaṇāntikam alaṃ kartuṃ na kalpadrumaḥ
puṃsaḥ puṇyavato yadā kila bhaved ājñāvidheyo vidhiḥ ||2371||
guṇān vaidheyānāṃ śriyam udayinīṃ vīkṣya dhaninām |
vivekotaḥ kṛtaṃ na khalu vayam arthapratimukhaḥ ||2372||
utthāyotthāya pāpeṣv abhiramati matir mandabuddher yadā te
naivodvego na śāntir na ca bhavati ghṛṇā kurvataḥ karma nindyam |
tat kiṃ naiva prabhāte jvaladanalasamā rauravī nāma raudrī
śailair bandhayati sma vānarahṛtair vālmīkir ambhonidhiṃ
vyāsaḥ pārthaśarais tathāpi na tayor atyuktir udbhāvyate |
vāg arthau ca tulādhṛtāv iva tathāpy asmatprabandhānayaṃ
loko dūṣayituṃ prasāritamukhas tubhyaṃ pratiṣṭhe namaḥ ||2374||
spardhāvanty upayānti bhūmisamatāṃ kālena rājñām api |
kṣudrasyāpi kaveḥ sadartharacanākīrtis tu yā vāṅmayī
nādṛṣṭvā yugaviplavaṃ punar asau prāyaḥ parikṣīyate ||2375||
ānandaṃ viduṣāṃ tanoti tanute karṇajvaraṃ vidviṣāṃ
sadhrīcīṃ baṭudāsa śāmyatu sa me proddāmakarṇajvaraḥ ||2377||
pañcama uccāvaca iti vividhapramodaṃ tanotu rasikānām ||
ślokānāṃ ca śatatrayam aśītyupetaṃ sahasrayor dvitayam |
bhavatu nṛpo dharmaparaḥ paramasamṛddhā ca bhavatu vasudheyam |
